58std::string vec_to_string(const int2& v) {
59 std::ostringstream oss;
60 oss << v.x << " " << v.y;
61 return oss.str();
62}
63
64std::string vec_to_string(const vec2& v) {
65 std::ostringstream oss;
66 oss << v.x << " " << v.y;
67 return oss.str();
68}
69
70std::string vec_to_string(const vec3& v) {
71 std::ostringstream oss;
72 oss << v.x << " " << v.y << " " << v.z;
73 return oss.str();
74}
75
76std::vector<vec3> linspace(const helios::vec3 &a, const helios::vec3 &b, int num_points){
77 std::vector<vec3> result(num_points);
78 result[0] = a;
79 for (int i = 1; i < num_points - 1; i++){
80 result[i].x = a.x + i * ( (b.x - a.x) / ((float)num_points - 1.0) );
81 result[i].y = a.y + i * ( (b.y - a.y) / ((float)num_points - 1.0) );
82 result[i].z = a.z + i * ( (b.z - a.z) / ((float)num_points - 1.0) );
83 }
84 result[num_points - 1] = b;
85 return result;
86}
87
88std::vector<vec3> interpolate(const std::vector<int> &keypoints, const std::vector<helios::vec3> &positions, int num_points){
89 std::vector<vec3> pos = positions;
90 std::vector<vec3> result(num_points);
91 std::vector<int> keypoints_sorted = keypoints;
92 std::sort(keypoints_sorted.begin(), keypoints_sorted.end());
93 std::map<int, int> keypoints_loc;
94 for (int i = 0; i < keypoints.size(); i++){
95 keypoints_loc.insert({keypoints[i], i});
96 }
97 if (keypoints.size() == 1){
98 std::fill(result.begin(), result.end(), pos[0]);
99 return result;
100 }
101 if (keypoints_sorted[keypoints_sorted.size() - 1] != num_points - 1){
102 keypoints_sorted.push_back(num_points - 1);
103 keypoints_loc.insert({num_points - 1, keypoints.size()});
104 pos.push_back(pos[pos.size() - 1]);
105 }
106 for (int i = 0; i < keypoints_sorted.size() - 1; i++){
107 int keypoint = keypoints_sorted[i];
108 int keypoint_idx = keypoints_loc[keypoints_sorted[i]];
109 int next_keypoint = keypoints_sorted[i + 1];
110 int next_keypoint_idx = keypoints_loc[keypoints_sorted[i + 1]];
111 std::vector<vec3> curr_positions = linspace(pos[keypoint_idx], pos[next_keypoint_idx], next_keypoint - keypoint + 1);
112 for (int j = 0; j < next_keypoint - keypoint + 1; j++){
113 int idx = j + keypoint;
114 result[idx] = curr_positions[j];
115 }
116 }
117 return result;
118}
119
120void toggle_button(const char* str_id, bool* v){
121 #ifdef ENABLE_HELIOS_VISUALIZER
122 ImVec2 p = ImGui::GetCursorScreenPos();
123 ImDrawList* draw_list = ImGui::GetWindowDrawList();
124
125 float height = ImGui::GetFrameHeight();
126 float width = height * 1.55f;
127 float radius = height * 0.50f;
128
129 ImGui::InvisibleButton(str_id, ImVec2(width, height));
130 if (ImGui::IsItemClicked())
131 *v = !*v;
132
133 float t = *v ? 1.0f : 0.0f;
134
135 ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
136 const float ANIM_SPEED = 0.08f;
137 if (g.LastActiveId == g.CurrentWindow->GetID(str_id))// && g.LastActiveIdTimer < ANIM_SPEED)
138 {
139 float t_anim = ImSaturate(g.LastActiveIdTimer / ANIM_SPEED);
140 t = *v ? (t_anim) : (1.0f - t_anim);
141 }
142
143 ImU32 col_bg;
144 if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
145 col_bg = ImGui::GetColorU32(ImLerp(ImVec4(0.78f, 0.78f, 0.78f, 1.0f), ImVec4(0.64f, 0.83f, 0.34f, 1.0f), t));
146 else
147 col_bg = ImGui::GetColorU32(ImLerp(ImVec4(0.85f, 0.85f, 0.85f, 1.0f), ImVec4(0.56f, 0.83f, 0.26f, 1.0f), t));
148
149 draw_list->AddRectFilled(p, ImVec2(p.x + width, p.y + height), col_bg, height * 0.5f);
150 draw_list->AddCircleFilled(ImVec2(p.x + radius + t * (width - radius * 2.0f), p.y + radius), radius - 1.5f, IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 255));
151 #endif //HELIOS_VISUALIZER
152}
153
154std::string file_dialog(){
155 std::string file_name;
156 #ifdef _WIN32
157 // save CWD
158 char CWD[MAX_PATH];
159 GetCurrentDirectory(MAX_PATH, CWD);
160
161 OPENFILENAME ofn;
162 char szFile[260] = {0};
163
164 ZeroMemory(&ofn, sizeof(ofn));
165 ofn.lStructSize = sizeof(ofn);
166 ofn.hwndOwner = nullptr;
167 ofn.lpstrFile = szFile;
168 ofn.nMaxFile = sizeof(szFile);
169 ofn.lpstrFilter = "All Files\0*.*\0Text Files\0*.txt\0";
170 ofn.nFilterIndex = 1;
171 ofn.lpstrFileTitle = nullptr;
172 ofn.nMaxFileTitle = 0;
173 ofn.lpstrInitialDir = nullptr;
174 ofn.Flags = OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST | OFN_FILEMUSTEXIST;
175
176 if (GetOpenFileName(&ofn)) {
177 std::cout << "Selected file: " << ofn.lpstrFile << std::endl;
178 } else {
179 std::cout << "No file selected." << std::endl;
180 return "";
181 }
182
183 // correct CWD
184 SetCurrentDirectory(CWD);
185
186 file_name = (std::string)ofn.lpstrFile;
187 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
188 nfdchar_t *outPath = nullptr;
189 nfdresult_t result = NFD_OpenDialog( nullptr, nullptr, &outPath );
190
191 if ( result == NFD_OKAY ) {
192 //puts("Success!");
193 //puts(outPath);
194 file_name = std::string(outPath);
195 free(outPath);
196 }
197 else if ( result == NFD_CANCEL ) {
198 puts("User pressed cancel.");
199 }
200 else {
201 // printf("Error: %s\n", NFD_GetError() );
202 std::cout << "Error: " << NFD_GetError() << std::endl;
203 }
204 #elif defined(__linux__)
205 nfdchar_t *outPath = nullptr;
206 nfdresult_t result = NFD_OpenDialog( nullptr, nullptr, &outPath );
207
208 if ( result == NFD_OKAY ) {
209 puts("Success!");
210 puts(outPath);
211 file_name = std::string(outPath);
212 free(outPath);
213 }
214 else if ( result == NFD_CANCEL ) {
215 puts("User pressed cancel.");
216 }
217 else {
218 // printf("Error: %s\n", NFD_GetError() );
219 std::cout << "Error: " << NFD_GetError() << std::endl;
220 }
221 #endif
222 // TODO: make sure file dialog works on macOS and Linux
223
224 return file_name;
225}
226
227
228std::string save_as_file_dialog(std::vector<std::string> extensions){
229 std::string file_name;
230 #ifdef _WIN32
231 // save CWD
232 char CWD[MAX_PATH];
233 GetCurrentDirectory(MAX_PATH, CWD);
234
235 OPENFILENAME ofn;
236 char szFile[260] = {0};
237
238 ZeroMemory(&ofn, sizeof(ofn));
239 ofn.lStructSize = sizeof(ofn);
240 ofn.hwndOwner = nullptr;
241 ofn.lpstrFile = szFile;
242 ofn.nMaxFile = sizeof(szFile);
243 std::string filterList = "";
244 for (std::string extension : extensions){
245 std::string ext_lower = extension;
246 std::string ext_upper = extension;
247 std::transform(ext_lower.begin(), ext_lower.end(), ext_lower.begin(), ::tolower);
248 std::transform(ext_upper.begin(), ext_upper.end(), ext_upper.begin(), ::toupper);
249 filterList += ext_upper + " Files (*." + ext_lower + ")";
250 filterList += '\0';
251 filterList += "*." + ext_lower;
252 filterList += '\0';
253 }
254 filterList += '\0';
255 ofn.lpstrFilter = filterList.c_str();
256 ofn.nFilterIndex = 1;
257 ofn.lpstrFileTitle = nullptr;
258 ofn.nMaxFileTitle = 0;
259 ofn.lpstrInitialDir = nullptr;
260 ofn.Flags = OFN_PATHMUSTEXIST;
261
262 if (GetSaveFileName(&ofn)) {
263 std::cout << "Selected file: " << ofn.lpstrFile << std::endl;
264 } else {
265 std::cout << "No file selected." << std::endl;
266 return "";
267 }
268
269 std::string ext_ = extensions[ofn.nFilterIndex - 1];
270 std::transform(ext_.begin(), ext_.end(), ext_.begin(), ::tolower);
271 std::string ext = "." + ext_;
272
273 // correct CWD
274 SetCurrentDirectory(CWD);
275
276 file_name = (std::string)ofn.lpstrFile;
277
278 std::filesystem::path file_path(file_name);
279 if (file_path.extension().empty()) {
280 file_path.replace_extension(ext);
281 file_name = file_path.string();
282 }
283 #elif defined(__APPLE__)
284 nfdchar_t *outPath = nullptr;
285 std::string filterList_ = "";
286 for (std::string extension : extensions){
287 std::string ext_lower = extension;
288 std::transform(ext_lower.begin(), ext_lower.end(), ext_lower.begin(), ::tolower);
289 filterList_ += ext_lower + ",";
290 }
291 if (!filterList_.empty() && filterList_.back() == ',') filterList_.pop_back();
292 const nfdchar_t *filterList = filterList_.c_str();
293 nfdresult_t result = NFD_SaveDialog( filterList, nullptr, &outPath );
294
295 if ( result == NFD_OKAY ) {
296 puts("Success!");
297 puts(outPath);
298 file_name = std::string(outPath);
299 free(outPath);
300
301 std::string ext_ = extensions[0];
302 std::transform(ext_.begin(), ext_.end(), ext_.begin(), ::tolower);
303 std::string ext = "." + ext_;
304 if (file_name.find('.') == std::string::npos) file_name += ext;
305 }
306 else if ( result == NFD_CANCEL ) {
307 puts("User pressed cancel.");
308 }
309 else {
310 // printf("Error: %s\n", NFD_GetError() );
311 std::cout << "Error: " << NFD_GetError() << std::endl;
312 }
313 #elif defined(__linux__)
314 nfdchar_t *outPath = nullptr;
315 std::string filterList_ = "";
316 for (std::string extension : extensions){
317 std::string ext_lower = extension;
318 std::transform(ext_lower.begin(), ext_lower.end(), ext_lower.begin(), ::tolower);
319 filterList_ += ext_lower + ",";
320 }
321 if (!filterList_.empty() && filterList_.back() == ',') filterList_.pop_back();
322 const nfdchar_t *filterList = filterList_.c_str();
323 nfdresult_t result = NFD_SaveDialog( filterList, nullptr, &outPath );
324
325 if ( result == NFD_OKAY ) {
326 puts("Success!");
327 puts(outPath);
328 file_name = std::string(outPath);
329 free(outPath);
330
331 std::string ext_ = extensions[0];
332 std::transform(ext_.begin(), ext_.end(), ext_.begin(), ::tolower);
333 std::string ext = "." + ext_;
334 if (file_name.find('.') == std::string::npos) file_name += ext;
335 }
336 else if ( result == NFD_CANCEL ) {
337 puts("User pressed cancel.");
338 }
339 else {
340 // printf("Error: %s\n", NFD_GetError() );
341 std::cout << "Error: " << NFD_GetError() << std::endl;
342 }
343 #endif
344 // TODO: make sure file dialog works on macOS and Linux
345
346 return file_name;
347}
348
349
350std::vector<std::string> get_xml_node_values(const std::string &xml_input, const std::string& name,
351 const std::string& parent){
352 int counter = 0;
353 pugi::xml_document xml_library_doc;
354 std::vector<std::string> labels_vec{};
355 std::string xml_library_error = "Failed to load XML Library file";
356 if( !open_xml_file(xml_input, xml_library_doc, xml_library_error) ) {
357 helios_runtime_error(xml_library_error);
358 }
359 pugi::xml_node helios = xml_library_doc.child("helios");
360 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
361 std::string default_value = "";
362 if (!p.attribute(name.c_str()).empty()){
363 const char *node_str = p.attribute(name.c_str()).value();
364 default_value = (std::string) node_str;
365 }
366 labels_vec.push_back(default_value);
367 counter++;
368 }
369 return labels_vec;
370}
371
372
373void ProjectBuilder::deleteArrows(){
374 for (auto& arrow_vec : arrow_dict){
375 for (std::vector<uint> arrow : arrow_vec.second){
376 context->deletePrimitive(arrow);
377 }
378 }
379 arrow_dict.clear();
380}
381
382
383void ProjectBuilder::updateArrows(){
384 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
385 for (auto rig_label_ : rig_labels_set){
386 arrow_count = 0;
387 std::string current_rig = rig_label_;
388 arrow_dict[current_rig] = std::vector<std::vector<uint>>{};
389 for (int i = 1; i < camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]].size(); i++){
390 vec3 arrow_pos = camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]][i - 1];
391 vec3 arrow_direction_vec = arrow_pos - camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]][i];
392 SphericalCoord arrow_direction_sph = cart2sphere(arrow_direction_vec);
393 vec3 arrow_scale(0.35, 0.35, 0.35);
394 arrow_dict[current_rig].push_back(context->loadOBJ("plugins/radiation/camera_light_models/Arrow.obj",
395 nullorigin, arrow_scale, nullrotation, RGB::blue, "YUP", true));
396 context->rotatePrimitive(arrow_dict.at(current_rig)[arrow_count], arrow_direction_sph.elevation, "x");
397 context->rotatePrimitive(arrow_dict.at(current_rig)[arrow_count], -arrow_direction_sph.azimuth, "z");
398 context->translatePrimitive(arrow_dict.at(current_rig)[arrow_count], arrow_pos);
399 context->setPrimitiveData(arrow_dict.at(current_rig)[arrow_count], "twosided_flag", uint(3));
400 arrow_count++;
401 }
402 float col[3];
403 RGBcolor rig_color = rig_colors[rig_dict[current_rig]];
404 col[0] = rig_color.r;
405 col[1] = rig_color.g;
406 col[2] = rig_color.b;
407 updateColor(current_rig, "arrow", col);
408 }
409 #endif
410}
411
412
413void ProjectBuilder::deleteCameraModels(){
414 for (auto& camera_model : camera_models_dict){
415 context->deletePrimitive(camera_model.second);
416 }
417 camera_models_dict.clear();
418}
419
420
421void ProjectBuilder::updateCameraModels(){
422#ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
423 for (auto rig_label_ : rig_labels_set){
424 int camera_idx = rig_dict[rig_label_];
425 camera_models_dict[rig_label_] = std::vector<uint>{};
426 vec3 camera_pos = camera_position_vec[camera_idx][0];
427 vec3 camera_direction_vec = camera_lookat_vec[camera_idx][0] - camera_pos;
428 SphericalCoord camera_direction_sph = cart2sphere(camera_direction_vec);
429 vec3 camera_scale(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
430 camera_models_dict[rig_label_] = context->loadOBJ("plugins/radiation/camera_light_models/Camera.obj",
431 nullorigin, camera_scale, nullrotation, RGB::blue, "ZUP", true);
432 context->rotatePrimitive(camera_models_dict.at(rig_label_), camera_direction_sph.elevation, "x");
433 context->rotatePrimitive(camera_models_dict.at(rig_label_), -camera_direction_sph.azimuth, "z");
434 context->translatePrimitive(camera_models_dict.at(rig_label_), camera_pos);
435 context->setPrimitiveData(camera_models_dict.at(rig_label_), "twosided_flag", uint(3));
436 float col[3];
437 RGBcolor rig_color = rig_colors[camera_idx];
438 col[0] = rig_color.r;
439 col[1] = rig_color.g;
440 col[2] = rig_color.b;
441 updateColor(rig_label_, "camera", col);
442 }
443#endif
444}
445
446
447void ProjectBuilder::updatePrimitiveTypes(){
448 std::vector<uint> allUUIDs = context->getAllUUIDs();
449 // Clear current primitive data
450 primitive_names.clear();
451 primitive_names_set.clear();
452 primitive_UUIDs.clear();
453 primitive_continuous.clear();
454 primitive_values.clear();
455 primitive_spectra.clear();
456 //
457 primitive_names.push_back("All");
458 primitive_names_set.insert("All");
459 primitive_continuous.insert({"All", {false, false, false}});
460 primitive_spectra.insert({"All", {reflectivity_spectrum, transmissivity_spectrum, emissivity_spectrum}});
461 for (auto &primitive_UUID : allUUIDs){
462 std::string default_value;
463 if(context->doesPrimitiveDataExist(primitive_UUID, "object_label")){
464 context->getPrimitiveData(primitive_UUID, "object_label", default_value);
465 if (primitive_names_set.find(default_value) == primitive_names_set.end()){
466 primitive_names.push_back(default_value);
467 primitive_names_set.insert(default_value);
468 }
469 if ( primitive_UUIDs.find(default_value) == primitive_UUIDs.end() ){
470 std::vector<uint> new_UUIDs;
471 // primitive_addresses[default_value] = &new_UUIDs;
472 primitive_UUIDs.insert({default_value, new_UUIDs});
473 // primitive_continuous[default_value] = primitive_continuous["All"];
474 primitive_continuous.insert({default_value, {false, false, false}});
475 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
476 primitive_values[band].insert({default_value, {reflectivity, transmissivity, emissivity}});
477 }
478 primitive_spectra.insert({default_value, {reflectivity_spectrum, transmissivity_spectrum, emissivity_spectrum}});
479 }
480 primitive_UUIDs[default_value].push_back(primitive_UUID);
481 }
482 current_primitive = "All";
483 }
484 for (auto it = bounding_boxes.begin(); it != bounding_boxes.end(); /* no increment here */) {
485 if (primitive_names_set.find(it->first) == primitive_names_set.end()) {
486 it = bounding_boxes.erase(it);
487 }else {
488 ++it;
489 }
490 }
491 for (auto& prim : primitive_names_set){
492 if (prim == "All"){
493 continue;
494 }
495 if (bounding_boxes.find(prim) == bounding_boxes.end()){
496 bounding_boxes[prim] = false;
497 }
498 }
499 //context->setPrimitiveData
500 // context->setPrimitiveData(); type uint or int
501}
502
503
504void ProjectBuilder::updateDataGroups(){
505 data_groups_set.clear();
506 data_groups_set.insert("All");
507 std::vector<uint> all_UUIDs = context->getAllUUIDs();
508 for (uint UUID : all_UUIDs){
509 std::string curr_data_group = "";
510 if (!context->doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, "data_group")) continue;
511 context->getPrimitiveData(UUID, "data_group", curr_data_group);
512 if (!curr_data_group.empty()){
513 data_groups_set.insert(curr_data_group);
514 }
515 }
516 for (std::string data_group : data_groups_set){ //initialize new data_groups if necessary
517 if (primitive_continuous_dict.find(data_group) == primitive_continuous_dict.end()){
518 primitive_continuous_dict[data_group] = primitive_continuous;
519 }
520 if (primitive_spectra_dict.find(data_group) == primitive_spectra_dict.end()){
521 primitive_spectra_dict[data_group] = primitive_spectra;
522 }
523 if (primitive_values_dict.find(data_group) == primitive_values_dict.end()){
524 primitive_values_dict[data_group] = primitive_values;
525 }
526 }
527}
528
529
530
531void ProjectBuilder::updateSpectra(){
532 for (std::pair<std::string, std::vector<uint>> primitive_pair : primitive_UUIDs){
533 if (primitive_continuous[primitive_pair.first].empty()) continue;
534 if (!primitive_continuous[primitive_pair.first][0]){
535 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
536 float reflectivity = primitive_values[band][primitive_pair.first][0];
537 std::string reflectivity_band = "reflectivity_" + band;
538 context->setPrimitiveData(primitive_pair.second, reflectivity_band.c_str(), reflectivity);
539 }
540 }else{
541 std::string reflectivity_spectrum = primitive_spectra[primitive_pair.first][0];
542 if( !reflectivity_spectrum.empty() ){
543 context->setPrimitiveData( primitive_UUIDs[primitive_pair.first], "reflectivity_spectrum", reflectivity_spectrum );
544 }else{
545 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << primitive_pair.first << "_reflectivity_spectrum'. Assuming " << primitive_pair.first << " primitives are black across all shortwave bands." << std::endl;
546 }
547 }
548 if (!primitive_continuous[primitive_pair.first][1]){
549 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
550 float transmissivity = primitive_values[band][primitive_pair.first][1];
551 std::string transmissivity_band = "transmissivity_" + band;
552 context->setPrimitiveData(primitive_pair.second, transmissivity_band.c_str(), transmissivity);
553 }
554 }else{
555 std::string transmissivity_spectrum = primitive_spectra[primitive_pair.first][1];
556 if( !transmissivity_spectrum.empty() ){
557 context->setPrimitiveData( primitive_UUIDs[primitive_pair.first], "transmissivity_spectrum", transmissivity_spectrum );
558 }else{
559 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << primitive_pair.first << "_transmissivity_spectrum'. Assuming " << primitive_pair.first << " primitives are black across all shortwave bands." << std::endl;
560 }
561 }
562 if (!primitive_continuous[primitive_pair.first][2]){
563 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
564 if (bandlabels_set_emissivity.find(band) != bandlabels_set_emissivity.end()) continue;
565 float emissivity = primitive_values[band][primitive_pair.first][2];
566 std::string emissivity_band = "emissivity_" + band;
567 context->setPrimitiveData(primitive_pair.second, emissivity_band.c_str(), emissivity);
568 }
569 }else{
570 std::string emissivity_spectrum = primitive_spectra[primitive_pair.first][2];
571 if( !emissivity_spectrum.empty() ){
572 context->setPrimitiveData( primitive_UUIDs[primitive_pair.first], "emissivity_spectrum", emissivity_spectrum );
573 }else{
574 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << primitive_pair.first << "_emissivity_spectrum'. Assuming " << primitive_pair.first << " primitives are black across all shortwave bands." << std::endl;
575 }
576 }
577 }
578 std::vector<uint> all_UUIDs = context->getAllUUIDs();
579 for (uint UUID : all_UUIDs){
580 if (!context->doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, "data_group")) continue;
581 // Get data group of UUID
582 std::string curr_data_group;
583 context->getPrimitiveData(UUID, "data_group", curr_data_group);
584 // Get primitive type of UUID
585 std::string curr_prim_type;
586 if ( context->doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, "object_label") ){
587 context->getPrimitiveData(UUID, "object_label", curr_prim_type);
588 } else{
589 curr_prim_type = "All";
590 }
591 if (primitive_continuous_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type].empty()) continue;
592 if (!primitive_continuous_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type][0]){
593 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
594 float reflectivity = primitive_values_dict[curr_data_group][band][curr_prim_type][0];
595 std::string reflectivity_band = "reflectivity_" + band;
596 context->setPrimitiveData(UUID, reflectivity_band.c_str(), reflectivity);
597 }
598 }else{
599 std::string reflectivity_spectrum = primitive_spectra_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type][0];
600 if( !reflectivity_spectrum.empty() ){
601 context->setPrimitiveData( UUID, "reflectivity_spectrum", reflectivity_spectrum );
602 }else{
603 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << curr_prim_type << "_reflectivity_spectrum'. Assuming " << curr_prim_type << " primitives are black across all shortwave bands." << std::endl;
604 }
605 }
606 if (!primitive_continuous_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type][1]){
607 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
608 float transmissivity = primitive_values_dict[curr_data_group][band][curr_prim_type][1];
609 std::string transmissivity_band = "transmissivity_" + band;
610 context->setPrimitiveData(UUID, transmissivity_band.c_str(), transmissivity);
611 }
612 }else{
613 std::string transmissivity_spectrum = primitive_spectra_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type][1];
614 if( !transmissivity_spectrum.empty() ){
615 context->setPrimitiveData( UUID, "transmissivity_spectrum", transmissivity_spectrum );
616 }else{
617 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << curr_prim_type << "_transmissivity_spectrum'. Assuming " << curr_prim_type << " primitives are black across all shortwave bands." << std::endl;
618 }
619 }
620 if (!primitive_continuous_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type][2]){
621 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
622 if (bandlabels_set_emissivity.find(band) != bandlabels_set_emissivity.end()) continue;
623 float emissivity = primitive_values_dict[curr_data_group][band][curr_prim_type][2];
624 std::string emissivity_band = "emissivity_" + band;
625 context->setPrimitiveData(UUID, emissivity_band.c_str(), emissivity);
626 }
627 }else{
628 std::string emissivity_spectrum = primitive_spectra_dict[curr_data_group][curr_prim_type][2];
629 if( !emissivity_spectrum.empty() ){
630 context->setPrimitiveData( UUID, "emissivity_spectrum", emissivity_spectrum );
631 }else{
632 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << curr_prim_type << "_emissivity_spectrum'. Assuming " << curr_prim_type << " primitives are black across all shortwave bands." << std::endl;
633 }
634 }
635 }
636#ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
637 radiation->updateGeometry();
638#endif
639}
640
641void ProjectBuilder::updateCameras(){
642 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
643 for (std::string rig_label : rig_labels_set){
644 int rig_index = rig_dict[rig_label];
645 for (std::string rig_camera_label : rig_camera_labels[rig_index]){
646 int camera_index = camera_dict[rig_camera_label];
647
648 /* Load properties of camera */
649 cameraproperties = new CameraProperties();
650 cameraproperties->camera_resolution = camera_resolutions[camera_index];
651 cameraproperties->focal_plane_distance = focal_plane_distances[camera_index];
652 cameraproperties->lens_diameter = lens_diameters[camera_index];
653 cameraproperties->FOV_aspect_ratio = FOV_aspect_ratios[camera_index];
654 cameraproperties->HFOV = HFOVs[camera_index];
655
656 /* Create new camera */
657 std::string camera_label_ = rig_label + "_" + rig_camera_label;
658 vec3 camera_position_ = camera_positions[rig_index];
659 vec3 camera_lookat_ = camera_lookats[rig_index];
660 radiation->addRadiationCamera(camera_label_, bandlabels, camera_position_, camera_lookat_, *cameraproperties, 100);
661 for (auto &band : bandlabels){
662 radiation->setCameraSpectralResponse(camera_label_, band, camera_calibrations[camera_index][band]);
663 }
664 radiation->updateGeometry();
665 }
666 }
667 for (std::string band_group_name : band_group_names){
668 bandGroup curr_band_group = band_group_lookup[band_group_name];
669 if (!curr_band_group.grayscale){
670 radiation->runBand(curr_band_group.bands);
671 } else{
672 radiation->runBand(std::vector<std::string>{curr_band_group.bands[0]});
673 }
674 }
675 #endif //RADIATION_MODEL
676}
677
678void ProjectBuilder::record(){
679 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
680 deleteArrows();
681 deleteCameraModels();
682 randomize(true);
683 setBoundingBoxObjects();
684 for (int _ = 0; _ < num_recordings; _++){
685 updateContext();
686 // std::time_t now = std::time(nullptr);
687 // std::tm* tm_ptr = std::localtime(&now);
688 // std::ostringstream oss;
689 // oss << std::put_time(tm_ptr, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S");
690 // std::string image_dir = "./saved-" + oss.str() + "/";
691 // std::filesystem::create_directory("saved-" + oss.str());
692 std::string image_dir = "./saved/";
693 std::string image_dir_base = "./saved_";
694 int image_dir_idx = 0;
695 while (std::filesystem::exists(image_dir)){
696 image_dir = image_dir_base + std::to_string(image_dir_idx) + "/";
697 image_dir_idx++;
698 }
699 std::filesystem::create_directory(image_dir);
700 std::cout << "Saving images to " << image_dir << std::endl;
701 std::vector<uint> temp_lights{};
702 for (std::string rig_label : rig_labels_set){
703 int rig_index = rig_dict[rig_label];
704 std::vector<vec3> interpolated_camera_positions = interpolate(keypoint_frames[rig_index], camera_position_vec[rig_index], num_images_vec[rig_index]);
705 std::vector<vec3> interpolated_camera_lookats = interpolate(keypoint_frames[rig_index], camera_lookat_vec[rig_index], num_images_vec[rig_index]);
706 // ADD RIG LIGHTS
707 for (std::string light : rig_light_labels[rig_dict[rig_label]]){
708 int light_idx = light_dict[light];
709 uint new_light_UUID;
710 if (light_types[light_idx] == "sphere"){
711 new_light_UUID = radiation->addSphereRadiationSource(interpolated_camera_positions[0], light_radius_vec[light_idx]);
712 temp_lights.push_back(new_light_UUID);
713 }else if (light_types[light_dict[light]] == "rectangle"){
714 new_light_UUID = radiation->addRectangleRadiationSource(interpolated_camera_positions[0],
715 light_size_vec[light_idx], light_rotation_vec[light_idx]);
716 temp_lights.push_back(new_light_UUID);
717 }else if (light_types[light_dict[light]] == "disk"){
718 new_light_UUID = radiation->addDiskRadiationSource(interpolated_camera_positions[0],
719 light_radius_vec[light_idx], light_rotation_vec[light_idx]);
720 temp_lights.push_back(new_light_UUID);
721 }
722 for (auto &band : bandlabels){
723 radiation->setSourceFlux(new_light_UUID, band, light_flux_vec[light_idx]);
724 }
725 }
726 // radiation->updateGeometry(); // TODO: figure out why we can't move updateGeometry here
727 // radiation->setSourceFlux(light_UUID, band, flux_value)
728 //
729 for (int i = 0; i < interpolated_camera_positions.size(); i++){
730 // SET LIGHT POSITIONS
731 for (uint light_ID : temp_lights){
732 radiation->setSourcePosition(light_ID, interpolated_camera_positions[i]);
733 }
734 // radiation->setSourceFlux(light_UUID, band, flux_value)
735 //
736 for (std::string rig_camera_label : rig_camera_labels[rig_index]){
737 int camera_index = camera_dict[rig_camera_label];
738 std::string cameralabel = rig_label + "_" + rig_camera_label;
739 radiation->setCameraPosition(cameralabel, interpolated_camera_positions[i]);
740 radiation->setCameraLookat(cameralabel, interpolated_camera_lookats[i]);
741 }
742 radiation->updateGeometry();
743 for (std::string band_group_name : band_group_names){
744 bandGroup curr_band_group = band_group_lookup[band_group_name];
745 if (!curr_band_group.grayscale){
746 radiation->runBand(curr_band_group.bands);
747 } else{
748 radiation->runBand(std::vector<std::string>{curr_band_group.bands[0]});
749 }
750 }
751 for (std::string rig_camera_label : rig_camera_labels[rig_index]){
752 std::string cameralabel = rig_label + "_" + rig_camera_label;
753 // Write Images
754 for (std::string band_group_name : band_group_names){
755 bandGroup curr_band_group = band_group_lookup[band_group_name];
756 std::vector<std::string> band_group_vec;
757 if (!curr_band_group.grayscale){
758 band_group_vec = curr_band_group.bands;
759 } else{
760 band_group_vec = std::vector<std::string>{curr_band_group.bands[0]};
761 }
762 radiation->writeCameraImage( cameralabel, band_group_vec, band_group_name + std::to_string(i), image_dir + rig_label + '/');
763 if (band_group_lookup[band_group_name].norm){
764 radiation->writeNormCameraImage( cameralabel, band_group_vec, band_group_name + "_norm" + std::to_string(i), image_dir + rig_label + '/');
765 }
766 }
767 if (write_depth[rig_dict[current_rig]])
768 radiation->writeDepthImageData( cameralabel, "depth" + std::to_string(i), image_dir + rig_label + '/');
769 if (write_norm_depth[rig_dict[current_rig]])
770 radiation->writeNormDepthImage( cameralabel, "normdepth" + std::to_string(i), 3, image_dir + rig_label + '/');
771 //
772 // Bounding boxes for all primitive types
773 for (std::string band_group_ : band_group_names){
774 for (std::string primitive_name : primitive_names){
775 if (!primitive_name.empty()){
776 primitive_name[0] = std::tolower(static_cast<unsigned char>(primitive_name[0]));
777 }
778 if (bounding_boxes_map.find(primitive_name) != bounding_boxes_map.end())
779 // radiation->writeImageBoundingBoxes( cameralabel, "object_number", bounding_boxes_map[primitive_name], "bbox_" + primitive_name + std::to_string(i), image_dir + rig_label + '/');
780 radiation->writeImageBoundingBoxes_ObjectData( cameralabel, "plantID", bounding_boxes_map[primitive_name], band_group_ + std::to_string(i), image_dir + rig_label + '/', true);
781 // radiation->writeImageBoundingBoxes( cameralabel, primitive_name, 0, "bbox_" + primitive_name + std::to_string(i), image_dir + rig_label + '/');
782 // radiation->writeImageBoundingBoxes_ObjectData();
783 }
784 }
785 //
786 }
787 }
788 // REMOVE RIG LIGHTS
789 for (uint temp_light : temp_lights){
790 radiation->deleteRadiationSource(temp_light);
791 }
792 temp_lights.clear();
793 //
794 }
795 randomize(false);
796 }
797 updateArrows();
798 updateCameraModels();
799 visualizer->plotUpdate();
800 #endif //RADIATION_MODEL
801}
802
803void ProjectBuilder::buildFromXML(){
804 context = new Context();
805
806 // if (enable_plantarchitecture){
807 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
808 plantarchitecture = new PlantArchitecture(context);
809 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
810 plantarchitecture->optionalOutputObjectData(std::vector<std::string>{"plantID", "leafID", "peduncleID",
811 "closedflowerID", "openflowerID", "fruitID",
812 "rank", "age", "carbohydrate_concentration"});
813 #endif
814 std::cout << "Loaded PlantArchitecture plugin." << std::endl;
815 // }else{
816 #else
817 std::cout << "Excluding PlantArchitecture plugin." << std::endl;
818 // } //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
819 #endif //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
820
821 InitializeSimulation(xml_input_file, context);
822
823 // if (enable_plantarchitecture){
824 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
825 BuildGeometry(xml_input_file, plantarchitecture, context, canopy_IDs, individual_plant_locations);
826 // } //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
827 #endif //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
828
829 // if (enable_radiation){
830 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
831 radiation = new RadiationModel(context);
832 std::cout << "Loaded Radiation plugin." << std::endl;
833 // }else{
834 #else
835 std::cout << "Excluding Radiation plugin." << std::endl;
836 // } //RADIATION_MODEL
837 #endif //RADIATION_MODEL
838
839 // if (enable_solarposition){
840 #ifdef ENABLE_SOLARPOSITION
841 solarposition = new SolarPosition(context);
842 std::cout << "Loaded SolarPosition plugin." << std::endl;
843 // }else{
844 #else
845 std::cout << "Excluding SolarPosition plugin." << std::endl;
846 // } //SOLARPOSITION
847 #endif //SOLARPOSITION
848
849 // if (enable_radiation){
850 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
851 InitializeRadiation(xml_input_file, solarposition, radiation, context);
852 // } //RADIATION_MODEL
853 #endif //RADIATION_MODEL
854
855 // if (enable_energybalance){
856 #ifdef ENABLE_ENERGYBALANCEMODEL
857 energybalancemodel = new EnergyBalanceModel(context);
858 std::cout << "Loaded EnergyBalance plugin." << std::endl;
859 // }else{
860 #else
861 std::cout << "Excluding EnergyBalance plugin." << std::endl;
862 // } //ENERGYBALANCEMODEL
863 #endif //ENERGYBALANCEMODEL
864
865 // if (enable_blconductance){
866 #ifdef ENABLE_BOUNDARYLAYERCONDUCTANCEMODEL
867 boundarylayerconductance = new BLConductanceModel(context);
868 std::cout << "Loaded BoundaryLayerConductance plugin." << std::endl;
869 // }else{
870 #else
871 std::cout << "Excluding BoundaryLayerConductance plugin." << std::endl;
872 // } //BOUNDARYLAYERCONDUCTANCEMODEL
873 #endif //BOUNDARYLAYERCONDUCTANCEMODEL
874
875 // if (enable_blconductance && enable_energybalance){
876 #if defined(ENABLE_ENERGYBALANCEMODEL) && defined(ENABLE_BOUNDARYLAYERCONDUCTANCEMODEL)
877 InitializeEnergyBalance(xml_input_file, boundarylayerconductance, energybalancemodel, context);
878 // } //BOUNDARYLAYERCONDUCTANCEMODE && ENERGYBALANCEMODEL
879 #endif //BOUNDARYLAYERCONDUCTANCEMODE && ENERGYBALANCEMODEL
880
881 #ifdef ENABLE_CANOPY_GENERATOR
882 canopygenerator = new CanopyGenerator(context);
883 std::cout << "Loaded CanopyGenerator plugin." << std::endl;
884 // }else{
885 #else
886 std::cout << "Excluding CanopyGenerator plugin." << std::endl;
887 // } //CANOPYGENERATOR
888 #endif //CANOPYGENERATOR
889
890 // -- main time loop -- //
891 if (enable_radiation){
892 assert( context->doesGlobalDataExist( "air_turbidity" ) );
893 context->getGlobalData( "air_turbidity", turbidity );
894 }
895
896 if (enable_radiation){
897 assert( context->doesGlobalDataExist( "diffuse_extinction_coeff" ) );
898 context->getGlobalData( "diffuse_extinction_coeff", diffuse_extinction_coeff );
899 }
900
901 if (enable_radiation){
902 assert( context->doesGlobalDataExist( "sun_ID" ) );
903 context->getGlobalData( "sun_ID", sun_ID );
904 }
905
906 // bandlabels = {"red", "green", "blue"};
907
908 if (enable_plantarchitecture){
909 // context->getGlobalData( "ground_UUIDs", ground_UUIDs );
910 // context->getGlobalData( "leaf_UUIDs", leaf_UUIDs );
911 for (std::string primitive_name : primitive_names){
912 if (primitive_name != "All" && primitive_name != "all"){
913 bounding_boxes[primitive_name] = false;
914 std::string primitive_name_lower = primitive_name;
915 primitive_name_lower[0] = std::tolower(static_cast<unsigned char>(primitive_name_lower[0]));
916 std::string primitive_UUIDs_name = primitive_name_lower + "_UUIDs";
917 if ( context->doesGlobalDataExist( primitive_UUIDs_name.c_str() ) ){
918 context->getGlobalData( primitive_UUIDs_name.c_str(), primitive_UUIDs[primitive_name] );
919 std::vector<uint> primitive_UUIDs_ = primitive_UUIDs[primitive_name];
920 if ( !primitive_UUIDs_.empty()){
921 context->setPrimitiveData(primitive_UUIDs[primitive_name], "object_label", primitive_name_lower);
922 }
923 }
924 }
925 }
926 ground_UUIDs = primitive_UUIDs["ground"];
927 leaf_UUIDs = primitive_UUIDs["leaf"];
928 // assert( !ground_UUIDs.empty() );
929 // assert( !leaf_UUIDs.empty() );
930 context->setPrimitiveData(ground_UUIDs, "object_label", "ground");
931 context->setPrimitiveData(leaf_UUIDs, "object_label", "leaf");
932
933 }
934
935 // Update reflectivity, transmissivity, & emissivity for each band / primitive_type
936 if( !open_xml_file(xml_input_file, xmldoc, xml_error_string) ) {
937 helios_runtime_error(xml_error_string);
938 }
939 xmlGetValues();
940 updateGround(); // TODO: add repeat ground to buildGeometry
941 updatePrimitiveTypes();
942 updateSpectra(); // TODO: add update geometry at end
943
944 ground_area = context->sumPrimitiveSurfaceArea( ground_UUIDs );
945
946 timeseries_variables = context->listTimeseriesVariables();
947
948 if( timeseries_variables.empty() ){
949 std::cout << "No timeseries data was loaded. Skipping time loop." << std::endl;
950 }else{
951
952 uint num_time_points = context->getTimeseriesLength( timeseries_variables.front().c_str() );
953 for( uint timestep = 0; timestep<num_time_points; timestep++ ){
954
955 context->setCurrentTimeseriesPoint( timeseries_variables.front().c_str(), timestep );
956
957 std::cout << "Timestep " << timestep << ": " << context->getDate() << " " << context->getTime() << std::endl;
958
959 if( context->doesTimeseriesVariableExist( "air_temperature" ) ){
960 air_temperature = context->queryTimeseriesData( "air_temperature", timestep );
961 }
962 context->setPrimitiveData( context->getAllUUIDs(), "air_temperature", air_temperature );
963
964 if( context->doesTimeseriesVariableExist( "air_humidity" ) ){
965 air_humidity = context->queryTimeseriesData( "air_humidity", timestep );
966 if( air_humidity > 1 ){
967 //try dividing by 100
968 air_humidity /= 100.f;
969 if( air_humidity > 1 ){
970 std::cout << "WARNING: air_humidity must be between 0 and 1. Setting to default value of 0.5." << std::endl;
971 air_humidity = 0.5f;
972 }else{
973 std::cout << "WARNING: air_humidity read from timeseries was greater than 1.0. It was assumed that the given value was in percent and was automatically divided by 100." << std::endl;
974 }
975 }
976 }
977 context->setPrimitiveData( context->getAllUUIDs(), "air_humidity", air_humidity );
978
979 // if (enable_solarposition && enable_radiation){
980 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
981 sun_dir_vec = solarposition->getSunDirectionVector();
982
983 radiation->setSourcePosition( sun_ID, sun_dir_vec );
984
985 if( diffuse_extinction_coeff > 0 ){
986 radiation->setDiffuseRadiationExtinctionCoeff("PAR", diffuse_extinction_coeff, sun_dir_vec);
987 radiation->setDiffuseRadiationExtinctionCoeff("NIR", diffuse_extinction_coeff, sun_dir_vec);
988 }
989
990 R_PAR_dir = solarposition->getSolarFluxPAR(101000, air_temperature, air_humidity, turbidity);
991 R_NIR_dir = solarposition->getSolarFluxNIR(101000, air_temperature, air_humidity, turbidity);
992 fdiff = solarposition->getDiffuseFraction(101000, air_temperature, air_humidity, turbidity);
993
994 radiation->setSourceFlux(sun_ID, "PAR", R_PAR_dir * (1.f - fdiff));
995 radiation->setDiffuseRadiationFlux("PAR", R_PAR_dir * fdiff);
996 radiation->setSourceFlux(sun_ID, "NIR", R_NIR_dir * (1.f - fdiff));
997 radiation->setDiffuseRadiationFlux("NIR", R_NIR_dir * fdiff);
998
999 // Run the radiation model
1000 radiation->runBand({"PAR","NIR","LW"});
1001 // } //SOLARPOSITION && RADIATION_MODEL
1002 #endif //SOLARPOSITION && RADIATION_MODEL
1003
1004 context->calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( leaf_UUIDs, "radiation_flux_PAR", PAR_absorbed );
1005 PAR_absorbed /= ground_area;
1006
1007 context->calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( leaf_UUIDs, "radiation_flux_NIR", NIR_absorbed );
1008 NIR_absorbed /= ground_area;
1009
1010 context->calculatePrimitiveDataAreaWeightedSum( leaf_UUIDs, "radiation_flux_LW", LW_absorbed );
1011 LW_absorbed /= ground_area;
1012
1013 std::cout << "Absorbed PAR: " << PAR_absorbed << " W/m^2" << std::endl;
1014 std::cout << "Absorbed NIR: " << NIR_absorbed << " W/m^2" << std::endl;
1015 std::cout << "Absorbed LW: " << LW_absorbed << " W/m^2" << std::endl;
1016 }
1017 // RIG BLOCK
1018 // *** Loading any XML files needed for cameras *** //
1019 for (auto &xml_file : camera_xml_library_files) {
1020 if( xml_file.empty() || !std::filesystem::exists(xml_file) ){
1021 std::cout << "WARNING: Could not find camera XML library file: " + xml_file << ". Skipping..." << std::endl;
1022 continue;
1023 }
1024 context->loadXML( xml_file.c_str() );
1025 }
1026 // *** Loading any XML files needed for lights *** //
1027 for (auto &xml_file : light_xml_library_files) {
1028 if( xml_file.empty() || !std::filesystem::exists(xml_file) ){
1029 std::cout << "WARNING: Could not find light XML library file: " + xml_file << ". Skipping..." << std::endl;
1030 continue;
1031 }
1032 context->loadXML( xml_file.c_str() );
1033 }
1034
1035 // if (enable_solarposition && enable_radiation){
1036 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
1037
1038 radiation->setSourceSpectrum( sun_ID, solar_direct_spectrum );
1039
1040 radiation->addRadiationBand("red");
1041 radiation->disableEmission("red");
1042 // radiation->setSourceFlux(sun_ID, "red", 2.f);
1043 radiation->setScatteringDepth("red", 2);
1044
1045 radiation->copyRadiationBand("red", "green");
1046 radiation->copyRadiationBand("red", "blue");
1047
1048 radiation->enforcePeriodicBoundary("xy"); // TODO: make this a user setting
1049 // } //SOLARPOSITION && RADIATION_MODEL
1050 #endif //SOLARPOSITION && RADIATION_MODEL
1051 }
1052 // RIG BLOCK
1053 num_images = 5;
1054 updateArrows();
1055 updateCameras();
1056 updateCameraModels();
1057
1058 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1059
1060 refreshVisualizationTypes();
1061
1062 built = true;
1063}
1064
1065
1066void ProjectBuilder::buildFromXML(std::string xml_path){
1067 xml_input_file = xml_path;
1068 buildFromXML();
1069}
1070
1071
1072std::map<std::string, int> ProjectBuilder::getNodeLabels(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<std::string>& labels_vec){
1073 int counter = 0;
1074 std::map<std::string, int> labels_dict = {};
1075 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1076 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1077 std::string default_value = "canopy_0";
1078 if (!p.attribute(name.c_str()).empty()){
1079 const char *node_str = p.attribute(name.c_str()).value();
1080 default_value = (std::string) node_str;
1081 }
1082 labels_vec.push_back(default_value);
1083 labels_dict.insert({default_value, counter});
1084 counter++;
1085 }
1086 return labels_dict;
1087}
1088
1089
1090void ProjectBuilder::getKeypoints(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<std::vector<int>>& keypoints){
1091 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1092 const char *rig_ = "rig";
1093 for (pugi::xml_node rig = helios.child(rig_); rig; rig = rig.next_sibling(rig_)){
1094 int count = 0;
1095 std::vector<int> curr_keypoints;
1096 for (pugi::xml_node p = rig.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1097 std::string default_value = std::to_string(count);
1098 if (!p.attribute(name.c_str()).empty()){
1099 const char *node_str = p.attribute(name.c_str()).value();
1100 default_value = (std::string) node_str;
1101 }
1102 std::stringstream keypoint_value;
1103 keypoint_value << default_value.c_str();
1104 int keypoint_;
1105 keypoint_value >> keypoint_;
1106 curr_keypoints.push_back(keypoint_);
1107 count++;
1108 }
1109 keypoints.push_back(curr_keypoints);
1110 }
1111}
1112
1113void ProjectBuilder::setKeypoints(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<std::vector<int>>& keypoints){
1114 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1115 const char *rig_ = "rig";
1116 int rig_count = 0;
1117 for (pugi::xml_node rig = helios.child(rig_); rig; rig = rig.next_sibling(rig_)){
1118 int count = 0;
1119 for (pugi::xml_node p = rig.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1120 std::string default_value = std::to_string(count);
1121 p.append_attribute(name.c_str());
1122 p.attribute(name.c_str()).set_value(keypoints[rig_count][count]);
1123 count++;
1124 }
1125 rig_count++;
1126 }
1127} // TODO: test this function
1128
1129void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, int &default_value) {
1130 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1131 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1132 if (parent != "helios") {
1133 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1134 }
1135 pugi::xml_node node;
1136 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1137 if( node.empty() ){
1138 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'. Using default value of " << default_value << std::endl;
1139 }else {
1140 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1141 if (!parse_int(node_str, default_value)) {
1142 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1143 } else if( default_value<0 ){
1144 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than or equal to 0.");
1145 }
1146 }
1147}
1148
1149void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, float &default_value) {
1150 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1151 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1152 if (parent != "helios") {
1153 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1154 }
1155 pugi::xml_node node;
1156 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1157 if( node.empty() ){
1158 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'. Using default value of " << default_value << std::endl;
1159 }else {
1160 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1161 if (!parse_float(node_str, default_value)) {
1162 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1163 }
1164 // else if( default_value<0 ){
1165 // helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than or equal to 0.");
1166 // }
1167 }
1168}
1169
1170void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::string &default_value) {
1171 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1172 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1173 if (parent != "helios") {
1174 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1175 }
1176 pugi::xml_node node;
1177 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1178 if( node.empty() ){
1179 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'. Using default value of " << default_value << std::endl;
1180 }else {
1181 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1182 default_value = node_str;
1183 }
1184}
1185
1186void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, vec2 &default_value) {
1187 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1188 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1189 if (parent != "helios") {
1190 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1191 }
1192 pugi::xml_node node;
1193 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1194 if( node.empty() ){
1195 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'. Using default value of " << default_value << std::endl;
1196 }else {
1197 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1198 if (!parse_vec2(node_str, default_value)) {
1199 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1200 }else if( default_value.x<=0 || default_value.y<=0 ){
1201 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than 0.");
1202 }
1203 }
1204}
1205
1206void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, vec3 &default_value) {
1207 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1208 pugi::xml_node p = helios;

1211 }
1212 pugi::xml_node node;
1213 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1214 if( node.empty() ){
1215 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'. Using default value of " << default_value << std::endl;
1216 }else {
1217 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1218 if (!parse_vec3(node_str, default_value)) {
1219 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1220 }
1221 }
1222}

1224
1225void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, int2 &default_value) {
1226 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1227 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1228 if (parent != "helios") {
1229 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1230 }
1231 pugi::xml_node node;
1232 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1233 if( node.empty() ){
1234 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'. Using default value of " << default_value << std::endl;
1235 }else {
1236 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1237 if (!parse_int2(node_str, default_value)) {
1238 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1239 }else if( default_value.x<=0 || default_value.y<=0 ){
1240 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than 0.");
1241 }
1242 }
1243}
1244
1245
1246void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetDistribution(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, distribution& distribution) {
1247 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1248 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1249 if (parent != "helios") {
1250 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1251 }
1252 pugi::xml_node node;
1253 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1254 if( node.empty() ){
1255 std::cout << "WARNING: No distribution given for '" << name << "'. Using default distribution of N/A." << std::endl;
1256 distribution.flag = -1;
1257 }else {
1258 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1259 if (!parse_distribution(node_str, distribution)) {
1260 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1261 }
1262 }
1263}
1264
1265
1266void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetDistribution(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, distribution& distribution) {
1267 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1268 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1269 if (parent != "helios") {
1270 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1271 }
1272 pugi::xml_node node;
1273 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1274 if (!node){
1275 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1276 }
1277 std::string dist_type;
1278 std::string param_1;
1279 std::string param_2;
1280 std::string repeat;
1281 if (distribution.flag == 0){
1282 dist_type = "normal";
1283 param_1 = std::to_string(distribution.dist.normal->mean());
1284 param_2 = std::to_string(distribution.dist.normal->stddev());
1285 repeat = std::to_string(distribution.repeat);
1286 } else if (distribution.flag == 1){
1287 dist_type = "uniform";
1288 param_1 = std::to_string(distribution.dist.uniform->a());
1289 param_2 = std::to_string(distribution.dist.uniform->b());
1290 repeat = std::to_string(distribution.repeat);
1291 } else if (distribution.flag == 2){
1292 dist_type = "weibull";
1293 param_1 = std::to_string(distribution.dist.weibull->a());
1294 param_2 = std::to_string(distribution.dist.weibull->b());
1295 repeat = std::to_string(distribution.repeat);
1296 } else if (distribution.flag == -1){
1297 dist_type = "N/A";
1298 param_1 = "0";
1299 param_2 = "0";
1300 repeat = "0";
1301 }
1302 node.text().set((dist_type + " " + param_1 + " " + param_2 + " " + repeat).c_str());
1303}
1304
1305
1306bool parse_distribution( const std::string &input_string, distribution &converted_distribution ){
1307 std::istringstream vecstream(input_string);
1308 std::vector<std::string> tmp_s(4);
1309 vecstream >> tmp_s[0];
1310 vecstream >> tmp_s[1];
1311 vecstream >> tmp_s[2];
1312 vecstream >> tmp_s[3];
1313 std::string dist_type;
1314 std::vector<float> dist_params = {0.0, 0.0};
1315 int repeat = 0;
1316 if (!parse_float(tmp_s[1], dist_params[0]) || !parse_float(tmp_s[2], dist_params[1]) || !parse_int(tmp_s[3], repeat) ) {
1317 return false;
1318 }
1319 distUnion dist{};
1320 if (dist_type == "normal"){
1321 dist.normal = new std::normal_distribution<float>;
1322 *dist.normal = std::normal_distribution<float>(dist_params[0], dist_params[1]);
1323 converted_distribution.dist = dist;
1324 converted_distribution.flag = 0;
1325 converted_distribution.repeat = (bool) repeat;
1326 } else if (dist_type == "uniform"){
1327 dist.uniform = new std::uniform_real_distribution<float>;
1328 *dist.uniform = std::uniform_real_distribution<float>(dist_params[0], dist_params[1]);
1329 converted_distribution.dist = dist;
1330 converted_distribution.flag = 1;
1331 converted_distribution.repeat = (bool) repeat;
1332 } else if (dist_type == "weibull"){
1333 dist.weibull = new std::weibull_distribution<float>;
1334 *dist.weibull = std::weibull_distribution<float>(dist_params[0], dist_params[1]);
1335 converted_distribution.dist = dist;
1336 converted_distribution.flag = 2;
1337 converted_distribution.repeat = (bool) repeat;
1338 } else{
1339 converted_distribution.flag = -1;
1340 }
1341 return true;
1342}
1343
1344
1345void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<vec2>& default_vec){
1346 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1347 pugi::xml_node node;
1348 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1349 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1350 if( node.empty() ){
1351 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'.";
1352 } else {
1353 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1354 vec2 default_value;
1355 if (!parse_vec2(node_str, default_value)) {
1356 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1357 }
1358 // else if( default_value.x<=0 || default_value.y<=0 ){
1359 // helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than 0.");
1360 // }
1361 else{
1362 default_vec.push_back(default_value);
1363 }
1364 }
1365 }
1366}
1367
1368
1369void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<vec3>& default_vec){
1370 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1371 pugi::xml_node node;
1372 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1373 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1374 if( node.empty() ){
1375 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'.";
1376 } else {
1377 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1378 vec3 default_value;
1379 if (!parse_vec3(node_str, default_value)) {
1380 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1381 }else{
1382 default_vec.push_back(default_value);
1383 }
1384 }
1385 }
1386}

1389void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<std::string>& default_vec){
1390 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1391 pugi::xml_node node;
1392 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1393 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1394 if( node.empty() ){
1395 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'.";
1396 } else {
1397 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1398 std::string default_value = node_str;
1399 default_vec.push_back(default_value);
1400 }
1401 }
1402}

1405void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<float>& default_vec){

1407 pugi::xml_node node;
1408 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1409 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1410 if( node.empty() ){
1411 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'.";
1412 } else {
1413 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1414 float default_value;
1415 if (!parse_float(node_str, default_value)) {
1416 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1417 }else if( default_value<0 ){
1418 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than or equal to 0.");
1419 }else{
1420 default_vec.push_back(default_value);
1421 }
1422 }

1431 node = p.child(name.c_str());

1433 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'.";
1434 } else {
1435 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1436 int default_value;
1437 if (!parse_int(node_str, default_value)) {
1438 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1439 }else if( default_value<0 ){
1440 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' must be greater than or equal to 0.");
1441 }else{
1442 default_vec.push_back(default_value);
1443 }

1471void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<helios::RGBcolor>& default_vec){
1472 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1473 pugi::xml_node node;
1474 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(parent.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1475 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1476 if( node.empty() ){
1477 std::cout << "WARNING: No value given for '" << name << "'.";
1478 } else {
1479 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1480 helios::RGBcolor default_value;
1481 if (!parse_RGBcolor(node_str, default_value)) {
1482 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1483 }else{
1484 default_vec.push_back(default_value);
1485 }
1486 }
1487 }

1489
1490
1491void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<std::vector<vec3>>& default_vec){
1492 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1493 pugi::xml_node p_;
1494 if (parent != "helios") {
1495 p_ = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1496 }else{
1497 p_ = helios;
1498 }
1499 for (pugi::xml_node p = p_; p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1500 std::vector<vec3> curr_vec = {};
1501 for (pugi::xml_node node = p.child(name.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(name.c_str())){
1502 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1503 vec3 default_value;
1504 if (!parse_vec3(node_str, default_value)) {
1505 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1506 }else{
1507 curr_vec.push_back(default_value);
1508 }
1509 }
1510 default_vec.push_back(curr_vec);
1511 }
1512}
1513
1514
1515void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::vector<std::set<std::string>>& default_vec){
1516 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1517 pugi::xml_node p_;
1518 if (parent != "helios") {
1519 p_ = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1520 }else{
1521 p_ = helios;
1522 }
1523 for (pugi::xml_node p = p_; p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1524 std::set<std::string> curr_vec = {};
1525 for (pugi::xml_node node = p.child(name.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(name.c_str())){
1526 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1527 std::string default_value;
1528 if ( node.empty() ) {
1529 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1530 }else{
1531 default_value = node_str;
1532 curr_vec.insert(default_value);
1533 }
1534 }
1535 default_vec.push_back(curr_vec);
1536 }
1537}
1538
1539
1540void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::set<std::string>& default_set){
1541 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1542 pugi::xml_node p_;
1543 if (parent != "helios") {
1544 p_ = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1545 }else{
1546 p_ = helios;
1547 }
1548 for (pugi::xml_node p = p_; p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1549 for (pugi::xml_node node = p.child(name.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(name.c_str())){
1550 const char *node_str = node.child_value();
1551 std::string default_value;
1552 if ( node.empty() ) {
1553 helios_runtime_error("ERROR: Value given for '" + name + "' could not be parsed.");
1554 }else{
1555 default_value = node_str;
1556 default_set.insert(default_value);
1557 }
1558 }
1559 }
1560}
1561
1562
1563void ProjectBuilder::setNodeLabels(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::set<std::string>& labels_vec){
1564 int i = 0;
1565 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1566
1567 std::set<pugi::xml_node> curr_nodes_set;
1568 for (pugi::xml_node node = helios.child(parent.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1569 curr_nodes_set.insert(node);
1570 }
1571 for (auto node : curr_nodes_set){
1572 node.parent().remove_child(node);
1573 }
1574
1575 std::map<std::string, int> labels_dict = {};
1576 for (auto new_node_label : labels_vec){
1577 pugi::xml_node new_node = helios.append_child(parent.c_str());
1578 pugi::xml_attribute node_label = new_node.attribute(name.c_str());
1579 node_label.set_value(new_node_label.c_str());
1580 new_node.append_attribute(name.c_str()).set_value(new_node_label.c_str());
1581 }
1582
1583 return;
1584}
1585
1586
1587void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, int &default_value) {
1588 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1589 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1590 if (parent != "helios") {
1591 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1592 }
1593 pugi::xml_node node;
1594 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1595 if (!node){
1596 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1597 }
1598 node.text().set(std::to_string(default_value).c_str());
1599}

1601void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, float &default_value) {
1602 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1603 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1604 if (parent != "helios") {
1605 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1606 }
1607 pugi::xml_node node;
1608 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1609 if (!node){
1610 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1611 }
1612 node.text().set(std::to_string(default_value).c_str());
1613}
1614
1615void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::string &default_value) {
1616 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1617 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1618 if (parent != "helios") {
1619 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1620 }
1621 pugi::xml_node node;
1622 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1623 if (!node){
1624 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1625 }
1626 node.text().set(default_value.c_str());
1627}
1628
1629void ProjectBuilder::xmlRemoveField(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent) {
1630 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1631 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1632 if (parent != "helios") {
1633 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1634 }
1635 pugi::xml_node node;
1636 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1637 if (node){
1638 p.remove_child(name.c_str());
1639 }
1640}
1641
1642void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, int2 &default_value) {
1643 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1644 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1645 if (parent != "helios") {
1646 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1647 }
1648 pugi::xml_node node;
1649 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1650 if (!node){
1651 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1652 }
1653 node.text().set(vec_to_string(default_value).c_str());
1654}
1655
1656void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, vec2 &default_value) {
1657 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1658 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1659 if (parent != "helios") {
1660 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1661 }
1662 pugi::xml_node node;
1663 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1664 if (!node){
1665 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1666 }
1667 node.text().set(vec_to_string(default_value).c_str());
1668}
1669
1670void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValue(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, vec3 &default_value) {
1671 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1672 pugi::xml_node p = helios;
1673 if (parent != "helios") {
1674 p = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1675 }
1676 pugi::xml_node node;
1677 node = p.child(name.c_str());
1678 if (!node){
1679 node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1680 }
1681 node.text().set(vec_to_string(default_value).c_str());
1682}
1683
1684
1685void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<vec2>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1686 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1687
1688 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1689 pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str());
1690 if (!node){
1691 node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1692 }
1693 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1694 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1695 node.text().set(vec_to_string(values_vec[idx]).c_str());
1696 }
1697}
1698
1699
1700void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<vec3>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1701 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1702
1703 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1704 pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str());
1705 if (!node){
1706 node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1707 }
1708 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1709 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1710 node.text().set(vec_to_string(values_vec[idx]).c_str());
1711 }
1712}
1713
1714
1715void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<helios::RGBcolor>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1716 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1717
1718 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1719 pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str());
1720 if (!node){
1721 node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1722 }
1723 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1724 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1725 helios::vec3 default_values_vec;
1726 default_values_vec.x = values_vec[idx].r;
1727 default_values_vec.y = values_vec[idx].g;
1728 default_values_vec.z = values_vec[idx].b;
1729 node.text().set(vec_to_string(default_values_vec).c_str());
1730 }
1731}
1732
1733
1734void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<int2>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1735 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1736
1737 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1738 pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str());
1739 if (!node){
1740 node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1741 }
1742 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1743 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1744 node.text().set(vec_to_string(values_vec[idx]).c_str());
1745 }
1746}

1749void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<std::string>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){

1764void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<int>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1765 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1766
1767 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1768 pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str());
1769 if (!node){
1770 node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1771 }
1772 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1773 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1774 node.text().set(std::to_string(values_vec[idx]).c_str());
1775 }
1776}
