1778
1779void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<float>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1780 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1781
1782 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1783 pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str());
1784 if (!node){
1785 node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1786 }
1787 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1788 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1789 node.text().set(std::to_string(values_vec[idx]).c_str());
1790 }
1791}
1792
1793
1794void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<std::vector<vec3>>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1795 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1796
1797 for (pugi::xml_node p = helios.child(node_name.c_str()); p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1798 std::vector<pugi::xml_node> remove = {};
1799 for (pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(field_name.c_str())){
1800 remove.push_back(node);
1801 }
1802 for (pugi::xml_node &node : remove){
1803 p.remove_child(node);
1804 }
1805 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1806 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1807 for (int j = 0; j < values_vec[idx].size(); j++){
1808 // p.append_child(name.c_str()).set_value(vec_to_string(default_vec[i][j]).c_str());
1809 pugi::xml_node new_node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1810 new_node.text().set(vec_to_string(values_vec[idx][j]).c_str());
1811 }
1812 }
1813}
1814
1815
1816void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& field_name, const std::string& node_name, std::vector<std::set<std::string>>& values_vec, std::map<std::string, int>& node_map){
1817 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1818 int i = 0;
1819 pugi::xml_node p_;
1820 if (node_name != "helios") {
1821 p_ = helios.child(node_name.c_str());
1822 }else{
1823 p_ = helios;
1824 }
1825 for (pugi::xml_node p = p_; p; p = p.next_sibling(node_name.c_str())){
1826 std::vector<pugi::xml_node> remove{};
1827 for (pugi::xml_node node = p.child(field_name.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(field_name.c_str())){
1828 remove.push_back(node);
1829 }
1830 for (pugi::xml_node &node : remove){
1831 p.remove_child(node);
1832 }
1833 pugi::xml_attribute label = p.attribute("label");
1834 int idx = node_map[label.as_string()];
1835 for (std::string s : values_vec[idx]){
1836 // p.append_child(name.c_str()).set_value(s.c_str());
1837 pugi::xml_node new_node = p.append_child(field_name.c_str());
1838 new_node.text().set(s.c_str());
1839 }
1840 }
1841} // TODO: test this function
1842
1843
1844void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(const std::string& name, const std::string& parent, std::set<std::string>& default_set){
1845 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
1846 int i = 0;
1847 pugi::xml_node p_;
1848 if (parent != "helios") {
1849 p_ = helios.child(parent.c_str());
1850 }else{
1851 p_ = helios;
1852 }
1853 for (pugi::xml_node p = p_; p; p = p.next_sibling(parent.c_str())){
1854 std::vector<pugi::xml_node> remove{};
1855 for (pugi::xml_node node = p.child(name.c_str()); node; node = node.next_sibling(name.c_str())){
1856 remove.push_back(node);
1857 }
1858 for (pugi::xml_node &node : remove){
1859 p.remove_child(node);
1860 }
1861 for (std::string s : default_set){
1862 // p.append_child(name.c_str()).set_value(s.c_str());
1863 pugi::xml_node new_node = p.append_child(name.c_str());
1864 new_node.text().set(s.c_str());
1865 }
1866 i++;
1867 }
1868} // TODO: test this function
1869
1870
1871void ProjectBuilder::visualize(){
1872 if (!built){
1873 std::cout << "Project must be built before running visualize." << std::endl;
1874 return;
1875 }
1876 // if (enable_visualizer){
1877 #ifdef ENABLE_HELIOS_VISUALIZER
1878 visualizer = new Visualizer(800);
1879 // #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
1880 // radiation->enableCameraModelVisualization();
1881 // #endif //RADIATION_MODEL
1882 visualizer->buildContextGeometry(context);
1883
1884 // Uncomment below for interactive
1885 // visualizer.plotInteractive();
1886
1887 visualizer->addCoordinateAxes(helios::make_vec3(0,0,0.05), helios::make_vec3(1,1,1), "positive");
1888 visualizer->plotUpdate();
1889
1890 // Setup Dear ImGui context
1891 IMGUI_CHECKVERSION();
1892 ImGui::CreateContext();
1893 ImGuiIO& io = ImGui::GetIO();
1894 // ImFont* font_awesome = io.Fonts->AddFontFromFileTTF("plugins/visualizer/fonts/FontAwesome.ttf", 16.0f);
1895 ImFont* arial = io.Fonts->AddFontFromFileTTF("plugins/visualizer/fonts/Arial.ttf", 16.0f);
1896 io.Fonts->Build();
1897 // ImGui::PushFont(arial);
1898 io.FontDefault = arial;
1899 io.ConfigFlags |= ImGuiConfigFlags_NavEnableKeyboard; // Enable Keyboard Controls
1900 io.ConfigFlags |= ImGuiConfigFlags_NavEnableGamepad; // Enable Gamepad Controls
1901
1902 // void* window;
1903
1904 // glfwShowWindow((GLFWwindow *) window);
1905
1906 // GLFWwindow* window = glfwCreateWindow(640, 480, "My Title", nullptr, nullptr);
1907 GLFWwindow* window = (GLFWwindow *)visualizer->getWindow();
1908
1909 glfwShowWindow(window);
1910
1911 bool show_demo_window = false;
1912 bool my_tool_active = true;
1913 // bool user_input = false;
1914
1915 // Setup Platform/Renderer backends
1916 ImGui_ImplGlfw_InitForOpenGL(window, true);
1917 ImGui_ImplOpenGL3_Init();
1918 // glfwSwapInterval(1); // enable V-Sync
1919
1920 ImVec2 current_position;
1921 ImVec2 last_position;
1922 bool currently_collapsed;
1923 bool previously_collapsed = false;
1924 std::string current_tab = "General";
1925 std::string previous_tab = "General";
1926
1927 // (Your code calls glfwPollEvents())
1928 // ...
1929 // Start the Dear ImGui frame
1930
1931 bool switch_visualization = false;
1932
1933 std::string current_cam_position = "0";
1934 while ( glfwGetKey(window, GLFW_KEY_ESCAPE ) != GLFW_PRESS && glfwWindowShouldClose((GLFWwindow*)window) == 0 ) {
1935 glfwPollEvents();
1936 ImGui_ImplOpenGL3_NewFrame();
1937 ImGui_ImplGlfw_NewFrame();
1938 ImGui::NewFrame();
1939 // ImGui::ShowDemoWindow(&show_demo_window); // Show demo window! :)
1940
1941 // glfwSetKeyCallback(window, key_callback);
1942
1943 // Check for key press or mouse movement
1944 // if (glfwGetKey(window, GLFW_KEY_ESCAPE) == GLFW_PRESS ||
1945 // glfwGetMouseButton(window, GLFW_MOUSE_BUTTON_LEFT) == GLFW_PRESS) {
1946 // user_input = true;
1947 // }
1948
1949 // if (ImGui::IsKeyDown(ImGuiKey_Q)) {
1950 // user_input = true;
1951 // }
1952 //
1953 // if (user_input)
1954 // visualizer->plotUpdate();
1955
1956 user_input = false;
1957 ImGuiWindowFlags window_flags = ImGuiWindowFlags_MenuBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMove | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize;
1958 ImGuiWindowFlags window_flags2 = ImGuiWindowFlags_MenuBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize;
1959
1960 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(500, 400));
1961 // ImVec2 windowSize = ImGui::GetWindowSize();
1962 int windowSize_x = 0;
1963 int windowSize_y = 0;
1964 // visualizer->getWindowSize(windowSize_x, windowSize_y);
1965 glfwGetWindowSize((GLFWwindow*)window, &windowSize_x, &windowSize_y );
1966 int2 windowSize(windowSize_x, windowSize_y);
1967 // TEST
1968 glm::mat4 perspectiveTransformationMatrix = visualizer->getPerspectiveTransformationMatrix();
1969 glm::vec4 origin_position;
1970 std::string current_label;
1971 if (ImGui::IsMouseDown(ImGuiMouseButton_Left) &&
1972 !ImGui::IsWindowHovered(ImGuiHoveredFlags_AnyWindow | ImGuiHoveredFlags_AllowWhenBlockedByActiveItem)){
1973 currently_dragging = "";
1974 disable_dragging = true;
1975 }
1976 if (!ImGui::IsMouseDown(ImGuiMouseButton_Left)){
1977 if (!currently_dragging.empty()){
1978 // ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();
1979 // float ndcX = (2.0f * mouse_pos.x / windowSize.x) - 1.0f;
1980 // float ndcY = 1.0f - (2.0f * mouse_pos.y / windowSize.y);
1981 // std::vector<vec3> camera_lookat_pos = visualizer->getCameraPosition();
1982 // vec3 camera_pos = camera_lookat_pos[0];
1983 // vec3 lookat_pos = camera_lookat_pos[1];
1984 // float depth = (camera_pos - lookat_pos).magnitude();
1985 // glm::vec4 clip_pos(ndcX, ndcY, depth, 1.0f);
1986 // glm::vec4 view_pos = glm::inverse(perspectiveTransformationMatrix) * clip_pos;
1987 // view_pos /= view_pos.w;
1988 // glm::mat4 viewMatrix = visualizer->getViewMatrix();
1989 // glm::vec4 world_pos = glm::inverse(viewMatrix) * view_pos;
1990 // glm::vec3 final_pos = glm::vec3(world_pos.x, world_pos.y, world_pos.z);
1991 ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();
1992 std::vector<vec3> camera_lookat_pos = visualizer->getCameraPosition();
1993 vec3 camera_pos = camera_lookat_pos[0];
1994 vec3 lookat_pos = camera_lookat_pos[1];
1995 float drag_distance = std::sqrt(std::pow(mouse_pos.x - dragging_start_position.x, 2) +
1996 std::pow(mouse_pos.y - dragging_start_position.y, 2));;
1997 float depth = (camera_pos - lookat_pos).magnitude();
1998 vec3 view_dir = (camera_pos - lookat_pos).normalize();
1999
2000 vec3 world_up = vec3(0, 1, 0);
2001
2002 vec3 right_dir = cross(world_up, view_dir);
2003 right_dir = right_dir.normalize();
2004
2005 vec3 up_dir = cross(view_dir, right_dir).normalize();
2006
2007 right_dir = cross(view_dir, world_up).normalize();
2008 float base_offset = 0.001f;
2009 float offset = base_offset * depth;
2010
2011 if (currently_dragging_type == "canopy"){
2012 canopy_dict[currently_dragging].origin += drag_distance * offset * (up_dir + right_dir);
2013 } else if (currently_dragging_type == "rig"){
2014 camera_positions[rig_dict[currently_dragging]] += drag_distance * offset * (up_dir + right_dir);
2015 }
2016 }
2017 currently_dragging = "";
2018 disable_dragging = false;
2019 dragging_start_position = int2(0, 0);
2020 }
2021 int object_window_count = 0;
2022 for (auto current_label : canopy_labels_set){
2023 vec3 canopy_origin_ = canopy_dict[current_label].origin;
2024 origin_position = glm::vec4(canopy_origin_.x, canopy_origin_.y, canopy_origin_.z, 1.0);
2025 origin_position = perspectiveTransformationMatrix * origin_position;
2026 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10), ImGuiCond_Always);
2027 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10));
2028 ImVec2 next_window_pos = ImVec2(((origin_position.x / origin_position.w) * 0.5f + 0.5f) * windowSize.x,
2029 (1.0f - ((origin_position.y / origin_position.w) * 0.5f + 0.5f)) * windowSize.y);
2030 // WINDOW MOUSE CLICK AND DRAG
2031 // TODO: re-enable this feature when it is improved
2032 // ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();
2033 // bool drag_window = (mouse_pos.x >= next_window_pos.x && mouse_pos.x <= next_window_pos.x + 150 &&
2034 // mouse_pos.y >= next_window_pos.y && mouse_pos.y <= next_window_pos.y + 10);
2035 // if (drag_window && ImGui::IsMouseDown(ImGuiMouseButton_Left) && currently_dragging.empty() && !disable_dragging){
2036 // currently_dragging = current_label;
2037 // currently_dragging_type = "canopy";
2038 // dragging_start_position = int2(mouse_pos.x, mouse_pos.y);
2039 // }
2040 // if (!disable_dragging && currently_dragging == current_label){
2041 // ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(mouse_pos);
2042 // } else{
2043 ImGui::SetNextWindowCollapsed(true, ImGuiCond_Once);
2044 ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(next_window_pos);
2045 // }
2046 ImGui::Begin((current_label + "###" + std::to_string(object_window_count)).c_str(), nullptr, //&my_tool_active,
2047 ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed() ? 0 : ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize);
2048 if (ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed()){
2049 ImGui::SetWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10));
2050 }
2051 canopyTab(current_label, object_window_count);
2052 ImGui::End();
2053 object_window_count++;
2054 }
2055 for (auto current_label : rig_labels_set){
2056 vec3 camera_position_ = camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_label]][0];
2057 origin_position = glm::vec4(camera_position_.x, camera_position_.y, camera_position_.z, 1.0);
2058 origin_position = perspectiveTransformationMatrix * origin_position;
2059 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10), ImGuiCond_Always);
2060 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10));
2061 ImVec2 next_window_pos = ImVec2(((origin_position.x / origin_position.w) * 0.5f + 0.5f) * windowSize.x,
2062 (1.0f - ((origin_position.y / origin_position.w) * 0.5f + 0.5f)) * windowSize.y);
2063 // WINDOW MOUSE CLICK AND DRAG
2064 // TODO: re-enable this feature when it is improved
2065 // ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();
2066 // bool drag_window = (mouse_pos.x >= next_window_pos.x && mouse_pos.x <= next_window_pos.x + 150 &&
2067 // mouse_pos.y >= next_window_pos.y && mouse_pos.y <= next_window_pos.y + 10);
2068 // if (drag_window && ImGui::IsMouseDown(ImGuiMouseButton_Left) && currently_dragging.empty() && !disable_dragging){
2069 // currently_dragging = current_label;
2070 // currently_dragging_type = "rig";
2071 // dragging_start_position = int2(mouse_pos.x, mouse_pos.y);
2072 // }
2073 // if (!disable_dragging && currently_dragging == current_label){
2074 // ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(mouse_pos);
2075 // } else{
2076 ImGui::SetNextWindowCollapsed(true, ImGuiCond_Once);
2077 ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(next_window_pos);
2078 // }
2079 ImGui::Begin((current_label + "###" + std::to_string(object_window_count)).c_str(), nullptr, // &my_tool_active,
2080 ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed() ? 0 : ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize);
2081 if (ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed()){
2082 ImGui::SetWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10));
2083 }
2084 rigTab(current_label, object_window_count);
2085 ImGui::End();
2086 object_window_count++;
2087 }
2088 for (std::string obj_name : obj_names_set){
2089 current_label = obj_name;
2090 vec3 obj_position_ = objects_dict[current_label].position;
2091 origin_position = glm::vec4(obj_position_.x, obj_position_.y, obj_position_.z, 1.0);
2092 origin_position = perspectiveTransformationMatrix * origin_position;
2093 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10), ImGuiCond_Always);
2094 // ImGui::SetNextWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10));
2095 ImVec2 next_window_pos = ImVec2(((origin_position.x / origin_position.w) * 0.5f + 0.5f) * windowSize.x,
2096 (1.0f - ((origin_position.y / origin_position.w) * 0.5f + 0.5f)) * windowSize.y);
2097 // WINDOW MOUSE CLICK AND DRAG
2098 // TODO: re-enable this feature when it is improved
2099 // ImVec2 mouse_pos = ImGui::GetMousePos();
2100 // bool drag_window = (mouse_pos.x >= next_window_pos.x && mouse_pos.x <= next_window_pos.x + 150 &&
2101 // mouse_pos.y >= next_window_pos.y && mouse_pos.y <= next_window_pos.y + 10);
2102 // if (drag_window && ImGui::IsMouseDown(ImGuiMouseButton_Left) && currently_dragging.empty() && !disable_dragging){
2103 // currently_dragging = current_label;
2104 // currently_dragging_type = "object";
2105 // dragging_start_position = int2(mouse_pos.x, mouse_pos.y);
2106 // }
2107 // if (!disable_dragging && currently_dragging == current_label){
2108 // ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(mouse_pos);
2109 // } else{
2110 ImGui::SetNextWindowCollapsed(true, ImGuiCond_Once);
2111 ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(next_window_pos);
2112 // }
2113 ImGui::Begin((current_label + "###" + std::to_string(object_window_count)).c_str(), nullptr, // &my_tool_active,
2114 ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed() ? 0 : ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize);
2115 if (ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed()){
2116 ImGui::SetWindowSize(ImVec2(150, 10));
2117 }
2118 objectTab(current_label, object_window_count);
2119 ImGui::End();
2120 object_window_count++;
2121 }
2122 //
2123 ImGui::SetNextWindowCollapsed(false, ImGuiCond_Once);
2124 ImGui::Begin("Editor", nullptr, window_flags2); // Begin editor window
2125 // ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(ImVec2(windowSize.x - 400.0f, 0), ImGuiCond_Always); // flag -> can't move window with mouse
2126 // ImGui::SetNextWindowPos(ImVec2(windowSize.x - 400.0f, 0), ImGuiCond_Always);
2127 current_position = ImGui::GetWindowPos();
2128 currently_collapsed = ImGui::IsWindowCollapsed();
2129
2130 if (current_tab != previous_tab || current_position.x != last_position.x || current_position.y != last_position.y || currently_collapsed != previously_collapsed) {
2131 user_input = true;
2132 previous_tab = current_tab;
2133 }
2134 if (ImGui::BeginMenuBar()){
2135 if (ImGui::BeginMenu("File")){
2136 if (ImGui::MenuItem("Open..", "Ctrl+O")){
2137 std::string file_name = file_dialog();
2138 if (!file_name.empty()){
2139 xmlGetValues(file_name);
2140 }
2141 }
2142 if (ImGui::MenuItem("Save XML", "Ctrl+S")){
2143 xmlSetValues();
2144 }
2145 if (ImGui::MenuItem("Save As", "Ctrl+S")){
2146 std::string new_xml_file = save_as_file_dialog(std::vector<std::string>{"XML"});
2147 if (!new_xml_file.empty()){
2148 std::string file_extension = new_xml_file;
2149 size_t last_obj_file = file_extension.rfind('.');
2150 if (last_obj_file != std::string::npos){
2151 file_extension = file_extension.substr(last_obj_file + 1);
2152 }
2153 if (file_extension == "xml"){
2154 if (!std::filesystem::exists(new_xml_file)){
2155 // Create file
2156 std::filesystem::copy(xml_input_file, new_xml_file, std::filesystem::copy_options::overwrite_existing);
2157 }
2158 // Change XML input file
2159 std::string xml_input_file_ = xml_input_file;
2160 pugi::xml_node helios_ = helios;
2161 xml_input_file = new_xml_file;
2162 if( !open_xml_file(xml_input_file, xmldoc, xml_error_string) ) {
2163 helios_runtime_error(xml_error_string);
2164 }
2165 xmlSetValues();
2166 // Change XML input file back to original
2167 // xml_input_file = xml_input_file_;
2168 // helios = helios_;
2169 // if( !open_xml_file(xml_input_file, xmldoc, xml_error_string) ) {
2170 // helios_runtime_error(xml_error_string);
2171 // }
2172 } else{
2173 // Needs to be a obj or ply file
2174 std::cout << "Not a valid file type. Project must be saved to a XML file." << std::endl;
2175 }
2176 } else{
2177 // Not a valid file
2178 std::cout << "Not a valid file." << std::endl;
2179 }
2180 }

2182 ImGui::EndMenu();
2183 }

2185 // ImGui::PushFont(font_awesome);
2186 // io.FontDefault = font_awesome;

2202 if (switch_visualization){

2206 visualizer->plotUpdate();

2211 visualizer->enableColorbar();

2213 }else{
2214 visualizer->clearColor();
2215 visualizer->disableColorbar();
2216 visualizer->addCoordinateAxes(helios::make_vec3(0,0,0.05), helios::make_vec3(1,1,1), "positive");
2217 }
2218 visualizer->buildContextGeometry(context);
2219 visualizer->plotUpdate();
2220 switch_visualization = false;
2221 }

2223 }

2378 if (is_weather_file_csv){
2379 ImGui::Text("CSV");
2380 weather_file = &csv_weather_file;
2381 prev_weather_file = csv_weather_file;
2382 } else{
2383 ImGui::Text("CIMIS");
2384 weather_file = &cimis_weather_file;
2385 prev_weather_file = cimis_weather_file;
2386 }

2392 try{
2393 if (is_weather_file_csv){
2394 context->loadTabularTimeseriesData(*weather_file, {}, ",", "YYYYMMDD", 1 );
2395 } else{
2396 context->loadTabularTimeseriesData(*weather_file, {"CIMIS"}, ",");
2397 }
2398 } catch(...) {
2399 std::cout << "Failed to load weather file: " << *weather_file << std::endl;
2400 *weather_file = prev_weather_file;
2401 }
2402 } else{
2403 *weather_file = prev_weather_file;
2404 }
2405 }
2406 ImGui::SameLine();
2407 std::string shorten_weather_file = *weather_file;
2408 for (char &c : shorten_weather_file){
2409 if (c == '\\'){
2410 c = '/';
2411 }
2412 }
2413 size_t last_weather_file = shorten_weather_file.rfind('/');
2414 if (last_weather_file != std::string::npos){
2415 shorten_weather_file = shorten_weather_file.substr(last_weather_file + 1);
2416 }
2417 ImGui::Text("%s", shorten_weather_file.c_str());

2540 // OBJECT TAB
2541 if (ImGui::BeginTabItem("Object")){
2542 current_tab = "Object";
2543 if (ImGui::Button("Load Object File")){
2544 std::string new_obj_file = file_dialog();
2545 if ( !new_obj_file.empty() && std::filesystem::exists(new_obj_file) ){
2546 if( std::filesystem::path(new_obj_file).extension() != ".obj" && std::filesystem::path(new_obj_file).extension() != ".ply" ){
2547 std::cout << "Object file must have .obj or .ply extension." << std::endl;
2548 } else{
2549 object new_obj;
2550 std::vector<uint> new_UUIDs;
2551 if( std::filesystem::path(new_obj_file).extension() == ".obj" ){
2552 new_UUIDs = context->loadOBJ(new_obj_file.c_str());
2553 } else if ( std::filesystem::path(new_obj_file).extension() == ".ply" ){
2554 new_UUIDs = context->loadPLY(new_obj_file.c_str());
2555 }
2556 // check for MTL file
2557 std::filesystem::path mtl_path(new_obj_file);
2558 mtl_path.replace_extension("mtl");
2559 if (std::filesystem::exists(mtl_path)){
2560 new_obj.use_texture_file = true;
2561 } else{
2562 new_obj.use_texture_file = false;
2563 }
2564 visualizer->buildContextGeometry(context);
2565 visualizer->plotUpdate();
2566 std::string default_object_label = "object";
2567 std::string new_obj_label = "object_0";
2568 int count = 0;
2569 while (objects_dict.find(new_obj_label) != objects_dict.end()){
2570 count++;
2571 new_obj_label = default_object_label + "_" + std::to_string(count);
2572 }
2573 obj_names_set.insert(new_obj_label);
2574 new_obj.index = obj_idx;
2575 obj_idx++;
2576 new_obj.name = new_obj_label;
2577 new_obj.file = new_obj_file;
2578 new_obj.UUIDs = new_UUIDs;
2579 new_obj.position = vec3(0,0,0);
2580 new_obj.prev_position = vec3(0,0,0);
2581 new_obj.orientation = vec3(0,0,0);
2582 new_obj.prev_orientation = vec3(0,0,0);
2583 new_obj.scale = vec3(1,1,1);
2584 new_obj.prev_scale = vec3(1,1,1);
2585 new_obj.color = RGBcolor(0, 0, 1);
2586 new_obj.prev_color = RGBcolor(0, 0, 1);
2587 new_obj.data_group = "";
2588 new_obj.is_dirty = false;
2589 current_obj = new_obj_label;
2590 objects_dict[new_obj_label] = new_obj;
2591 }
2592 }
2593 }
2594 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##obj_combo", current_obj.c_str())){
2595 for (std::string obj_name : obj_names_set){
2596 bool is_obj_selected = (current_obj == obj_name);
2597 if (ImGui::Selectable(obj_name.c_str(), is_obj_selected))
2598 current_obj = obj_name;
2599 if (is_obj_selected)
2600 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
2601 }
2602 ImGui::EndCombo();
2603 }
2604 ImGui::SameLine();
2605 ImGui::Text("Select Object");
2606 if ( !current_obj.empty() ){
2607 if (ImGui::Button("Update Object")){
2608 updateObject(current_obj);
2609 refreshVisualization();
2610 }
2611 ImGui::SameLine();
2612 if (ImGui::Button("Delete Object")){
2613 deleteObject(current_obj);
2614 }
2615 if (objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty){
2616 ImGui::SameLine();
2617 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255)); // Red text
2618 ImGui::Text("update required");
2619 ImGui::PopStyleColor();
2620 }
2621 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
2622 std::string prev_obj_name = objects_dict[current_obj].name;
2623 ImGui::InputText("##obj_name", &objects_dict[current_obj].name);
2624 if (objects_dict[current_obj].name != prev_obj_name && !objects_dict[current_obj].name.empty() && obj_names_set.find(objects_dict[current_obj].name) == obj_names_set.end()){
2625 object temp_obj = objects_dict[prev_obj_name];
2626 current_obj = objects_dict[current_obj].name;
2627 std::map<std::string, object>::iterator delete_obj_iter = objects_dict.find(prev_obj_name);
2628 if (delete_obj_iter != objects_dict.end()){
2629 objects_dict.erase(delete_obj_iter);
2630 }
2631 objects_dict[current_obj] = temp_obj;
2632 obj_names_set.erase(prev_obj_name);
2633 obj_names_set.insert(current_obj);
2634 } else {
2635 objects_dict[current_obj].name = prev_obj_name;
2636 }
2637 ImGui::SameLine();
2638 ImGui::Text("Object Name");
2639 if (!current_obj.empty()){
2640 // ####### OBJECT DATA GROUP ####### //
2641 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
2642 std::string prev_obj_data_group = objects_dict[current_obj].data_group;
2643 ImGui::InputText("##obj_data_group", &objects_dict[current_obj].data_group);
2644 if (objects_dict[current_obj].data_group == "All" || objects_dict[current_obj].data_group.empty()){
2645 objects_dict[current_obj].data_group = prev_obj_data_group;
2646 }
2647 if (!objects_dict[current_obj].data_group.empty() && prev_obj_data_group != objects_dict[current_obj].data_group){
2648 std::string new_data_group = objects_dict[current_obj].data_group;
2649 context->setPrimitiveData(objects_dict[current_obj].UUIDs, "data_group", new_data_group);
2650 }
2651 ImGui::SameLine();
2652 ImGui::Text("Data Group");
2653 bool use_obj_texture = objects_dict[current_obj].use_texture_file;
2654 toggle_button("##use_texture_file", &use_obj_texture);
2655 if (use_obj_texture != objects_dict[current_obj].use_texture_file){
2656 objects_dict[current_obj].use_texture_file = use_obj_texture;
2657 objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty = true;
2658 }
2659 ImGui::SameLine();
2660 if (!use_obj_texture){
2661 // ####### OBJECT COLOR ####### //
2662 float col[3];
2663 col[0] = objects_dict[current_obj].color.r;
2664 col[1] = objects_dict[current_obj].color.g;
2665 col[2] = objects_dict[current_obj].color.b;
2666 ImGui::ColorEdit3("##obj_color_edit", col);
2667 if (objects_dict[current_obj].color.r != col[0] ||
2668 objects_dict[current_obj].color.g != col[1] ||
2669 objects_dict[current_obj].color.b != col[2]){
2670 updateColor(current_obj, "obj", col);
2671 }
2672 ImGui::SameLine();
2673 ImGui::Text("Object Color");
2674 } else{
2675 // ####### OBJECT TEXTURE FILE ####### //
2676 ImGui::Text("Use Object Texture File");
2677 }
2678 // ####### OBJECT SCALE ####### //
2679 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2680 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_scale_x", &objects_dict[current_obj].scale.x);
2681 randomizePopup("obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].scale.x, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2682 randomizerParams("obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2683 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2684 ImGui::SameLine();
2685 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2686 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_scale_y", &objects_dict[current_obj].scale.y);
2687 randomizePopup("obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].scale.y, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2688 randomizerParams("obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2689 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2690 ImGui::SameLine();
2691 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2692 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_scale_z", &objects_dict[current_obj].scale.z);
2693 randomizePopup("obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].scale.z, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2694 randomizerParams("obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2695 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2696 ImGui::SameLine();
2697 ImGui::Text("Object Scale");
2698 // ####### OBJECT POSITION ####### //
2699 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2700 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_position_x", &objects_dict[current_obj].position.x);
2701 randomizePopup("obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].position.x, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2702 randomizerParams("obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2703 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2704 ImGui::SameLine();
2705 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2706 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_position_y", &objects_dict[current_obj].position.y);
2707 randomizePopup("obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].position.y, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2708 randomizerParams("obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2709 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2710 ImGui::SameLine();
2711 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2712 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_position_z", &objects_dict[current_obj].position.z);
2713 randomizePopup("obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].position.z, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2714 randomizerParams("obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2715 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2716 ImGui::SameLine();
2717 ImGui::Text("Object Position");
2718 // ####### OBJECT ORIENTATION ####### //
2719 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2720 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_orientation_x", &objects_dict[current_obj].orientation.x);
2721 randomizePopup("obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].orientation.x, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2722 randomizerParams("obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2723 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2724 ImGui::SameLine();
2725 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2726 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_orientation_y", &objects_dict[current_obj].orientation.y);
2727 randomizePopup("obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].orientation.y, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2728 randomizerParams("obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2729 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2730 ImGui::SameLine();
2731 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2732 ImGui::InputFloat("##obj_orientation_z", &objects_dict[current_obj].orientation.z);
2733 randomizePopup("obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[current_obj].orientation.z, &objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty));
2734 randomizerParams("obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index));
2735 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[current_obj].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2736 ImGui::SameLine();
2737 ImGui::Text("Object Orientation");
2738 }
2739 if (objects_dict[current_obj].position != objects_dict[current_obj].prev_position ||
2740 objects_dict[current_obj].orientation != objects_dict[current_obj].prev_orientation ||
2741 objects_dict[current_obj].scale != objects_dict[current_obj].prev_scale ||
2742 objects_dict[current_obj].color != objects_dict[current_obj].prev_color){
2743 objects_dict[current_obj].is_dirty = true;
2744 }
2745 }
2746 ImGui::EndTabItem();
2747 }
2748 // if (enable_plantarchitecture){
2749 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
2750 // CANOPY TAB
2751 if (ImGui::BeginTabItem("Canopy")){
2752 current_tab = "Canopy";
2753 dropDown("##canopy_combo", current_canopy, canopy_labels_set);
2754 ImGui::SameLine();
2755 if (ImGui::Button("Add Canopy")){
2756 addCanopy();
2757 }
2758 if (!current_canopy.empty()){
2759 if (ImGui::Button("Update Canopy")){
2760 updateCanopy(current_canopy);
2761 refreshVisualization();
2762 canopy_dict[current_canopy].is_dirty = false;
2763 }
2764 ImGui::SameLine();
2765 if (ImGui::Button("Delete Canopy")){
2766 deleteCanopy(current_canopy);
2767 updatePrimitiveTypes();
2768 refreshVisualization();
2769 }
2770 if (canopy_dict[current_canopy].is_dirty){
2771 ImGui::SameLine();
2772 ImGui::PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255)); // Red text
2773 ImGui::Text("update required");
2774 ImGui::PopStyleColor();
2775 }
2776 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
2777 std::string prev_canopy_name = canopy_dict[current_canopy].label;
2778 ImGui::InputText("##canopy_name", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].label);
2779 if (canopy_dict[current_canopy].label != prev_canopy_name && canopy_labels_set.find(canopy_dict[current_canopy].label) == canopy_labels_set.end() && !canopy_dict[current_canopy].label.empty()){
2780 canopy temp = canopy_dict[current_canopy];
2781 current_canopy = canopy_dict[prev_canopy_name].label;
2782 std::map<std::string, canopy>::iterator current_canopy_iter = canopy_dict.find(prev_canopy_name);
2783 if (current_canopy_iter != canopy_dict.end()){
2784 canopy_dict.erase(current_canopy_iter);
2785 }
2786 canopy_dict[current_canopy] = temp;
2787
2788 canopy_labels_set.erase(prev_canopy_name);
2789 canopy_labels_set.insert(current_canopy);
2790 } else{
2791 canopy_dict[current_canopy].label = prev_canopy_name;
2792 }
2793 ImGui::SameLine();
2794 ImGui::Text("Canopy Name");
2795 // ####### PLANT LIBRARY NAME ####### //
2796 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(250);
2797 // ImGui::InputText("Plant Library", &plant_library_names[canopy_labels_dict[current_canopy]]);
2798 std::string prev_lib = canopy_dict[current_canopy].library_name_verbose;
2799 dropDown("Plant Library###dropdown", canopy_dict[current_canopy].library_name_verbose, plant_types_verbose);
2800 if (canopy_dict[current_canopy].library_name_verbose != prev_lib) canopy_dict[current_canopy].is_dirty = true;
2801 canopy_dict[current_canopy].library_name = plant_type_lookup[canopy_dict[current_canopy].library_name_verbose];
2802 // ######### CANOPY DATA GROUP ####### //
2803 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
2804 std::string prev_canopy_data_group = canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group;
2805 ImGui::InputText("##canopy_data_group", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group);
2806 if (canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group == "All" || canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group.empty()){
2807 canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group = prev_canopy_data_group;
2808 }
2809 if (!canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group.empty() && prev_canopy_data_group != canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group){
2810 std::string new_data_group = canopy_dict[current_canopy].data_group;
2811 std::vector<uint> canopy_primID_vec;
2812 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_dict[current_canopy].IDs.size(); i++){
2813 std::vector<uint> new_canopy_primIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPlantUUIDs(canopy_dict[current_canopy].IDs[i]);
2814 canopy_primID_vec.insert(canopy_primID_vec.end(), new_canopy_primIDs.begin(), new_canopy_primIDs.end());
2815 }
2816 context->setPrimitiveData(canopy_primID_vec, "data_group", new_data_group);
2817 }
2818 ImGui::SameLine();
2819 ImGui::Text("Data Group");
2820 // ####### CANOPY ORIGIN ####### //
2821 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2822 ImGui::InputFloat("##canopy_origin_x", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin.x);
2823 randomizePopup("canopy_origin_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin.x));
2824 randomizerParams("canopy_origin_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2825 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_canopy_origin_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2826 ImGui::SameLine();
2827 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2828 ImGui::InputFloat("##canopy_origin_y", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin.y);
2829 randomizePopup("canopy_origin_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin.y));
2830 randomizerParams("canopy_origin_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2831 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_canopy_origin_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2832 ImGui::SameLine();
2833 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2834 ImGui::InputFloat("##canopy_origin_z", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin.z);
2835 randomizePopup("canopy_origin_z_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin.z));
2836 randomizerParams("canopy_origin_z_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2837 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_canopy_origin_z_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2838 ImGui::SameLine();
2839 ImGui::Text("Canopy Origin");
2840 // ####### PLANT COUNT ####### //
2841 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
2842 ImGui::InputInt("##plant_count_x", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.x);
2843 canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.x = std::max(canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.x, 1);
2844 randomizePopup("plant_count_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.x));
2845 randomizerParams("plant_count_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2846 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_plant_count_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2847 ImGui::SameLine();
2848 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
2849 ImGui::InputInt("##plant_count_y", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.y);
2850 canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.y = std::max(canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.y, 1);
2851 randomizePopup("plant_count_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_count.y));
2852 randomizerParams("plant_count_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2853 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_plant_count_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2854 ImGui::SameLine();
2855 ImGui::Text("Plant Count");
2856 // ####### PLANT SPACING ####### //
2857 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
2858 ImGui::InputFloat("##plant_spacing_x", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_spacing.x);
2859 randomizePopup("plant_spacing_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_spacing.x));
2860 randomizerParams("plant_spacing_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2861 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_plant_spacing_x_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2862 ImGui::SameLine();
2863 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
2864 ImGui::InputFloat("##plant_spacing_y", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_spacing.y);
2865 randomizePopup("plant_spacing_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].plant_spacing.y));
2866 randomizerParams("plant_spacing_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2867 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_plant_spacing_y_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2868 ImGui::SameLine();
2869 ImGui::Text("Plant Spacing");
2870 // ####### PLANT AGE ####### //
2871 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(80);
2872 ImGui::InputFloat("Plant Age", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].age);
2873 randomizePopup("plant_age_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].age));
2874 randomizerParams("plant_age_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2875 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_plant_age_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2876 // ####### GROUND CLIPPING HEIGHT ####### //
2877 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(80);
2878 ImGui::InputFloat("Ground Clipping Height", &canopy_dict[current_canopy].ground_clipping_height);
2879 randomizePopup("ground_clipping_height_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx), createTaggedPtr(&canopy_dict[current_canopy].ground_clipping_height));
2880 randomizerParams("ground_clipping_height_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx));
2881 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_ground_clipping_height_" + std::to_string(canopy_dict[current_canopy].idx)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2882 if (ImGui::Button("Save Canopy to OBJ/PLY File")){
2883 std::string new_obj_file = save_as_file_dialog(std::vector<std::string>{"OBJ", "PLY"});
2884 if (!new_obj_file.empty()){
2885 std::string file_extension = new_obj_file;
2886 size_t last_obj_file = file_extension.rfind('.');
2887 if (last_obj_file != std::string::npos){
2888 file_extension = file_extension.substr(last_obj_file + 1);
2889 }
2890 if (file_extension == "obj" || file_extension == "ply"){
2891 if (!std::filesystem::exists(new_obj_file)){
2892 // Create file
2893 std::ofstream outFile(new_obj_file);
2894 }
2895 if (!save_plants_individually){
2896 saveCanopy(new_obj_file, canopy_dict[current_canopy].IDs,
2897 canopy_dict[current_canopy].origin, file_extension);
2898 } else{
2899 saveCanopy(new_obj_file, canopy_dict[current_canopy].IDs,
2900 canopy_dict[current_canopy].individual_plant_locations, file_extension);
2901 }
2902 } else{
2903 // Needs to be a obj or ply file
2904 std::cout << "Not a valid file type. Object must be saved to .obj or .ply file." << std::endl;
2905 }
2906 } else{
2907 // Not a valid file
2908 std::cout << "Not a valid file." << std::endl;
2909 }
2910 }
2911 ImGui::SameLine();
2912 ImGui::Checkbox("Save plants individually", &save_plants_individually);
2913 }
2914 ImGui::EndTabItem();
2915 }
2916 // } //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
2917 #endif //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
2918 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
2919 if (enable_radiation){
2920 if (ImGui::BeginTabItem("Radiation")){
2921 current_tab = "Radiation";
2922 // LOAD XML LIBRARY FILE
2923 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2924 if (ImGui::Button("Load XML Library File")){
2925 std::string new_xml_library_file = file_dialog();
2926 if (!new_xml_library_file.empty() && std::filesystem::exists(new_xml_library_file)){
2927 if ( xml_library_files.find(new_xml_library_file) == xml_library_files.end() ){
2928 xml_library_files.insert(new_xml_library_file);
2929 std::vector<std::string> current_spectra_file = get_xml_node_values(new_xml_library_file, "label", "globaldata_vec2");
2930 for (int i = 0; i < current_spectra_file.size(); i++){
2931 possible_spectra.insert(current_spectra_file[i]);
2932 }
2933 }
2934 context->loadXML( new_xml_library_file.c_str() );
2935 }
2936 }
2937 // ####### GLOBAL PROPERTIES ####### //
2938 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.25f);
2939 ImGui::Text("Global Properties:");
2940 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
2941 // ####### ENFORCE PERIODIC BOUNDARY CONDITION ####### //
2942 ImGui::Text("Enforce Periodic Boundary Condition:");
2943 ImGui::SameLine();
2944 bool prev_cond_x = enforce_periodic_boundary_x;
2945 ImGui::Checkbox("x###periodic_boundary_x", &enforce_periodic_boundary_x);
2946 ImGui::SameLine();
2947 bool prev_cond_y = enforce_periodic_boundary_y;
2948 ImGui::Checkbox("y###periodic_boundary_y", &enforce_periodic_boundary_y);
2949 if (prev_cond_x != enforce_periodic_boundary_x || prev_cond_y != enforce_periodic_boundary_y){
2950 if (enforce_periodic_boundary_x && enforce_periodic_boundary_y)
2951 radiation->enforcePeriodicBoundary("xy");
2952 else if (enforce_periodic_boundary_x)
2953 radiation->enforcePeriodicBoundary("x");
2954 else if (enforce_periodic_boundary_y)
2955 radiation->enforcePeriodicBoundary("y");
2956 else
2957 radiation->enforcePeriodicBoundary("");
2958 }
2959 // ####### DIFFUSE EXTINCTION COEFFICIENT ####### //
2960 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2961 float prev_value = diffuse_extinction_coeff;
2962 ImGui::InputFloat("Diffuse Extinction Coefficient", &diffuse_extinction_coeff);
2963 if (prev_value != diffuse_extinction_coeff){
2964 context->setGlobalData( "diffuse_extinction_coeff", diffuse_extinction_coeff );
2965 }
2966 randomizePopup("diffuse_extinction_coeff", createTaggedPtr(&diffuse_extinction_coeff));
2967 randomizerParams("diffuse_extinction_coeff");
2968 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick("randomize_diffuse_extinction_coeff", ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2969 // ####### AIR TURBIDITY ####### //
2970 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
2971 prev_value = air_turbidity;
2972 ImGui::InputFloat("Air Turbidity", &air_turbidity);
2973 if (prev_value != air_turbidity){
2974 if( air_turbidity > 0 ){
2975 context->setGlobalData( "air_turbidity", air_turbidity );
2976 }else if( air_turbidity < 0 ){ //try calibration
2977 if( context->doesTimeseriesVariableExist( "net_radiation" ) ){
2978 air_turbidity = solarposition->calibrateTurbidityFromTimeseries( "net_radiation" );
2979 if( air_turbidity>0 && air_turbidity < 1 ){
2980 context->setGlobalData( "air_turbidity", air_turbidity );
2981 }
2982 }
2983 }
2984 }
2985 randomizePopup("air_turbidity", createTaggedPtr(&air_turbidity));
2986 randomizerParams("air_turbidity");
2987 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick("randomize_air_turbidity", ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
2988 // ####### SOLAR DIRECT SPECTRUM ####### //
2989 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(250);
2990 // ImGui::InputText("Solar Direct Spectrum", &solar_direct_spectrum);
2991 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##combo_solar_direct_spectrum", solar_direct_spectrum.c_str())){
2992 for (auto &spectra : possible_spectra){
2993 bool is_solar_direct_spectrum_selected = (solar_direct_spectrum == spectra);
2994 if (ImGui::Selectable(spectra.c_str(), is_solar_direct_spectrum_selected))
2995 solar_direct_spectrum = spectra;
2996 if (is_solar_direct_spectrum_selected)
2997 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
2998 }
2999 ImGui::EndCombo();
3000 }
3001 ImGui::SameLine();
3002 ImGui::Text("Solar Direct Spectrum");
3003 // ####### BAND PROPERTIES ####### //
3004 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.25f);
3005 ImGui::Text("Add Band:");
3006 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
3007 // ####### ADD BAND ####### //
3008 toggle_button("##enable_wavelength", &enable_wavelength);
3009 ImGui::SameLine();
3010 if (enable_wavelength){
3011 ImGui::Text("Wavelength Min:");
3012 ImGui::SameLine();
3013 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
3014 ImGui::InputFloat("##wavelength_min", &wavelength_min);
3015 ImGui::SameLine();
3016 ImGui::Text("Max:");
3017 ImGui::SameLine();
3018 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
3019 ImGui::InputFloat("##wavelength_max", &wavelength_max);
3020 } else{
3021 ImGui::Text("No Specified Wavelength");
3022 }
3023 //
3024 ImGui::Text("Label:");
3025 ImGui::SameLine();
3026 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3027 ImGui::InputText("##new_band_label", &new_band_label);
3028 ImGui::SameLine();
3029 ImGui::Text("Emission:");
3030 ImGui::SameLine();
3031 ImGui::Checkbox("##enable_emission", &enable_emission);
3032 ImGui::SameLine();
3033 if (ImGui::Button("Add Band")){
3034 if (enable_wavelength) {
3035 addBand(new_band_label, wavelength_min, wavelength_max, enable_emission);
3036 } else{
3037 addBand(new_band_label, enable_emission);
3038 bandlabels_set_wavelength.insert(new_band_label);
3039 }
3040 }
3041 // ####### BAND PROPERTIES ####### //
3042 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.25f);
3043 ImGui::Text("Band Properties:");
3044 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
3045 // ####### SELECT BAND ####### //
3046 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##combo_current_band", current_band.c_str())){
3047 for (std::string band : bandlabels_set){
3048 bool is_current_band_selected = (current_band == band);
3049 if (ImGui::Selectable(band.c_str(), is_current_band_selected))
3050 current_band = band;
3051 if (is_current_band_selected)
3052 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3053 }
3054 ImGui::EndCombo();
3055 }
3056 ImGui::SameLine();
3057 ImGui::Text("Select Band");
3058 // ####### DIRECT RAY COUNT ####### //
3059 int prev_direct_ray_count;
3060 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3061 if (current_band == "All"){
3062 prev_direct_ray_count = direct_ray_count;
3063 ImGui::InputInt("Direct Ray Count", &direct_ray_count);
3064 randomizePopup("direct_ray_count", createTaggedPtr(&direct_ray_count));
3065 randomizerParams("direct_ray_count");
3066 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick("randomize_direct_ray_count", ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3067 if (direct_ray_count != prev_direct_ray_count){
3068 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
3069 radiation->setDirectRayCount(band, direct_ray_count);
3070 direct_ray_count_dict[band] = direct_ray_count;
3071 }
3072 }
3073 } else{
3074 prev_direct_ray_count = direct_ray_count_dict[current_band];
3075 ImGui::InputInt("Direct Ray Count", &direct_ray_count_dict[current_band]);
3076 randomizePopup("direct_ray_count_" + current_band, createTaggedPtr(&direct_ray_count_dict[current_band]));
3077 randomizerParams("direct_ray_count_" + current_band);
3078 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_direct_ray_count_" + current_band).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3079 if (direct_ray_count_dict[current_band] != prev_direct_ray_count){
3080 radiation->setDirectRayCount(current_band, direct_ray_count_dict[current_band]);
3081 }
3082 }
3083 // ####### DIFFUSE RAY COUNT ####### //
3084 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3085 int prev_diffuse_ray_count;
3086 if (current_band == "All"){
3087 prev_diffuse_ray_count = diffuse_ray_count;
3088 ImGui::InputInt("Diffuse Ray Count", &diffuse_ray_count);
3089 randomizePopup("diffuse_ray_count", createTaggedPtr(&diffuse_ray_count));
3090 randomizerParams("diffuse_ray_count");
3091 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick("randomize_diffuse_ray_count", ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3092 if (diffuse_ray_count != prev_diffuse_ray_count){
3093 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
3094 radiation->setDiffuseRayCount(band, diffuse_ray_count);
3095 diffuse_ray_count_dict[band] = diffuse_ray_count;
3096 }
3097 }
3098 } else{
3099 prev_diffuse_ray_count = diffuse_ray_count_dict[current_band];
3100 ImGui::InputInt("Diffuse Ray Count", &diffuse_ray_count_dict[current_band]);
3101 randomizePopup("diffuse_ray_count_" + current_band, createTaggedPtr(&diffuse_ray_count_dict[current_band]));
3102 randomizerParams("diffuse_ray_count_" + current_band);
3103 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_diffuse_ray_count_" + current_band).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3104 if (diffuse_ray_count_dict[current_band] != prev_diffuse_ray_count){
3105 radiation->setDiffuseRayCount(current_band, diffuse_ray_count_dict[current_band]);
3106 }
3107 }
3108 // ####### SCATTERING DEPTH ####### //
3109 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3110 int prev_scattering_depth;
3111 if (current_band == "All"){
3112 prev_scattering_depth = scattering_depth;
3113 ImGui::InputInt("Scattering Depth", &scattering_depth);
3114 randomizePopup("scattering_depth", createTaggedPtr(&scattering_depth));
3115 randomizerParams("scattering_depth");
3116 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick("randomize_scattering_depth", ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3117 if (scattering_depth <= 0){
3118 scattering_depth = prev_scattering_depth;
3119 }
3120 if (prev_scattering_depth != scattering_depth){
3121 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
3122 radiation->setScatteringDepth(band, scattering_depth);
3123 scattering_depth_dict[band] = scattering_depth;
3124 }
3125 }
3126 } else{
3127 prev_scattering_depth = scattering_depth_dict[current_band];
3128 ImGui::InputInt("Scattering Depth", &scattering_depth_dict[current_band]);
3129 randomizePopup("scattering_depth_" + current_band, createTaggedPtr(&scattering_depth_dict[current_band]));
3130 randomizerParams("scattering_depth_" + current_band);
3131 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_scattering_depth_" + current_band).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3132 if (scattering_depth_dict[current_band] <= 0){ // scattering depth must be >0
3133 scattering_depth_dict[current_band] = prev_scattering_depth;
3134 }
3135 if (prev_scattering_depth != scattering_depth_dict[current_band]){
3136 radiation->setScatteringDepth(current_band, scattering_depth_dict[current_band]);
3137 }
3138 }
3139 // ####### RADIATIVE PROPERTIES ####### //
3140 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.25f);
3141 ImGui::Text("Radiative Properties:");
3142 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
3143 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3144 // ######### SELECT DATA GROUP ############//
3145 if (ImGui::Button("Refresh###data_groups_refresh")){
3146 updatePrimitiveTypes();
3147 updateDataGroups();
3148 }
3149 ImGui::SameLine();
3150 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
3151 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##data_group_primitive", current_data_group.c_str())){
3152 for (std::string data_group : data_groups_set){
3153 bool is_data_group_selected = (current_data_group == data_group);
3154 if (ImGui::Selectable(data_group.c_str(), is_data_group_selected))
3155 current_data_group = data_group;
3156 if (is_data_group_selected)
3157 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3158 }
3159 ImGui::EndCombo();
3160 }
3161 ImGui::SameLine();
3162 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3163 ImGui::Text("Select Data Group");
3164 // default primitive data group
3165 // ######### SELECT PRIMITIVE ############//
3166 if (ImGui::Button("Refresh")){
3167 updatePrimitiveTypes();
3168 updateDataGroups();
3169 }
3170 ImGui::SameLine();
3171 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
3172 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##combo_primitive", current_primitive.c_str())){
3173 for (int m = 0; m < primitive_names.size(); m++){
3174 bool is_primitive_selected = (current_primitive == primitive_names[m]);
3175 if (ImGui::Selectable(primitive_names[m].c_str(), is_primitive_selected))
3176 current_primitive = primitive_names[m];
3177 if (is_primitive_selected)
3178 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3179 }
3180 ImGui::EndCombo();
3181 }
3182 ImGui::SameLine();
3183 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3184 ImGui::Text("Select Primitive Type");
3185 if (current_data_group == "All"){
3186 // REFLECTIVITY
3187 ImGui::Text("Reflectivity:");
3188 std::string toggle_display_reflectivity = "Manual Entry";
3189 bool reflectivity_continuous = primitive_continuous[current_primitive][0];
3190 toggle_button("##reflectivity_toggle", &reflectivity_continuous);
3191 if (reflectivity_continuous != primitive_continuous[current_primitive][0]){
3192 if (current_primitive == "All"){
3193 for (auto &prim_values : primitive_continuous){
3194 primitive_continuous[prim_values.first][0] = reflectivity_continuous;
3195 }
3196 }
3197 primitive_continuous[current_primitive][0] = reflectivity_continuous;
3198 }
3199 if (primitive_continuous[current_primitive][0]){
3200 toggle_display_reflectivity = "File Entry";
3201 }
3202 ImGui::SameLine();
3203 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(250);
3204 if (!primitive_continuous[current_primitive][0]){
3205 ImGui::Text("Select band:");
3206 ImGui::SameLine();
3207 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
3208 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##combo_band_reflectivity", current_band_reflectivity.c_str())){
3209 for (int n = 0; n < bandlabels.size(); n++){
3210 bool is_band_selected = (current_band_reflectivity == bandlabels[n]);
3211 if (ImGui::Selectable(bandlabels[n].c_str(), is_band_selected))
3212 current_band_reflectivity = bandlabels[n];
3213 if (is_band_selected)
3214 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3215 }
3216 ImGui::EndCombo();
3217 }
3218 ImGui::SameLine();
3219 ImGui::Text("Enter value:");
3220 ImGui::SameLine();
3221 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(80);
3222 if (current_primitive == "All"){
3223 float prev_reflectivity = reflectivity;
3224 ImGui::InputFloat("##reflectivity_all", &reflectivity);
3225 if (reflectivity != prev_reflectivity){
3226 for (auto &prim_values : primitive_values[current_band_reflectivity]){
3227 primitive_values[current_band_reflectivity][prim_values.first][0] = reflectivity;
3228 }
3229 }
3230 }else{
3231 ImGui::InputFloat("##reflectivity", &primitive_values[current_band_reflectivity][current_primitive][0]);
3232 }
3233 }else{
3234 std::string reflectivity_prev = primitive_spectra[current_primitive][0];
3235 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##reflectivity_combo_all", reflectivity_prev.c_str())){
3236 for (auto& spectra : possible_spectra){
3237 bool is_spectra_selected = (primitive_spectra[current_primitive][0] == spectra);
3238 if (ImGui::Selectable(spectra.c_str(), is_spectra_selected))
3239 primitive_spectra[current_primitive][0] = spectra;
3240 if (is_spectra_selected)
3241 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3242 }
3243 ImGui::EndCombo();
3244 }
3245 if (current_primitive == "All" && reflectivity_prev != primitive_spectra[current_primitive][0]){
3246 for (auto &prim_spectrum : primitive_spectra){
3247 primitive_spectra[prim_spectrum.first][0] = primitive_spectra[current_primitive][0];
3248 }
3249 }
3250 }

3518 for (auto &prim_values : primitive_values_dict[current_data_group][current_band_emissivity]){
3519 primitive_values_dict[current_data_group][current_band_emissivity][prim_values.first][2] = emissivity;
3520 }
3521 }
3522 }else{
3523 ImGui::InputFloat("##emissivity", &primitive_values_dict[current_data_group][current_band_emissivity][current_primitive][2]);
3524 }
3525 ImGui::SameLine();
3526 ImGui::Text("Manual Entry");
3527 }
3528
3529 ImGui::EndTabItem();
3530 }
3531 } //RADIATION_MODEL
3532 #endif //RADIATION_MODEL
3533 if (enable_radiation){
3534 // RIG TAB
3535 if (ImGui::BeginTabItem("Rig")){
3536 current_tab = "Rig";
3537 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##rig_combo", current_rig.c_str())){
3538 for (auto rig_label : rig_labels_set){
3539 bool is_rig_selected = (current_rig == rig_label);
3540 if (ImGui::Selectable(rig_label.c_str(), is_rig_selected))
3541 current_rig = rig_label;
3542 current_cam_position = "0";
3543 if (is_rig_selected)
3544 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3545 }
3546 ImGui::EndCombo();
3547 }
3548 ImGui::SameLine();
3549 if (ImGui::Button("Add Rig")){
3550 std::string default_rig_label = "rig";
3551 std::string new_rig_label = "rig_0";
3552 int count = 0;
3553 while (rig_dict.find(new_rig_label) != rig_dict.end()){
3554 count++;
3555 new_rig_label = default_rig_label + "_" + std::to_string(count);
3556 }
3557 rig_dict.insert({new_rig_label, rig_labels.size()});
3558 camera_positions.push_back(camera_position);
3559 camera_lookats.push_back(camera_lookat);
3560 camera_labels.push_back(camera_label);
3561 camera_position_vec.push_back(camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3562 camera_lookat_vec.push_back(camera_lookat_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3563 rig_labels.push_back(new_rig_label);
3564 rig_labels_set.insert(new_rig_label);
3565 rig_camera_labels.push_back(rig_camera_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3566 rig_light_labels.push_back(rig_light_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3567 keypoint_frames.push_back(keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3568 num_images_vec.push_back(num_images_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3569 rig_colors.push_back(rig_colors[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3570 rig_position_noise.push_back(std::vector<distribution>{distribution{}, distribution{}, distribution{}});
3571 rig_lookat_noise.push_back(std::vector<distribution>{distribution{}, distribution{}, distribution{}});
3572 // current_rig = new_rig_label;
3573 std::string parent = "rig";
3574 pugi::xml_node rig_block = helios.child(parent.c_str());
3575 pugi::xml_node new_rig_node = helios.append_copy(rig_block);
3576 std::string name = "label";
3577 pugi::xml_attribute node_label = new_rig_node.attribute(name.c_str());
3578 node_label.set_value(new_rig_label.c_str());
3579 current_rig = new_rig_label;
3580 }
3581 if (!current_rig.empty()){
3582 // ##### UPDATE RIG ######//
3583 if (ImGui::Button("Update Rig")){
3584 updateRigs();
3585 }
3586 ImGui::SameLine();
3587 if (ImGui::Button("Delete Rig")){
3588 deleteRig(current_rig);
3589 }
3590 // ##### RIG NAME ######//
3591 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3592 std::string prev_rig_name = rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]];
3593 ImGui::InputText("##rig_name", &rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3594 if (rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]] != prev_rig_name && rig_dict.find(rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]]) == rig_dict.end() && !rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]].empty()){
3595 int temp = rig_dict[current_rig];
3596 current_rig = rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]];
3597 std::map<std::string, int>::iterator current_rig_iter = rig_dict.find(prev_rig_name);
3598 if (current_rig_iter != rig_dict.end()){
3599 rig_dict.erase(current_rig_iter);
3600 }
3601 rig_dict[current_rig] = temp;
3602 rig_labels_set.erase(prev_rig_name);
3603 rig_labels_set.insert(rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]]);
3604 } else{
3605 rig_labels[rig_dict[current_rig]] = prev_rig_name;
3606 }
3607 ImGui::SameLine();

3609 // ####### WRITE DEPTH ####### //

3615 ImGui::Checkbox("Write Norm Depth Images", &write_norm_depth_);
3616 write_norm_depth[rig_dict[current_rig]] = write_norm_depth_;
3617 // ####### BOUNDING BOXES ####### //
3618 if (ImGui::BeginPopup("multi_select_popup")) {

3709 int current_cam_position_;

3712 std::string modified_current_keypoint = std::to_string(keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_] + 1); // 1-indexed value
3713 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##cam_combo", modified_current_keypoint.c_str())){
3714 for (int n = 1; n <= camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]].size(); n++){
3715 std::string select_cam_position = std::to_string(n - 1);
3716 std::string selected_keypoint = std::to_string(keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]][n - 1]);
3717 bool is_pos_selected = (current_cam_position == select_cam_position);
3718 std::string modified_selected_keypoint = std::to_string(keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]][n - 1] + 1); // 1-indexed value
3719 if (ImGui::Selectable(modified_selected_keypoint.c_str(), is_pos_selected)){
3720 current_cam_position = std::to_string(n - 1);
3721 }
3722 if (is_pos_selected)
3723 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3724 }
3725 ImGui::EndCombo();
3726 }
3727 cam_pos_value << current_cam_position.c_str();
3728 cam_pos_value >> current_cam_position_;
3729 ImGui::SameLine();

3731 camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]].push_back(camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_]);
3732 camera_lookat_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]].push_back(camera_lookat_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_]);
3733 keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]].push_back(keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]].back() + 1);
3734 }

3736 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(80);
3737 int modified_keypoint_frame = keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_] + 1; // 1-indexed value
3738 ImGui::InputInt("Keypoint Frame", &modified_keypoint_frame);
3739 if (modified_keypoint_frame != keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_] + 1){
3740 keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_] = modified_keypoint_frame - 1;
3741 }

3743 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
3744 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_position_x", &camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_].x);
3745 randomizePopup("camera_position_x_" + std::to_string(rig_dict[current_rig]) + std::to_string(current_cam_position_), createTaggedPtr(&camera_position_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]][current_cam_position_].x));

3747 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_camera_position_x_" + std::to_string(rig_dict[current_rig]) + std::to_string(current_cam_position_)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3748 ImGui::SameLine();

3793 num_images_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]] = std::max(num_images_vec[rig_dict[current_rig]], *std::max_element(keypoint_frames[rig_dict[current_rig]].begin(), keypoint_frames[rig_dict[(std::string) current_rig]].end()) + 1);

3798 if (ImGui::BeginTabItem("Camera")){
3799 current_tab = "Camera";
3800 // LOAD XML LIBRARY FILE
3801 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
3802 if (ImGui::Button("Load XML Library File")){
3803 std::string new_xml_library_file = file_dialog();
3804 if (!new_xml_library_file.empty() && std::filesystem::exists(new_xml_library_file)){
3805 if ( camera_xml_library_files.find(new_xml_library_file) == camera_xml_library_files.end() ){
3806 camera_xml_library_files.insert(new_xml_library_file);
3807 std::vector<std::string> current_camera_file = get_xml_node_values(new_xml_library_file, "label", "globaldata_vec2");
3808 possible_camera_calibrations.insert(possible_camera_calibrations.end(), current_camera_file.begin(), current_camera_file.end());
3809 }
3810 context->loadXML( new_xml_library_file.c_str() );
3811 }
