3817 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
3818 dropDown("##band_group_combo", current_band_group, band_group_names);
3819 ImGui::SameLine();
3820 if (ImGui::Button("Add Band Group")){
3821 std::string default_band_group_label = "band_group";
3822 std::string new_band_group_label = "band_group_0";
3823 int count = 0;
3824 while (band_group_lookup.find(new_band_group_label) != band_group_lookup.end()){
3825 count++;
3826 new_band_group_label = default_band_group_label + "_" + std::to_string(count);
3827 }
3828 std::vector<std::string> new_band_group_vector;
3829 new_band_group_vector.push_back("red");
3830 new_band_group_vector.push_back("green");
3831 new_band_group_vector.push_back("blue");
3832 bandGroup new_band_group{new_band_group_vector, false, false};
3833 band_group_lookup[new_band_group_label] = new_band_group;
3834 band_group_names.insert(new_band_group_label);
3835 current_band_group = new_band_group_label;
3836 }
3837 if (!current_band_group.empty()){
3838 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3839 std::string prev_group_name = current_band_group;
3840 ImGui::InputText("Group Name", &current_band_group);
3841 if (current_band_group.empty() || band_group_lookup.find(current_band_group) != band_group_lookup.end()){
3842 current_band_group = prev_group_name;
3843 }
3844 if (current_band_group != prev_group_name){
3845 bandGroup temp = band_group_lookup[prev_group_name];
3846 std::map<std::string, bandGroup>::iterator current_band_group_iter = band_group_lookup.find(prev_group_name);
3847 if (current_band_group_iter != band_group_lookup.end()){
3848 band_group_lookup.erase(current_band_group_iter);
3849 }
3850 band_group_lookup[current_band_group] = temp;
3851 band_group_names.erase(prev_group_name);
3852 band_group_names.insert(current_band_group);
3853 }
3854 ImGui::SameLine();
3855 if (ImGui::Button("Delete Group")){
3856 band_group_names.erase(current_band_group);
3857 band_group_lookup.erase(current_band_group);
3858 current_band_group = "";
3859 }
3860 ImGui::Checkbox("Grayscale", &band_group_lookup[current_band_group].grayscale);
3861 ImGui::SameLine();
3862 ImGui::Checkbox("Norm", &band_group_lookup[current_band_group].norm);
3863 // Band 1
3864 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3865 dropDown("##band_1_combo", band_group_lookup[current_band_group].bands[0], bandlabels);
3866 if (!band_group_lookup[current_band_group].grayscale){
3867 // Band 2
3868 ImGui::SameLine();
3869 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3870 dropDown("##band_2_combo", band_group_lookup[current_band_group].bands[1], bandlabels);
3871 // Band 3
3872 ImGui::SameLine();
3873 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3874 dropDown("##band_3_combo", band_group_lookup[current_band_group].bands[2], bandlabels);
3875 ImGui::SameLine();
3876 ImGui::Text("Select Bands");
3877 } else{
3878 ImGui::SameLine();
3879 ImGui::Text("Select Band");
3880 }
3881 }
3882 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.25f);
3883 ImGui::Text("Edit Camera:");
3884 ImGui::SetWindowFontScale(1.0f);
3885 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##camera_combo", current_cam.c_str())){
3886 for (int n = 0; n < camera_names.size(); n++){
3887 bool is_cam_selected = (current_cam == camera_names[n]);
3888 if (ImGui::Selectable(camera_names[n].c_str(), is_cam_selected))
3889 current_cam = camera_names[n];
3890 if (is_cam_selected)
3891 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3892 }
3893 ImGui::EndCombo();
3894 }
3895 ImGui::SameLine();
3896 if (ImGui::Button("Add New Camera")){
3897 std::string default_cam_name = "camera";
3898 std::string new_cam_name = "camera_0";
3899 int count = 0;
3900 while (camera_dict.find(new_cam_name) != camera_dict.end()){
3901 count++;
3902 new_cam_name = default_cam_name + "_" + std::to_string(count);
3903 }
3904 camera_dict.insert({new_cam_name, camera_names.size()});
3905 camera_resolutions.push_back(camera_resolution);
3906 camera_calibrations.push_back(camera_calibrations[camera_dict[current_cam]]);
3907 focal_plane_distances.push_back(focal_plane_distance);
3908 lens_diameters.push_back(lens_diameter);
3909 FOV_aspect_ratios.push_back(FOV_aspect_ratio);
3910 HFOVs.push_back(HFOV);
3911 camera_names.push_back(new_cam_name);
3912 std::string parent = "camera";
3913 pugi::xml_node camera_block = helios.child(parent.c_str());
3914 pugi::xml_node new_cam_node = helios.append_copy(camera_block);
3915 std::string name = "label";
3916 pugi::xml_attribute node_label = new_cam_node.attribute(name.c_str());
3917 node_label.set_value(new_cam_name.c_str());
3918 current_cam = new_cam_name;
3919 }
3920 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3921 std::string prev_cam_name = camera_names[camera_dict[current_cam]];
3922 ImGui::InputText("##cam_name", &camera_names[camera_dict[current_cam]]);
3923 if (camera_names[camera_dict[current_cam]] != prev_cam_name){
3924 int temp = camera_dict[current_cam];
3925 current_cam = camera_names[camera_dict[current_cam]];
3926 std::map<std::string, int>::iterator current_cam_iter = camera_dict.find(prev_cam_name);
3927 if (current_cam_iter != camera_dict.end()){
3928 camera_dict.erase(current_cam_iter);
3929 }
3930 camera_dict[current_cam] = temp;
3931 }
3932 ImGui::SameLine();
3933 ImGui::Text("Camera Label");
3934 // ####### CAMERA CALIBRATION ####### //
3935 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
3936 dropDown("##camera_calibration_band", current_calibration_band, bandlabels);
3937 ImGui::SameLine();
3938 ImGui::Text("Band");
3939 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(250);
3940 ImGui::SameLine();
3941 dropDown("##camera_band_group_combo", camera_calibrations[camera_dict[current_cam]][current_calibration_band], possible_camera_calibrations);
3942 ImGui::SameLine();
3943 ImGui::Text("Calibration");
3944 // ####### CAMERA CALIBRATION ####### //
3945 // std::string prev_cam_calibration = camera_calibrations[camera_dict[current_cam]];
3946 // if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##camera_calibration_combo", camera_calibrations[camera_dict[current_cam]].c_str())){
3947 // for (int n = 0; n < possible_camera_calibrations.size(); n++){
3948 // bool is_cam_calibration_selected = (camera_calibrations[camera_dict[current_cam]] == possible_camera_calibrations[n]);
3949 // if (ImGui::Selectable(possible_camera_calibrations[n].c_str(), is_cam_calibration_selected))
3950 // camera_calibrations[camera_dict[current_cam]] = possible_camera_calibrations[n];
3951 // if (is_cam_calibration_selected)
3952 // ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
3953 // }
3954 // ImGui::EndCombo();
3955 // }
3956 // ImGui::SameLine();
3957 // ImGui::Text("Camera Calibration");
3958 // ####### CAMERA RESOLUTION ####### //
3959 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
3960 ImGui::InputInt("##camera_resolution_x", &camera_resolutions[camera_dict[current_cam]].x);
3961 randomizePopup("camera_resolution_x_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]), createTaggedPtr(&camera_resolutions[camera_dict[current_cam]].x));
3962 randomizerParams("camera_resolution_x_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]));
3963 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_camera_resolution_x_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3964 ImGui::SameLine();
3965 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
3966 ImGui::InputInt("##camera_resolution_y", &camera_resolutions[camera_dict[current_cam]].y);
3967 randomizePopup("camera_resolution_y_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]), createTaggedPtr(&camera_resolutions[camera_dict[current_cam]].y));
3968 randomizerParams("camera_resolution_y_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]));
3969 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_camera_resolution_y_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3970 ImGui::SameLine();
3971 ImGui::Text("Camera Resolution");
3972 // ####### FOCAL PLANE DISTANCE ####### //
3973 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
3974 ImGui::InputFloat("Focal Plane Distance", &focal_plane_distances[camera_dict[current_cam]]);
3975 randomizePopup("focal_plane_distance_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]), createTaggedPtr(&focal_plane_distances[camera_dict[current_cam]]));
3976 randomizerParams("focal_plane_distance_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]));
3977 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_focal_plane_distance_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3978 // ####### LENS DIAMETER ####### //
3979 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
3980 ImGui::InputFloat("Lens Diameter", &lens_diameters[camera_dict[current_cam]]);
3981 randomizePopup("lens_diameter_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]), createTaggedPtr(&lens_diameters[camera_dict[current_cam]]));
3982 randomizerParams("lens_diameter_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]));
3983 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_lens_diameter_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3984 // ####### FOV ASPECT RATIO ####### //
3985 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
3986 ImGui::InputFloat("FOV Aspect Ratio", &FOV_aspect_ratios[camera_dict[current_cam]]);
3987 randomizePopup("FOV_aspect_ratio_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]), createTaggedPtr(&FOV_aspect_ratios[camera_dict[current_cam]]));
3988 randomizerParams("FOV_aspect_ratio_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]));
3989 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_FOV_aspect_ratio_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3990 // ####### HFOV ####### //
3991 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
3992 ImGui::InputFloat("HFOV", &HFOVs[camera_dict[current_cam]]);
3993 randomizePopup("HFOV_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]), createTaggedPtr(&HFOVs[camera_dict[current_cam]]));
3994 randomizerParams("HFOV_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam]));
3995 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("HFOV_" + std::to_string(camera_dict[current_cam])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
3996 //
3997 ImGui::EndTabItem();
3998 }
3999 // LIGHT TAB
4000 if (ImGui::BeginTabItem("Light")){
4001 current_tab = "Light";
4002 // LOAD XML LIBRARY FILE
4003 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4004 if (ImGui::Button("Load XML Library File")){
4005 std::string new_xml_library_file = file_dialog();
4006 if (!new_xml_library_file.empty() && std::filesystem::exists(new_xml_library_file)){
4007 if ( light_xml_library_files.find(new_xml_library_file) == light_xml_library_files.end() ){
4008 light_xml_library_files.insert(new_xml_library_file);
4009 std::vector<std::string> current_light_file = get_xml_node_values(new_xml_library_file, "label", "globaldata_vec2");
4010 possible_light_spectra.insert(possible_light_spectra.end(), current_light_file.begin(), current_light_file.end());
4011 }
4012 context->loadXML( new_xml_library_file.c_str() );
4013 }
4014 }
4015 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##light_combo", current_light.c_str())){
4016 for (int n = 0; n < light_names.size(); n++){
4017 bool is_light_selected = (current_light == light_names[n]);
4018 if (ImGui::Selectable(light_names[n].c_str(), is_light_selected))
4019 current_light = light_names[n];
4020 if (is_light_selected)
4021 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
4022 }
4023 ImGui::EndCombo();
4024 }
4025 ImGui::SameLine();
4026 if (ImGui::Button("Add Light")){
4027 std::string default_light_name = "light";
4028 std::string new_light_name = "light_0";
4029 int count = 0;
4030 while (light_dict.find(new_light_name) != light_dict.end()){
4031 count++;
4032 new_light_name = default_light_name + "_" + std::to_string(count);
4033 }
4034 light_dict.insert({new_light_name, light_names.size()});
4035 light_spectra.push_back(light_spectra[light_dict[current_light]]);
4036 light_types.push_back(light_types[light_dict[current_light]]);
4037 light_direction_vec.push_back(light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4038 light_direction_sph_vec.push_back(light_direction_sph_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4039 light_rotation_vec.push_back(light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4040 light_size_vec.push_back(light_size_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4041 light_radius_vec.push_back(light_radius_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4042 light_names.push_back(new_light_name);
4043 light_flux_vec.push_back(light_flux_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4044 std::string parent = "light";
4045 pugi::xml_node light_block = helios.child(parent.c_str());
4046 pugi::xml_node new_light_node = helios.append_copy(light_block);
4047 std::string name = "label";
4048 pugi::xml_attribute node_label = new_light_node.attribute(name.c_str());
4049 node_label.set_value(new_light_name.c_str());
4050 current_light = new_light_name;
4051 }
4052 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
4053 std::string prev_light_name = light_names[light_dict[current_light]];
4054 ImGui::InputText("##light_name", &light_names[light_dict[current_light]]);
4055 if (light_names[light_dict[current_light]] != prev_light_name){
4056 int temp = light_dict[current_light];
4057 current_light = light_names[light_dict[current_light]];
4058 std::map<std::string, int>::iterator current_light_iter = light_dict.find(prev_light_name);
4059 if (current_light_iter != light_dict.end()){
4060 light_dict.erase(current_light_iter);
4061 }
4062 light_dict[current_light] = temp;
4063 }
4064 ImGui::SameLine();
4065 ImGui::Text("Light Label");
4066 // ####### LIGHT SPECTRA ####### //
4067 std::string prev_light_spectra = light_spectra[light_dict[current_light]];
4068 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##light_spectra_combo", light_spectra[light_dict[current_light]].c_str())){
4069 for (int n = 0; n < possible_light_spectra.size(); n++){
4070 bool is_light_spectra_selected = (light_spectra[light_dict[current_light]] == possible_light_spectra[n]);
4071 if (ImGui::Selectable(possible_light_spectra[n].c_str(), is_light_spectra_selected))
4072 light_spectra[light_dict[current_light]] = possible_light_spectra[n];
4073 if (is_light_spectra_selected)
4074 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
4075 }
4076 ImGui::EndCombo();
4077 }
4078 ImGui::SameLine();
4079 ImGui::Text("Light Spectrum");
4080 // ####### LIGHT TYPE ############ //
4081 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##light_type_combo", light_types[light_dict[current_light]].c_str())){
4082 for (int n = 0; n < all_light_types.size(); n++){
4083 bool is_type_selected = (light_types[light_dict[current_light]] == all_light_types[n]);
4084 if (ImGui::Selectable(all_light_types[n].c_str(), is_type_selected)){
4085 light_types[light_dict[current_light]] = all_light_types[n];
4086 }
4087 if (is_type_selected)
4088 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
4089 }
4090 ImGui::EndCombo();
4091 }
4092 ImGui::SameLine();
4093 ImGui::Text("Light Type");
4094 // collimated -> direction
4095 // disk -> position, radius, rotation
4096 // sphere -> position, radius
4097 // sunsphere -> direction
4098 // rectangle -> position, size, rotation
4099 // ####### LIGHT DIRECTION ####### //
4100 if (light_types[light_dict[(std::string) current_light]] == "collimated" ||
4101 light_types[light_dict[(std::string) current_light]] == "sunsphere"){
4102 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4103 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_direction_x", &light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]].x);
4104 randomizePopup("light_direction_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]].x));
4105 randomizerParams("light_direction_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4106 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_direction_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4107 ImGui::SameLine();
4108 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4109 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_direction_y", &light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]].y);
4110 randomizePopup("light_direction_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]].y));
4111 randomizerParams("light_direction_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4112 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_direction_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4113 ImGui::SameLine();
4114 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4115 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_direction_z", &light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]].z);
4116 randomizePopup("light_direction_z_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_direction_vec[light_dict[current_light]].z));
4117 randomizerParams("light_direction_z_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4118 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_direction_z_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4119 ImGui::SameLine();
4120 ImGui::Text("Light Direction");
4121 }
4122 // ####### LIGHT SOURCE FLUX ####### //
4123 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4124 ImGui::InputFloat("##source_flux", &light_flux_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4125 randomizePopup("source_flux_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_flux_vec[light_dict[current_light]]));
4126 randomizerParams("source_flux_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4127 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("source_flux_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4128 ImGui::SameLine();
4129 ImGui::Text("Source Flux");
4130 // radiation->setSourceFlux(light_UUID, band, flux_value);
4131 // ####### LIGHT ROTATION ####### //
4132 if (light_types[light_dict[current_light]] == "disk" ||
4133 light_types[light_dict[current_light]] == "rectangle"){
4134 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4135 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_rotation_x", &light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]].x);
4136 randomizePopup("light_rotation_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]].x));
4137 randomizerParams("light_rotation_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4138 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_rotation_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4139 ImGui::SameLine();
4140 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4141 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_rotation_y", &light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]].y);
4142 randomizePopup("light_rotation_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]].y));
4143 randomizerParams("light_rotation_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4144 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_rotation_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4145 ImGui::SameLine();
4146 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4147 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_rotation_z", &light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]].z);
4148 randomizePopup("light_rotation_z_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_rotation_vec[light_dict[current_light]].z));
4149 randomizerParams("light_rotation_z_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4150 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_rotation_z_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4151 ImGui::SameLine();
4152 ImGui::Text("Light Rotation");
4153 }
4154 // ####### LIGHT SIZE ####### //
4155 if (light_types[light_dict[current_light]] == "rectangle"){
4156 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4157 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_size_x", &light_size_vec[light_dict[current_light]].x);
4158 randomizePopup("light_size_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_size_vec[light_dict[current_light]].x));
4159 randomizerParams("light_size_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4160 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_size_x_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4161 ImGui::SameLine();
4162 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4163 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_size_y", &light_size_vec[light_dict[current_light]].y);
4164 randomizePopup("light_size_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_size_vec[light_dict[current_light]].y));
4165 randomizerParams("light_size_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4166 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_size_y_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4167 ImGui::SameLine();
4168 ImGui::Text("Light Size");
4169 }
4170 // ####### LIGHT RADIUS ####### //
4171 if (light_types[light_dict[current_light]] == "disk" ||
4172 light_types[light_dict[current_light]] == "sphere"){
4173 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(90);
4174 ImGui::InputFloat("##light_radius", &light_radius_vec[light_dict[current_light]]);
4175 randomizePopup("light_radius_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]), createTaggedPtr(&light_radius_vec[light_dict[current_light]]));
4176 randomizerParams("light_radius_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light]));
4177 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("light_radius_" + std::to_string(light_dict[current_light])).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4178 ImGui::SameLine();
4179 ImGui::Text("Light Radius");
4180 }
4181 // LIGHT END
4182 ImGui::EndTabItem();
4183 }
4184 }
4185 ImGui::EndTabBar();
4186 }
4187 // ImGui::Text("Hello, world %d", 123);
4188 // ImGui::Button("Save");
4189 // if (ImGui::Button("Save"))
4190 // std::cout << "here" << std::endl;
4191 last_position = current_position;
4192 previously_collapsed = currently_collapsed;
4193 ImGui::End();
4194
4195 // Rendering
4196 // (Your code clears your framebuffer, renders your other stuff etc.)
4197 // glClearColor(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f, 1.0f); // Set a background color (e.g., dark grey)
4198 // glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
4199 visualizer->plotOnce(!io.WantCaptureMouse);
4200 ImGui::Render();
4201 ImGui_ImplOpenGL3_RenderDrawData(ImGui::GetDrawData());
4202 glfwSwapBuffers(window);
4203 if (!io.WantCaptureMouse){
4204 glfwWaitEvents();
4205 }
4206 // (Your code calls glfwSwapBuffers() etc.)
4207
4208 std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(100/6));
4209 }
4210
4211 ImGui_ImplOpenGL3_Shutdown();
4212 ImGui_ImplGlfw_Shutdown();
4213 ImGui::DestroyContext();
4214 // }else{
4215 #else
4216 std::cout << "Visualizer plugin is required for this function." << std::endl;
4217 // } //HELIOS_VISUALIZER
4218 #endif //HELIOS_VISUALIZER
4219}

4221
4222void ProjectBuilder::buildAndVisualize(std::string xml_path){
4223 buildFromXML(xml_path);
4224 visualize();
4225}
4226
4227
4228void ProjectBuilder::buildAndVisualize(){
4229 buildFromXML();
4230 visualize();
4231}
4232
4233
4234void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(){
4235 // MAIN BLOCK
4236 // *** Latitude *** //
4237 xmlSetValue("latitude", "helios", latitude);
4238 xmlSetDistribution("latitude_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["latitude"]]);
4239 // *** Longitude *** //
4240 xmlSetValue("longitude", "helios", longitude);
4241 xmlSetDistribution("longitude_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["longitude"]]);
4242 // *** UTC Offset *** //
4243 xmlSetValue("UTC_offset", "helios", UTC_offset);
4244 xmlSetDistribution("UTC_offset_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["UTC_offset"]]);
4245 // *** CSV Weather File *** //
4246 xmlSetValue("csv_weather_file", "helios", csv_weather_file);
4247 // *** Domain Origin *** //
4248 xmlSetValue("domain_origin", "helios", domain_origin);
4249 xmlSetDistribution("domain_origin_x_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["domain_origin_x"]]);
4250 xmlSetDistribution("domain_origin_y_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["domain_origin_y"]]);
4251 xmlSetDistribution("domain_origin_z_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["domain_origin_z"]]);
4252 // *** Domain Extent *** //
4253 xmlSetValue("domain_extent", "helios", domain_extent);
4254 xmlSetDistribution("domain_extent_x_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["domain_extent_x"]]);
4255 xmlSetDistribution("domain_extent_y_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["domain_extent_y"]]);
4256 // *** Ground Resolution *** //
4257 xmlSetValue("ground_resolution", "helios", ground_resolution);
4258 xmlSetDistribution("ground_resolution_x_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["ground_resolution_x"]]);
4259 xmlSetDistribution("ground_resolution_y_dist", "helios", distributions[distribution_dict["ground_resolution_y"]]);
4260 // *** Ground Texture File *** //
4261 xmlSetValue("ground_texture_file", "helios", ground_texture_file);
4262 // *** Camera XML Library File *** //
4263 xmlSetValues("camera_xml_library_file", "helios", camera_xml_library_files);
4264 // *** Light XML Library File *** //
4265 xmlSetValues("light_xml_library_file", "helios", light_xml_library_files);
4266 // OBJECT BLOCK
4267 // Delete from XML doc
4268 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
4269 pugi::xml_node node;
4270 node = helios.child("object");
4271 if (node){
4272 node.parent().remove_child(node);
4273 }
4274 // Refresh lists
4275 obj_names.clear();
4276 obj_files.clear();
4277 obj_positions.clear();
4278 obj_orientations.clear();
4279 obj_scales.clear();
4280 obj_colors.clear();
4281 obj_data_groups.clear();
4282 for (std::string obj_name : obj_names_set){
4283 object curr_obj = objects_dict[obj_name];
4284 obj_names.push_back(curr_obj.name);
4285 obj_files.push_back(curr_obj.file);
4286 obj_positions.push_back(curr_obj.position);
4287 obj_orientations.push_back(curr_obj.orientation);
4288 obj_scales.push_back(curr_obj.scale);
4289 obj_colors.push_back(curr_obj.color);
4290 obj_data_groups.push_back(curr_obj.data_group);
4291 }
4292 //
4293 setNodeLabels("label", "object", obj_names_set);
4294 xmlSetValues("file", "object", obj_files, obj_names_dict);
4295 xmlSetValues("position", "object", obj_positions, obj_names_dict);
4296 xmlSetValues("orientation", "object", obj_orientations, obj_names_dict);
4297 xmlSetValues("scale", "object", obj_scales, obj_names_dict);
4298 xmlSetValues("color", "object", obj_colors, obj_names_dict);
4299 xmlSetValues("data_group", "object", obj_data_groups, obj_names_dict);
4300 // CANOPY BLOCK
4301 // Delete from XML doc
4302 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
4303 node = helios.child("canopy");
4304 if (node){
4305 node.parent().remove_child(node);
4306 }
4307 // Refresh lists
4308 plant_ages.clear();
4309 ground_clipping_heights.clear();
4310 canopy_labels.clear();
4311 plant_library_names.clear();
4312 plant_library_names_verbose.clear();
4313 canopy_IDs.clear();
4314 individual_plant_locations.clear();
4315 plant_spacings.clear();
4316 plant_counts.clear();
4317 canopy_origins.clear();
4318 canopy_data_groups.clear();
4319 for (std::string canopy_name : canopy_labels_set){
4320 canopy curr_canopy = canopy_dict[canopy_name];
4321 plant_ages.push_back(curr_canopy.age);
4322 ground_clipping_heights.push_back(curr_canopy.ground_clipping_height);
4323 canopy_labels.push_back(curr_canopy.label);
4324 plant_library_names.push_back(curr_canopy.library_name);
4325 plant_library_names_verbose.push_back(curr_canopy.library_name_verbose);
4326 canopy_IDs.push_back(curr_canopy.IDs);
4327 individual_plant_locations.push_back(curr_canopy.individual_plant_locations);
4328 plant_spacings.push_back(curr_canopy.plant_spacing);
4329 plant_counts.push_back(curr_canopy.plant_count);
4330 canopy_origins.push_back(curr_canopy.origin);
4331 canopy_data_groups.push_back(curr_canopy.data_group);
4332 }
4333 //
4334 setNodeLabels("label", "canopy_block", canopy_labels_set);
4335 xmlSetValue("canopy_origin", "canopy_block", canopy_origin);
4336 xmlSetValue("plant_count", "canopy_block", plant_count);
4337 xmlSetValue("plant_spacing", "canopy_block", plant_spacing);
4338 xmlSetValue("plant_library_name", "canopy_block", plant_library_name);
4339 xmlSetValue("plant_age", "canopy_block", plant_age);
4340 xmlSetValue("ground_clipping_height", "canopy_block", ground_clipping_height);
4341 xmlSetValues("canopy_origin", "canopy_block", canopy_origins, canopy_labels_dict);
4342 xmlSetValues("plant_count", "canopy_block", plant_counts, canopy_labels_dict);
4343 xmlSetValues("plant_spacing", "canopy_block", plant_spacings, canopy_labels_dict);
4344 xmlSetValues("plant_library_name", "canopy_block", plant_library_names, canopy_labels_dict);
4345 xmlSetValues("plant_age", "canopy_block", plant_ages, canopy_labels_dict);
4346 xmlSetValues("ground_clipping_height", "canopy_block", ground_clipping_heights, canopy_labels_dict);
4347 xmlSetValues("data_group", "canopy_block", canopy_data_groups, canopy_labels_dict);
4348 // RIG BLOCK
4349 // Delete from XML doc
4350 helios = xmldoc.child("helios");
4351 node = helios.child("rig");
4352 if (node){
4353 node.parent().remove_child(node);
4354 }
4355 setNodeLabels("label", "rig", rig_labels_set);
4356 xmlSetValues("color", "rig", rig_colors, rig_dict);
4357 // xmlSetValue("camera_position", "rig", camera_position);
4358 // xmlSetValue("camera_lookat", "rig", camera_lookat);
4359 xmlSetValue("camera_label", "rig", camera_label);
4360 // xmlSetValues("camera_position", "rig", camera_positions);
4361 xmlSetValues("camera_position", "rig", camera_position_vec, rig_dict);
4362 // xmlSetValues("camera_lookat", "rig", camera_lookats);
4363 xmlSetValues("camera_lookat", "rig", camera_lookat_vec, rig_dict);
4364 // xmlSetValues("camera_label", "rig", camera_labels);
4365 xmlSetValues("camera_label", "rig", rig_camera_labels, rig_dict);
4366 setKeypoints("keypoint", "camera_position", keypoint_frames);
4367 xmlSetValues("images", "rig", num_images_vec, rig_dict);
4368 std::vector<int> write_depth_{};
4369 std::vector<int> write_norm_depth_{};
4370 for (int i = 0; i < write_depth.size(); i++){
4371 if (write_depth[i]){
4372 write_depth_.push_back(1);
4373 } else{
4374 write_depth_.push_back(0);
4375 }
4376 if (write_norm_depth[i]){
4377 write_norm_depth_.push_back(1);
4378 } else{
4379 write_norm_depth_.push_back(0);
4380 }
4381 }
4382 xmlSetValues("depth", "rig", write_depth_, rig_dict);
4383 xmlSetValues("normdepth", "rig", write_norm_depth_, rig_dict);
4384 // CAMERA BLOCK
4385 setNodeLabels("label", "camera", camera_names_set);
4386 xmlSetValue("camera_resolution", "camera", camera_resolution);
4387 xmlSetValue("focal_plane_distance", "camera", focal_plane_distance);
4388 xmlSetValue("lens_diameter", "camera", lens_diameter);
4389 xmlSetValue("FOV_aspect_ratio", "camera", FOV_aspect_ratio);
4390 xmlSetValue("HFOV", "camera", HFOV);
4391 xmlSetValues("camera_resolution", "camera", camera_resolutions, camera_dict);
4392 for (std::string& band : bandlabels){
4393 for (std::string& camera : camera_names){
4394 xmlSetValue("camera_calibration_" + band, "camera", camera_calibrations[camera_dict[camera]][band]);
4395 }
4396 }
4397 xmlSetValues("focal_plane_distance", "camera", focal_plane_distances, camera_dict);
4398 xmlSetValues("lens_diameter", "camera", lens_diameters, camera_dict);
4399 xmlSetValues("FOV_aspect_ratio", "camera", FOV_aspect_ratios, camera_dict);
4400 xmlSetValues("HFOV", "camera", HFOVs, camera_dict);
4401 // LIGHT BLOCK
4402 setNodeLabels("label", "light", light_names_set);
4403 xmlSetValues("light_type", "light", light_types, light_dict);
4404 xmlSetValues("light_spectra", "light", light_spectra, light_dict);
4405 xmlSetValues("light_direction", "light", light_direction_vec, light_dict);
4406 xmlSetValues("light_rotation", "light", light_rotation_vec, light_dict);
4407 xmlSetValues("light_size", "light", light_size_vec, light_dict);
4408 xmlSetValues("light_source_flux", "light", light_flux_vec, light_dict);
4409 xmlSetValues("light_radius", "light", light_radius_vec, light_dict);
4410 xmlSetValues("light_label", "rig", rig_light_labels, light_dict);
4411 // RADIATION BLOCK
4412 xmlSetValue("direct_ray_count", "radiation", direct_ray_count);
4413 xmlSetValue("diffuse_ray_count", "radiation", diffuse_ray_count);
4414 xmlSetValue("diffuse_extinction_coeff", "radiation", diffuse_extinction_coeff);
4415 xmlSetValue("scattering_depth", "radiation", scattering_depth);
4416 xmlSetValue("air_turbidity", "radiation", air_turbidity);
4417 xmlSetValues("load_xml_library_file", "radiation", xml_library_files);
4418 xmlSetValue("solar_direct_spectrum", "radiation", solar_direct_spectrum);
4419 xmlSetValue("leaf_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation", leaf_reflectivity_spectrum);
4420 xmlSetValue("leaf_transmissivity_spectrum", "radiation", leaf_transmissivity_spectrum);
4421 xmlSetValue("leaf_emissivity", "radiation", leaf_emissivity);
4422 xmlSetValue("ground_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation", ground_reflectivity_spectrum);
4423 for (std::string prim : primitive_names){
4424 if (prim == "All") continue;
4425 // Reflectivity
4426 if (primitive_continuous[prim][0]){
4427 xmlSetValue(prim + "_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation", primitive_spectra[prim][0]);
4428 } else{
4429 xmlRemoveField(prim + "_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation");
4430 }
4431 // Transmissivity
4432 if (primitive_continuous[prim][1]){
4433 xmlSetValue(prim + "_transmissivity_spectrum", "radiation", primitive_spectra[prim][1]);
4434 } else{
4435 xmlRemoveField(prim + "_transmissivity_spectrum", "radiation");
4436 }
4437 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
4438 if (band == "All") continue;
4439 xmlSetValue(prim + "_reflectivity", "radiation", primitive_values[band][prim][0]);
4440 xmlSetValue(prim + "_transmissivity", "radiation", primitive_values[band][prim][1]);
4441 xmlSetValue(prim + "_emissivity", "radiation", primitive_values[band][prim][2]);
4442 }
4443 }
4444 xmldoc.save_file(xml_input_file.c_str());
4445}
4446
4447
4448void ProjectBuilder::xmlSetValues(std::string xml_path){
4449 xml_input_file = xml_path;
4450 if( !open_xml_file(xml_input_file, xmldoc, xml_error_string) ) {
4451 helios_runtime_error(xml_error_string);
4452 }
4453 xmlSetValues();
4454}
4455
4456
4457void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(){
4458 distribution curr_distribution = distribution{};
4459 // MAIN BLOCK
4460 // *** Latitude *** //
4461 xmlGetValue("latitude", "helios", latitude);
4462 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4463 xmlGetDistribution("latitude_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4464 applyDistribution("latitude", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&latitude));
4465 // *** Longitude *** //
4466 xmlGetValue("longitude", "helios", longitude);
4467 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4468 xmlGetDistribution("longitude_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4469 applyDistribution("longitude", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&longitude));
4470 // *** UTC Offset *** //
4471 xmlGetValue("UTC_offset", "helios", UTC_offset);
4472 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4473 xmlGetDistribution("UTC_offset_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4474 applyDistribution("UTC_offset", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&UTC_offset));
4475 // *** CSV Weather File *** //
4476 xmlGetValue("csv_weather_file", "helios", csv_weather_file);
4477 // *** Domain Origin *** //
4478 xmlGetValue("domain_origin", "helios", domain_origin);
4479 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4480 xmlGetDistribution("domain_origin_x_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4481 applyDistribution("domain_origin_x", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&domain_origin.x));
4482 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4483 xmlGetDistribution("domain_origin_y_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4484 applyDistribution("domain_origin_y", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&domain_origin.y));
4485 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4486 xmlGetDistribution("domain_origin_z_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4487 applyDistribution("domain_origin_z", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&domain_origin.z));
4488 // *** Domain Extent *** //
4489 xmlGetValue("domain_extent", "helios", domain_extent);
4490 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4491 xmlGetDistribution("domain_extent_x_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4492 applyDistribution("domain_extent_x", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&domain_extent.x));
4493 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4494 xmlGetDistribution("domain_extent_y_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4495 applyDistribution("domain_extent_y", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&domain_extent.y));
4496 // *** Ground Resolution *** //
4497 xmlGetValue("ground_resolution", "helios", ground_resolution);
4498 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4499 xmlGetDistribution("ground_resolution_x_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4500 applyDistribution("ground_resolution_x", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&ground_resolution.x));
4501 curr_distribution = distribution{};
4502 xmlGetDistribution("ground_resolution_y_dist", "helios", curr_distribution);
4503 applyDistribution("ground_resolution_y", curr_distribution, createTaggedPtr(&ground_resolution.y));
4504 // *** Ground Texture File *** //
4505 xmlGetValue("ground_texture_file", "helios", ground_texture_file);
4506 // *** Camera XML Library Files *** //
4507 xmlGetValues("camera_xml_library_file", "helios", camera_xml_library_files);
4508 possible_camera_calibrations.clear();
4509 for (auto &xml_library_file : camera_xml_library_files){
4510 if( xml_library_file.empty() || !std::filesystem::exists(xml_library_file) ){
4511 continue;
4512 }
4513 std::vector<std::string> current_camera_file = get_xml_node_values(xml_library_file, "label", "globaldata_vec2");
4514 possible_camera_calibrations.insert(possible_camera_calibrations.end(), current_camera_file.begin(), current_camera_file.end());
4515 }
4516 // *** Light XML Library Files *** //
4517 xmlGetValues("light_xml_library_file", "helios", light_xml_library_files);
4518 possible_light_spectra.clear();
4519 for (auto &xml_library_file : light_xml_library_files){
4520 if( xml_library_file.empty() || !std::filesystem::exists(xml_library_file) ){
4521 continue;
4522 }
4523 std::vector<std::string> current_light_file = get_xml_node_values(xml_library_file, "label", "globaldata_vec2");
4524 possible_light_spectra.insert(possible_light_spectra.end(), current_light_file.begin(), current_light_file.end());
4525 }
4526 // OBJECT BLOCK
4527 obj_names_dict.clear();
4528 obj_names_dict = getNodeLabels("label", "object", obj_names);
4529 obj_names_set = std::set<std::string>{obj_names.begin(), obj_names.end()};
4530 if (!obj_names.empty()) current_obj = obj_names[0];
4531 xmlGetValues("file", "object", obj_files);
4532 xmlGetValues("position", "object", obj_positions);
4533 xmlGetValues("orientation", "object", obj_orientations);
4534 xmlGetValues("scale", "object", obj_scales);
4535 prev_obj_positions = obj_positions;
4536 prev_obj_orientations = obj_orientations;
4537 prev_obj_scales = obj_scales;
4538 obj_data_groups.clear();
4539 xmlGetValues("data_group", "object", obj_data_groups);
4540 obj_colors.clear();
4541 xmlGetValues("color", "object", obj_colors);
4542
4543 for (auto& obj : objects_dict){
4544 deleteObject(obj.second.name);
4545 }
4546 objects_dict.clear();
4547 for (int i = 0; i < obj_files.size(); i++){
4548 object new_object;
4549 std::vector<uint> new_UUIDs;
4550 std::string new_obj_file = obj_files[i];
4551 if( std::filesystem::path(new_obj_file).extension() == ".obj" ){
4552 new_UUIDs = context->loadOBJ(new_obj_file.c_str());
4553 } else if ( std::filesystem::path(new_obj_file).extension() == ".ply" ){
4554 new_UUIDs = context->loadPLY(new_obj_file.c_str());
4555 } else {
4556 std::cout << "Failed to load object file " << new_obj_file << "." << std::endl;
4557 }
4558 // check for MTL file
4559 std::filesystem::path mtl_path(new_obj_file);
4560 mtl_path.replace_extension("mtl");
4561 if (std::filesystem::exists(mtl_path)){
4562 new_object.use_texture_file = true;
4563 } else{
4564 new_object.use_texture_file = false;
4565 context->setPrimitiveColor(new_UUIDs, obj_colors[i]);
4566 }
4567 context->scalePrimitive(new_UUIDs, obj_scales[i]);
4568 context->rotatePrimitive(new_UUIDs, deg2rad(obj_orientations[i].x), "x");
4569 context->rotatePrimitive(new_UUIDs, deg2rad(obj_orientations[i].y), "y");
4570 context->rotatePrimitive(new_UUIDs, deg2rad(obj_orientations[i].z), "z");
4571 context->translatePrimitive(new_UUIDs, obj_positions[i]);
4572 obj_UUIDs.push_back(new_UUIDs);
4573 new_object.index = obj_idx;
4574 obj_idx++;
4575 new_object.name = obj_names[i];
4576 new_object.file = obj_files[i];
4577 new_object.data_group = obj_data_groups[i];
4578 new_object.UUIDs = new_UUIDs;
4579 new_object.position = obj_positions[i];
4580 new_object.prev_position = obj_positions[i];
4581 new_object.orientation = obj_orientations[i];
4582 new_object.prev_orientation = obj_orientations[i];
4583 new_object.scale = obj_scales[i];
4584 new_object.prev_scale = obj_scales[i];
4585 new_object.color = obj_colors[i];
4586 new_object.prev_color = obj_colors[i];
4587 new_object.is_dirty = false;
4588 objects_dict[new_object.name] = new_object;
4589 }
4590 // CANOPY BLOCK
4591 canopy_labels.clear();
4592 canopy_labels_dict = getNodeLabels("label", "canopy_block", canopy_labels);
4593 for (auto canopy_label_ : canopy_labels){
4594 canopy_labels_set.insert(canopy_label_);
4595 }
4596 if (!canopy_labels.empty()) current_canopy = canopy_labels[0];
4597 xmlGetValue("canopy_origin", "canopy_block", canopy_origin);
4598 xmlGetValue("plant_count", "canopy_block", plant_count);
4599 xmlGetValue("plant_spacing", "canopy_block", plant_spacing);
4600 xmlGetValue("plant_library_name", "canopy_block", plant_library_name);
4601 xmlGetValue("plant_age", "canopy_block", plant_age);
4602 xmlGetValue("ground_clipping_height", "canopy_block", ground_clipping_height);
4603 canopy_origins.clear();
4604 xmlGetValues("canopy_origin", "canopy_block", canopy_origins);
4605 plant_counts.clear();
4606 xmlGetValues("plant_count", "canopy_block", plant_counts);
4607 plant_spacings.clear();
4608 xmlGetValues("plant_spacing", "canopy_block", plant_spacings);
4609 plant_library_names.clear();
4610 xmlGetValues("plant_library_name", "canopy_block", plant_library_names);
4611 for (int i = 0; i < plant_library_names.size(); i++){
4612 plant_library_names_verbose.push_back(plant_type_verbose_lookup[plant_library_names[i]]);
4613 }
4614 plant_ages.clear();
4615 xmlGetValues("plant_age", "canopy_block", plant_ages);
4616 ground_clipping_heights.clear();
4617 xmlGetValues("ground_clipping_height", "canopy_block", ground_clipping_heights);
4618 canopy_data_groups.clear();
4619 xmlGetValues("data_group", "canopy_block", canopy_data_groups);
4620
4621 canopy_dict.clear();
4622 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_labels.size(); i++){
4623 canopy new_canopy;
4624 new_canopy.idx = canopy_idx;
4625 canopy_idx++;
4626 new_canopy.age = plant_ages[i];
4627 new_canopy.ground_clipping_height = ground_clipping_heights[i];
4628 new_canopy.label = canopy_labels[i];
4629 new_canopy.library_name = plant_library_names[i];
4630 new_canopy.library_name_verbose = plant_library_names_verbose[i];
4631 new_canopy.IDs = canopy_IDs[i];
4632 new_canopy.individual_plant_locations = individual_plant_locations[i];
4633 new_canopy.plant_spacing = plant_spacings[i];
4634 new_canopy.plant_count = plant_counts[i];
4635 new_canopy.origin = canopy_origins[i];
4636 new_canopy.data_group = canopy_data_groups[i];
4637 new_canopy.is_dirty = false;
4638 canopy_dict[new_canopy.label] = new_canopy;
4639 }
4640
4641 // RIG BLOCK
4642 #ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
4643 rig_labels.clear();
4644 rig_labels_set.clear();
4645 rig_dict = getNodeLabels("label", "rig", rig_labels);
4646 for (auto rig : rig_labels){
4647 rig_labels_set.insert(rig);
4648 rig_position_noise.push_back(std::vector<distribution>{distribution{}, distribution{}, distribution{}});
4649 rig_lookat_noise.push_back(std::vector<distribution>{distribution{}, distribution{}, distribution{}});
4650 }
4651 current_rig = rig_labels[0];
4652 xmlGetValues("color", "rig", rig_colors);
4653 xmlGetValue("camera_position", "rig", camera_position);
4654 xmlGetValue("camera_lookat", "rig", camera_lookat);
4655 xmlGetValue("camera_label", "rig", camera_label);
4656 camera_positions.clear();
4657 xmlGetValues("camera_position", "rig", camera_positions);
4658 camera_position_vec.clear();
4659 xmlGetValues("camera_position", "rig", camera_position_vec);
4660 camera_lookats.clear();
4661 xmlGetValues("camera_lookat", "rig", camera_lookats);
4662 camera_lookat_vec.clear();
4663 xmlGetValues("camera_lookat", "rig", camera_lookat_vec);
4664 camera_labels.clear();
4665 xmlGetValues("camera_label", "rig", camera_labels);
4666 rig_camera_labels.clear();
4667 xmlGetValues("camera_label", "rig", rig_camera_labels);
4668 keypoint_frames.clear();
4669 getKeypoints("keypoint", "camera_position", keypoint_frames);
4670 current_keypoint = std::to_string(keypoint_frames[0][0]);
4671 num_images_vec.clear();
4672 xmlGetValues("images", "rig", num_images_vec);
4673 write_depth.clear();
4674 write_norm_depth.clear();
4675 std::vector<int> write_depth_{};
4676 std::vector<int> write_norm_depth_{};
4677 xmlGetValues("depth", "rig", write_depth_);
4678 xmlGetValues("depth", "rig", write_norm_depth_);
4679 for (int i = 0; i < write_depth_.size(); i++){
4680 if (write_depth_[i] == 1){
4681 write_depth.push_back(true);
4682 } else{
4683 write_depth.push_back(false);
4684 }
4685 if (write_norm_depth_[i] == 1){
4686 write_norm_depth.push_back(true);
4687 } else{
4688 write_norm_depth.push_back(false);
4689 }
4690 }
4691 // CAMERA BLOCK
4692 camera_names.clear();
4693 camera_names_set.clear();
4694 camera_dict = getNodeLabels("label", "camera", camera_names);
4695 current_cam = camera_names[0];
4696 xmlGetValue("camera_resolution", "camera", camera_resolution);
4697 xmlGetValue("focal_plane_distance", "camera", focal_plane_distance);
4698 xmlGetValue("lens_diameter", "camera", lens_diameter);
4699 xmlGetValue("FOV_aspect_ratio", "camera", FOV_aspect_ratio);
4700 xmlGetValue("HFOV", "camera", HFOV);
4701 camera_resolutions.clear();
4702 xmlGetValues("camera_resolution", "camera", camera_resolutions);
4703 camera_calibrations.clear();
4704 for (std::string& camera : camera_names){
4705 camera_calibrations.push_back(std::map<std::string, std::string>{});
4706 for (std::string& band : bandlabels){
4707 xmlGetValue("camera_calibration_" + band, "camera", camera_calibrations[camera_dict[camera]][band]);
4708 }
4709 camera_names_set.insert(camera);
4710 }
4711 focal_plane_distances.clear();
4712 xmlGetValues("focal_plane_distance", "camera", focal_plane_distances);
4713 lens_diameters.clear();
4714 xmlGetValues("lens_diameter", "camera", lens_diameters);
4715 FOV_aspect_ratios.clear();
4716 xmlGetValues("FOV_aspect_ratio", "camera", FOV_aspect_ratios);
4717 HFOVs.clear();
4718 xmlGetValues("HFOV", "camera", HFOVs);
4719 // LIGHT BLOCK
4720 light_types.clear();
4721 xmlGetValues("light_type", "light", light_types);
4722 light_direction_vec.clear();
4723 xmlGetValues("light_direction", "light", light_direction_vec);
4724 light_direction_sph_vec.clear();
4725 for (vec3 vec : light_direction_vec){
4726 light_direction_sph_vec.push_back(cart2sphere(vec));
4727 }
4728 light_rotation_vec.clear();
4729 xmlGetValues("light_rotation", "light", light_rotation_vec);
4730 light_size_vec.clear();
4731 xmlGetValues("light_size", "light", light_size_vec);
4732 light_flux_vec.clear();
4733 xmlGetValues("light_source_flux", "light", light_flux_vec);
4734 light_radius_vec.clear();
4735 xmlGetValues("light_radius", "light", light_radius_vec);
4736 light_spectra.clear();
4737 xmlGetValues("light_spectra", "light", light_spectra);
4738 light_names.clear();
4739 light_names_set.clear();
4740 light_dict = getNodeLabels("label", "light", light_names);
4741 for (auto &light : light_names){
4742 light_names_set.insert(light);
4743 }
4744 current_light = light_names[0];
4745 rig_light_labels.clear();
4746 xmlGetValues("light_label", "rig", rig_light_labels);
4747 // RADIATION BLOCK
4748 xmlGetValue("direct_ray_count", "radiation", direct_ray_count);
4749 xmlGetValue("diffuse_ray_count", "radiation", diffuse_ray_count);
4750 xmlGetValue("diffuse_extinction_coeff", "radiation", diffuse_extinction_coeff);
4751 xmlGetValue("scattering_depth", "radiation", scattering_depth);
4752 xmlGetValue("air_turbidity", "radiation", air_turbidity);
4753 xmlGetValues("load_xml_library_file", "radiation", xml_library_files);
4754 possible_spectra.clear();
4755 for (auto &xml_library_file : xml_library_files){
4756 if( xml_library_file.empty() || !std::filesystem::exists(xml_library_file) ){
4757 continue;
4758 }
4759 std::vector<std::string> current_spectra_file = get_xml_node_values(xml_library_file, "label", "globaldata_vec2");
4760 for (int i = 0; i < current_spectra_file.size(); i++){
4761 possible_spectra.insert(current_spectra_file[i]);
4762 }
4763 }
4764 xmlGetValue("solar_direct_spectrum", "radiation", solar_direct_spectrum);
4765 xmlGetValue("leaf_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation", leaf_reflectivity_spectrum);
4766 xmlGetValue("leaf_transmissivity_spectrum", "radiation", leaf_transmissivity_spectrum);
4767 xmlGetValue("leaf_emissivity", "radiation", leaf_emissivity);
4768 xmlGetValue("ground_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation", ground_reflectivity_spectrum);
4769 primitive_values.clear();
4770 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
4771 primitive_values[band];
4772 for (std::string prim : primitive_names){
4773 primitive_values[band][prim] = {ground_reflectivity, ground_transmissivity, ground_emissivity};
4774 }
4775 }
4776 primitive_spectra.clear();
4777 primitive_spectra = {{"All", {reflectivity_spectrum, transmissivity_spectrum, emissivity_spectrum}},
4778 {"ground", {ground_reflectivity_spectrum, ground_transmissivity_spectrum, ground_emissivity_spectrum}},
4779 {"leaf", {leaf_reflectivity_spectrum, leaf_transmissivity_spectrum, leaf_emissivity_spectrum}},
4780 {"petiolule", {petiolule_reflectivity_spectrum, petiolule_transmissivity_spectrum, petiolule_emissivity_spectrum}},
4781 {"petiole", {petiole_reflectivity_spectrum, petiole_transmissivity_spectrum, petiole_emissivity_spectrum}},
4782 {"internode", {internode_reflectivity_spectrum, internode_transmissivity_spectrum, internode_emissivity_spectrum}},
4783 {"peduncle", {peduncle_reflectivity_spectrum, peduncle_transmissivity_spectrum, peduncle_emissivity_spectrum}},
4784 {"petal", {petal_reflectivity_spectrum, petal_transmissivity_spectrum, petal_emissivity_spectrum}},
4785 {"pedicel", {pedicel_reflectivity_spectrum, pedicel_transmissivity_spectrum, pedicel_emissivity_spectrum}},
4786 {"fruit", {fruit_reflectivity_spectrum, fruit_transmissivity_spectrum, fruit_emissivity_spectrum}}};
4787 for (std::string prim : primitive_names){
4788 if (prim == "All") continue;
4789 std::string default_spectrum = "";
4790 // Reflectivity
4791 xmlGetValue(prim + "_reflectivity_spectrum", "radiation", default_spectrum);
4792 if (!default_spectrum.empty()){
4793 primitive_spectra[prim][0] = default_spectrum;
4794 primitive_continuous[prim][0] = true;
4795 } else{
4796 primitive_continuous[prim][0] = false;
4797 }
4798 // Transmissivity
4799 default_spectrum = "";
4800 xmlGetValue(prim + "_transmissivity_spectrum", "radiation", default_spectrum);
4801 if (!default_spectrum.empty()){
4802 primitive_spectra[prim][1] = default_spectrum;
4803 primitive_continuous[prim][1] = true;
4804 } else{
4805 primitive_continuous[prim][1] = false;
4806 }
4807 for (std::string band : bandlabels){
4808 if (band == "All") continue;
4809 xmlGetValue(prim + "_reflectivity", "radiation", primitive_values[band][prim][0]);
4810 xmlGetValue(prim + "_transmissivity", "radiation", primitive_values[band][prim][1]);
4811 xmlGetValue(prim + "_emissivity", "radiation", primitive_values[band][prim][2]);
4812 }
4813 }
4814 #endif
4815}
4816
4817void ProjectBuilder::xmlGetValues(std::string xml_path){
4818 xml_input_file = xml_path;
4819 if( !open_xml_file(xml_input_file, xmldoc, xml_error_string) ) {
4820 helios_runtime_error(xml_error_string);
4821 }
4822 xmlGetValues();
4823}
4824
4825void ProjectBuilder::objectTab(std::string curr_obj_name, int id){
4826 if (ImGui::Button("Update Object")){
4827 updateObject(curr_obj_name);
4828 refreshVisualization();
4829 }
4830 ImGui::SameLine();
4831 if (ImGui::Button("Delete Object")){
4832 deleteObject(curr_obj_name);
4833 }
4834 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
4835 std::string prev_obj_name = objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name;
4836 ImGui::InputText(("##obj_name_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name);
4837 if (objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name != prev_obj_name && objects_dict.find(curr_obj_name) == objects_dict.end() && !objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name.empty()){
4838 object temp_obj = objects_dict[curr_obj_name];
4839 curr_obj_name = objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name;
4840 std::map<std::string, object>::iterator delete_obj_iter = objects_dict.find(prev_obj_name);
4841 if (delete_obj_iter != objects_dict.end()){
4842 objects_dict.erase(delete_obj_iter);
4843 }
4844
4845 objects_dict[objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name] = temp_obj;
4846
4847 obj_names_set.erase(prev_obj_name);
4848 obj_names_set.insert(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name);
4849 } else{
4850 objects_dict[curr_obj_name].name = prev_obj_name;
4851 }
4852 ImGui::SameLine();
4853 ImGui::Text("Object Name");
4854 // ####### OBJECT SCALE ####### //
4855 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4856 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].scale.x);
4857 randomizePopup("obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].scale.x, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4858 randomizerParams("obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4859 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_scale_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4860 ImGui::SameLine();
4861 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4862 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].scale.y);
4863 randomizePopup("obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].scale.y, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4864 randomizerParams("obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4865 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_scale_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4866 ImGui::SameLine();
4867 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4868 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].scale.z);
4869 randomizePopup("obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].scale.z, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4870 randomizerParams("obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4871 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_scale_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4872 ImGui::SameLine();
4873 ImGui::Text("Object Scale");
4874 // ####### OBJECT POSITION ####### //
4875 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4876 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].position.x);
4877 randomizePopup("obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].position.x, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4878 randomizerParams("obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4879 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_position_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4880 ImGui::SameLine();
4881 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4882 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].position.y);
4883 randomizePopup("obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].position.y, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4884 randomizerParams("obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4885 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_position_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4886 ImGui::SameLine();
4887 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4888 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].position.z);
4889 randomizePopup("obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].position.z, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4890 randomizerParams("obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4891 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_position_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4892 ImGui::SameLine();
4893 ImGui::Text("Object Position");
4894 // ####### OBJECT ORIENTATION ####### //
4895 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4896 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].orientation.x);
4897 randomizePopup("obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].orientation.x, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4898 randomizerParams("obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4899 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_orientation_x_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4900 ImGui::SameLine();
4901 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4902 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].orientation.y);
4903 randomizePopup("obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].orientation.y, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4904 randomizerParams("obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4905 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_orientation_y_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4906 ImGui::SameLine();
4907 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4908 ImGui::InputFloat(("##obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(id)).c_str(), &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].orientation.z);
4909 randomizePopup("obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index), createTaggedPtr(&objects_dict[curr_obj_name].orientation.z, &objects_dict[curr_obj_name].is_dirty));
4910 randomizerParams("obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index));
4911 ImGui::OpenPopupOnItemClick(("randomize_obj_orientation_z_" + std::to_string(objects_dict[curr_obj_name].index)).c_str(), ImGuiPopupFlags_MouseButtonRight);
4912 ImGui::SameLine();
4913 ImGui::Text("Object Orientation");
4914}
4915
4916void ProjectBuilder::rigTab(std::string curr_rig_name, int id){
4917 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
4918 std::string prev_rig_name = rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]];
4919 ImGui::InputText("##rig_name", &rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]]);
4920 if (rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]] != prev_rig_name && rig_labels_set.find(rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]]) == rig_labels_set.end() && !rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]].empty()){
4921 rig_labels_set.erase(prev_rig_name);
4922 int temp = rig_dict[curr_rig_name];
4923 rig_labels_set.insert(rig_labels[temp]);
4924 curr_rig_name = rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]];
4925 std::map<std::string, int>::iterator current_rig_iter = rig_dict.find(prev_rig_name);
4926 if (current_rig_iter != rig_dict.end()){
4927 rig_dict.erase(current_rig_iter);
4928 }
4929 rig_dict[curr_rig_name] = temp;
4930
4931 rig_labels_set.erase(prev_rig_name);
4932 rig_labels_set.insert(rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]]);
4933 } else{
4934 rig_labels[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]] = prev_rig_name;
4935 }
4936 ImGui::SameLine();
4937 ImGui::Text("Rig Name");
4938 int current_cam_position_ = 0; // TODO: make this dynamic
4939 // ####### CAMERA POSITION ####### //
4940 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4941 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_position_x", &camera_position_vec[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]][current_cam_position_].x);
4942 ImGui::SameLine();
4943 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4944 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_position_y", &camera_position_vec[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]][current_cam_position_].y);
4945 ImGui::SameLine();
4946 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4947 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_position_z", &camera_position_vec[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]][current_cam_position_].z);
4948 ImGui::SameLine();
4949 ImGui::Text("Rig Position");
4950 // ####### CAMERA LOOKAT ####### //
4951 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4952 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_lookat_x", &camera_lookat_vec[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]][current_cam_position_].x);
4953 ImGui::SameLine();
4954 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4955 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_lookat_y", &camera_lookat_vec[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]][current_cam_position_].y);
4956 ImGui::SameLine();
4957 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4958 ImGui::InputFloat("##camera_lookat_z", &camera_lookat_vec[rig_dict[curr_rig_name]][current_cam_position_].z);
4959 ImGui::SameLine();
4960 ImGui::Text("Rig Lookat");
4961}
4962
4963void ProjectBuilder::canopyTab(std::string curr_canopy_name, int id){
4964 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
4965 if (ImGui::Button("Update Canopy")){
4966 updateCanopy(curr_canopy_name);
4967 refreshVisualization();
4968 }
4969 ImGui::SameLine();
4970 if (ImGui::Button("Delete Canopy")){
4971 deleteCanopy(curr_canopy_name);
4972 refreshVisualization();
4973 }
4974 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
4975 std::string prev_canopy_name = canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label;
4976 ImGui::InputText("##canopy_name", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label);
4977 if (canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label != prev_canopy_name && canopy_labels_set.find(canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label) == canopy_labels_set.end() && !canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label.empty()){
4978 canopy temp = canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name];
4979 curr_canopy_name = canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label;
4980 std::map<std::string, canopy>::iterator current_canopy_iter = canopy_dict.find(prev_canopy_name);
4981 if (current_canopy_iter != canopy_dict.end()){
4982 canopy_dict.erase(current_canopy_iter);
4983 }
4984 canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name] = temp;
4985
4986 canopy_labels_set.erase(prev_canopy_name);
4987 canopy_labels_set.insert(canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label);
4988 } else{
4989 canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].label = prev_canopy_name;
4990 }
4991 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4992 ImGui::InputFloat("##canopy_origin_x", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].origin.x);
4993 ImGui::SameLine();
4994 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4995 ImGui::InputFloat("##canopy_origin_y", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].origin.y);
4996 ImGui::SameLine();
4997 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(60);
4998 ImGui::InputFloat("##canopy_origin_z", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].origin.z);
4999 ImGui::SameLine();
5000 ImGui::Text("Canopy Origin");
5001 // ####### PLANT COUNT ####### //
5002 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
5003 ImGui::InputInt("##plant_count_x", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].plant_count.x);
5004 ImGui::SameLine();
5005 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
5006 ImGui::InputInt("##plant_count_y", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].plant_count.y);
5007 ImGui::SameLine();
5008 ImGui::Text("Plant Count");
5009 // ####### PLANT SPACING ####### //
5010 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
5011 ImGui::InputFloat("##plant_spacing_x", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].plant_spacing.x);
5012 ImGui::SameLine();
5013 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(50);
5014 ImGui::InputFloat("##plant_spacing_y", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].plant_spacing.y);
5015 ImGui::SameLine();
5016 ImGui::Text("Plant Spacing");
5017 // ####### PLANT LIBRARY NAME ####### //
5018 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(250);
5019 dropDown("Plant Library###dropdown", canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].library_name_verbose, plant_types_verbose);
5020 canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].library_name = plant_type_lookup[canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].library_name_verbose];
5021 // ####### PLANT AGE ####### //
5022 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(80);
5023 ImGui::InputFloat("Plant Age", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].age);
5024 // ####### GROUND CLIPPING HEIGHT ####### //
5025 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(80);
5026 ImGui::InputFloat("Ground Clipping Height", &canopy_dict[curr_canopy_name].ground_clipping_height);
5027 #endif //PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
5028}
5029
5030void ProjectBuilder::saveCanopy(std::string file_name, std::vector<uint> canopy_ID_vec, vec3 position, std::string file_extension) const{
5031 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
5032 std::vector<std::string> primitive_data_vec = {"object_label"};
5033 std::vector<uint> canopy_primID_vec;
5034 std::vector<uint> canopy_objID_vec;
5035 // plantarchitecture->getAllPlantObjectIDs(plantID)
5036 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_ID_vec.size(); i++){
5037 std::vector<uint> canopy_prim_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPlantUUIDs(canopy_ID_vec[i]);
5038 std::vector<uint> canopy_obj_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPlantObjectIDs(canopy_ID_vec[i]);
5039 canopy_primID_vec.insert(canopy_primID_vec.end(), canopy_prim_UUIDs.begin(), canopy_prim_UUIDs.end());
5040 canopy_objID_vec.insert(canopy_objID_vec.end(), canopy_obj_UUIDs.begin(), canopy_obj_UUIDs.end());
5041 }
5042 for (uint objID : canopy_objID_vec){
5043 context->translateObject(objID, -position);
5044 }
5045 if (file_extension == "obj"){
5046 context->writeOBJ(file_name, canopy_primID_vec, primitive_data_vec, true);
5047 } else if (file_extension == "ply"){
5048 // context->writePLY(file_name, obj_UUID_vec, primitive_data_vec);
5049 }
5050 for (uint objID : canopy_objID_vec){
5051 context->translateObject(objID, position);
5052 }
5053 #endif
5054}
5055
5056void ProjectBuilder::saveCanopy(std::string file_name_base, std::vector<uint> canopy_ID_vec, std::vector<helios::vec3> positions, std::string file_extension) const{
5057 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
5058 std::vector<std::string> primitive_data_vec = {"object_label"};
5059 std::vector<std::vector<uint>> canopy_primID_vec;
5060 std::vector<std::vector<uint>> canopy_objID_vec;
5061 // plantarchitecture->getAllPlantObjectIDs(plantID)
5062 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_ID_vec.size(); i++){
5063 std::vector<uint> canopy_prim_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPlantUUIDs(canopy_ID_vec[i]);
5064 std::vector<uint> canopy_obj_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPlantObjectIDs(canopy_ID_vec[i]);
5065 canopy_primID_vec.push_back(canopy_prim_UUIDs);
5066 canopy_objID_vec.push_back(canopy_obj_UUIDs);
5067 }
5068 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_objID_vec.size(); i++){
5069 for (uint objID : canopy_objID_vec[i]){
5070 context->translateObject(objID, -positions[i]);
5071 }
5072 }
5073 std::filesystem::path file_path(file_name_base);
5074 std::string ext = file_path.extension().string();
5075 file_path.replace_extension("");
5076 std::string file_name = file_path.string();
5077 if (file_extension == "obj"){
5078 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_primID_vec.size(); i++){
5079 context->writeOBJ(file_name + "_" + std::to_string(i) + ext, canopy_primID_vec[i], primitive_data_vec, true);
5080 }
5081 } else if (file_extension == "ply"){
5082 // context->writePLY(file_name, obj_UUID_vec, primitive_data_vec);
5083 }
5084 for (int i = 0; i < canopy_objID_vec.size(); i++){
5085 for (uint objID : canopy_objID_vec[i]){
5086 context->translateObject(objID, positions[i]);
5087 }
5088 }
5089 #endif
5090}
5091
5092void ProjectBuilder::addBand(std::string label, float wavelength_min, float wavelength_max, bool enable_emission){
5093#ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
5094 if (label.empty()){
5095 std::cout << "Failed to add band. Please specify a band label." << std::endl;
5096 return;
5097 }
5098 if (bandlabels_set.find(label) != bandlabels_set.end()){
5099 std::cout << "Failed to add band. Band with the specified name already exists." << std::endl;
5100 return;
5101 }
5102 if (wavelength_min > wavelength_max){
5103 std::cout << "Failed to add band. Invalid wavelength minimum and maximum." << std::endl;
5104 return;
5105 }
5106 bandlabels.push_back(label);
5107 bandlabels_set.insert(label);
5108 primitive_values[label] = {{"All", {reflectivity, transmissivity, emissivity}},
5109 {"ground", {ground_reflectivity, ground_transmissivity, ground_emissivity}},
5110 {"leaf", {leaf_reflectivity, leaf_transmissivity, leaf_emissivity}},
5111 {"petiolule", {petiolule_reflectivity, petiolule_transmissivity, petiolule_emissivity}},
5112 {"petiole", {petiole_reflectivity, petiole_transmissivity, petiole_emissivity}},
5113 {"internode", {internode_reflectivity, internode_transmissivity, internode_emissivity}},
5114 {"peduncle", {peduncle_reflectivity, peduncle_transmissivity, peduncle_emissivity}},
5115 {"petal", {petal_reflectivity, petal_transmissivity, petal_emissivity}},
5116 {"pedicel", {pedicel_reflectivity, pedicel_transmissivity, pedicel_emissivity}},
5117 {"fruit", {fruit_reflectivity, fruit_transmissivity, fruit_emissivity}}};
5118 for (auto &primitive_values_pair : primitive_values_dict){
5119 primitive_values_dict[primitive_values_pair.first][label] = {{"All", {reflectivity, transmissivity, emissivity}},
5120 {"ground", {ground_reflectivity, ground_transmissivity, ground_emissivity}},
5121 {"leaf", {leaf_reflectivity, leaf_transmissivity, leaf_emissivity}},
5122 {"petiolule", {petiolule_reflectivity, petiolule_transmissivity, petiolule_emissivity}},
5123 {"petiole", {petiole_reflectivity, petiole_transmissivity, petiole_emissivity}},
5124 {"internode", {internode_reflectivity, internode_transmissivity, internode_emissivity}},
5125 {"peduncle", {peduncle_reflectivity, peduncle_transmissivity, peduncle_emissivity}},
5126 {"petal", {petal_reflectivity, petal_transmissivity, petal_emissivity}},
5127 {"pedicel", {pedicel_reflectivity, pedicel_transmissivity, pedicel_emissivity}},
5128 {"fruit", {fruit_reflectivity, fruit_transmissivity, fruit_emissivity}}};
5129 }
5130 radiation->addRadiationBand(label,wavelength_min,wavelength_max);
5131 // radiation->addRadiationBand(label);
5132 if (!enable_emission){
5133 radiation->disableEmission(label);
5134 } else{
5135 bandlabels_set_emissivity.insert(label);
5136 }
5137 radiation->setDirectRayCount(label, direct_ray_count);
5138 direct_ray_count_dict.insert({label, direct_ray_count});
5139 radiation->setDiffuseRayCount(label, diffuse_ray_count);
5140 diffuse_ray_count_dict.insert({label, diffuse_ray_count});
5141 radiation->setScatteringDepth(label, scattering_depth);
5142 scattering_depth_dict.insert({label, scattering_depth});
5143#endif
5144}
5145
5146void ProjectBuilder::addBand(std::string label, bool enable_emission){
5147#ifdef ENABLE_RADIATION_MODEL
5148 if (label.empty()){
5149 std::cout << "Failed to add band. Please specify a band label." << std::endl;
5150 return;
5151 }
5152 if (bandlabels_set.find(label) != bandlabels_set.end()){
5153 std::cout << "Failed to add band. Band with the specified name already exists." << std::endl;
5154 return;
5155 }
5156 bandlabels.push_back(label);
5157 bandlabels_set.insert(label);
5158 primitive_values[label] = {{"All", {reflectivity, transmissivity, emissivity}},
5159 {"ground", {ground_reflectivity, ground_transmissivity, ground_emissivity}},
5160 {"leaf", {leaf_reflectivity, leaf_transmissivity, leaf_emissivity}},
5161 {"petiolule", {petiolule_reflectivity, petiolule_transmissivity, petiolule_emissivity}},
5162 {"petiole", {petiole_reflectivity, petiole_transmissivity, petiole_emissivity}},
5163 {"internode", {internode_reflectivity, internode_transmissivity, internode_emissivity}},
5164 {"peduncle", {peduncle_reflectivity, peduncle_transmissivity, peduncle_emissivity}},
5165 {"petal", {petal_reflectivity, petal_transmissivity, petal_emissivity}},
5166 {"pedicel", {pedicel_reflectivity, pedicel_transmissivity, pedicel_emissivity}},
5167 {"fruit", {fruit_reflectivity, fruit_transmissivity, fruit_emissivity}}};
5168 for (auto &primitive_values_pair : primitive_values_dict){
5169 primitive_values_dict[primitive_values_pair.first][label] = {{"All", {reflectivity, transmissivity, emissivity}},
5170 {"ground", {ground_reflectivity, ground_transmissivity, ground_emissivity}},
5171 {"leaf", {leaf_reflectivity, leaf_transmissivity, leaf_emissivity}},
5172 {"petiolule", {petiolule_reflectivity, petiolule_transmissivity, petiolule_emissivity}},
5173 {"petiole", {petiole_reflectivity, petiole_transmissivity, petiole_emissivity}},
5174 {"internode", {internode_reflectivity, internode_transmissivity, internode_emissivity}},
5175 {"peduncle", {peduncle_reflectivity, peduncle_transmissivity, peduncle_emissivity}},
5176 {"petal", {petal_reflectivity, petal_transmissivity, petal_emissivity}},
5177 {"pedicel", {pedicel_reflectivity, pedicel_transmissivity, pedicel_emissivity}},
5178 {"fruit", {fruit_reflectivity, fruit_transmissivity, fruit_emissivity}}};
5179 }
5180 radiation->addRadiationBand(label);
5181 // radiation->addRadiationBand(label);
5182 if (!enable_emission){
5183 radiation->disableEmission(label);
5184 } else{
5185 bandlabels_set_emissivity.insert(label);
5186 }
5187 radiation->setDirectRayCount(label, direct_ray_count);
5188 direct_ray_count_dict.insert({label, direct_ray_count});
5189 radiation->setDiffuseRayCount(label, diffuse_ray_count);
5190 diffuse_ray_count_dict.insert({label, diffuse_ray_count});
5191 radiation->setScatteringDepth(label, scattering_depth);
5192 scattering_depth_dict.insert({label, scattering_depth});
5193#endif
5194}
5195
5196
5197void ProjectBuilder::randomizePopup(std::string popup_name, taggedPtr ptr){
5198 std::string popup = "randomize_" + popup_name;
5199 if (ImGui::BeginPopup(popup.c_str())){
5200 ImGui::Text("Random Distribution");
5201 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5202 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##combo_distribution", current_distribution.c_str())){
5203 for (int n = 0; n < distribution_names.size(); n++){
5204 bool is_dist_selected = (current_distribution == distribution_names[n]);
5205 if (ImGui::Selectable(distribution_names[n].c_str(), is_dist_selected))
5206 current_distribution = distribution_names[n];
5207 if (is_dist_selected)
5208 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
5209 }
5210 ImGui::EndCombo();
5211 }
5212 if (current_distribution == "Normal (Gaussian)"){
5213 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5214 ImGui::InputFloat("Mean", &curr_distribution_params[0]);
5215 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5216 ImGui::InputFloat("Variance", &curr_distribution_params[1]);
5217 }
5218 if (current_distribution == "Uniform"){
5219 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5220 ImGui::InputFloat("Lower Bound", &curr_distribution_params[0]);
5221 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5222 ImGui::InputFloat("Upper Bound", &curr_distribution_params[1]);
5223 }
5224 if (current_distribution == "Weibull"){
5225 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5226 ImGui::InputFloat("Shape (k)", &curr_distribution_params[0]);
5227 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5228 ImGui::InputFloat(u8"Scale (\u03bb)", &curr_distribution_params[1]);
5229 }
5230 if (current_distribution != "N/A"){
5231 ImGui::Checkbox("Randomize for Every Image", &randomize_repeatedly);
5232 }
5233 if (ImGui::Button("Apply")){
5234 applyDistribution(popup_name, ptr);
5235 ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
5236 }
5237 ImGui::EndPopup();
5238 }
5239}
5240
5241
5242void ProjectBuilder::noisePopup(std::string popup_name, std::vector<distribution>& dist_vec){
5243 std::string popup = popup_name;
5244 if (ImGui::BeginPopup(popup.c_str())){
5245 ImGui::Text("Add Random Noise Along Path");
5246 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
5247 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##axis_combo", current_axis.c_str())){
5248 for (auto axis : possible_axes){
5249 bool is_axis_selected = (current_axis == axis);
5250 if (ImGui::Selectable(axis.c_str(), is_axis_selected))
5251 current_axis = axis;
5252 if (is_axis_selected)
5253 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
5254 }
5255 ImGui::EndCombo();
5256 }
5257 ImGui::SameLine();
5258 ImGui::Text("Axis");
5259 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5260 if (ImGui::BeginCombo("##combo_distribution", current_distribution.c_str())){
5261 for (int n = 0; n < distribution_names.size(); n++){
5262 bool is_dist_selected = (current_distribution == distribution_names[n]);
5263 if (ImGui::Selectable(distribution_names[n].c_str(), is_dist_selected))
5264 current_distribution = distribution_names[n];
5265 if (is_dist_selected)
5266 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
5267 }
5268 ImGui::EndCombo();
5269 }
5270 ImGui::SameLine();
5271 ImGui::Text("Distribution");
5272 if (current_distribution == "Normal (Gaussian)"){
5273 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5274 ImGui::InputFloat("Mean", &curr_distribution_params[0]);
5275 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5276 ImGui::InputFloat("Variance", &curr_distribution_params[1]);
5277 }
5278 if (current_distribution == "Uniform"){
5279 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5280 ImGui::InputFloat("Lower Bound", &curr_distribution_params[0]);
5281 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5282 ImGui::InputFloat("Upper Bound", &curr_distribution_params[1]);
5283 }
5284 if (current_distribution == "Weibull"){
5285 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5286 ImGui::InputFloat("Shape (k)", &curr_distribution_params[0]);
5287 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(150);
5288 ImGui::InputFloat(u8"Scale (\u03bb)", &curr_distribution_params[1]);
5289 }
5290 int idx;
5291 if (current_axis == "X"){
5292 idx = 0;
5293 } else if (current_axis == "Y"){
5294 idx = 1;
5295 } else{
5296 idx = 2;
5297 }
5298 if (ImGui::Button("Apply")){
5299 distUnion dist_union{};
5300 if (current_distribution == "Normal (Gaussian)"){
5301 dist_union.normal = new std::normal_distribution<float>;
5302 *dist_union.normal = std::normal_distribution<float>(curr_distribution_params[0], curr_distribution_params[1]);
5303 dist_vec[idx].dist = dist_union;
5304 dist_vec[idx].flag = 0;
5305 dist_vec[idx].repeat = 0;
5306 }
5307 if (current_distribution == "Uniform"){
5308 dist_union.uniform = new std::uniform_real_distribution<float>;
5309 *dist_union.uniform = std::uniform_real_distribution<float>(curr_distribution_params[0], curr_distribution_params[1]);
5310 dist_vec[idx].dist = dist_union;
5311 dist_vec[idx].flag = 1;
5312 dist_vec[idx].repeat = 0;
5313 }
5314 if (current_distribution == "Weibull"){
5315 dist_union.weibull = new std::weibull_distribution<float>;
5316 *dist_union.weibull = std::weibull_distribution<float>(curr_distribution_params[0], curr_distribution_params[1]);
5317 dist_vec[idx].dist = dist_union;
5318 dist_vec[idx].flag = 2;
5319 dist_vec[idx].repeat = 0;
5320 }
5321 if (current_distribution == "N/A"){
5322 dist_vec[idx].flag = -1;
5323 dist_vec[idx].repeat = 0;
5324 }
5325
5326 ImGui::CloseCurrentPopup();
5327 }
5328 ImGui::EndPopup();
5329 }
5330}
5331
5332
5333
5334void ProjectBuilder::applyDistribution(std::string var_name, taggedPtr ptr){
5335 if (current_distribution == "N/A"){
5336 distribution_types[var_name] = "N/A";
5337 }
5338 if (current_distribution == "Normal (Gaussian)"){
5339 std::normal_distribution<float> curr_dist_normal(curr_distribution_params[0],curr_distribution_params[1]);
5340 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
5341 distributions.push_back(createDistribution(curr_dist_normal, randomize_repeatedly));
5342 distribution_types[var_name] = "Normal (Gaussian)";
5343 }
5344 if (current_distribution == "Uniform"){
5345 std::uniform_real_distribution<float> curr_dist_uniform(curr_distribution_params[0],curr_distribution_params[1]);
5346 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
5347 distributions.push_back(createDistribution(curr_dist_uniform, randomize_repeatedly));
5348 distribution_types[var_name] = "Uniform";
5349 }
5350 if (current_distribution == "Weibull"){
5351 std::weibull_distribution<float> curr_dist_weibull(curr_distribution_params[0],curr_distribution_params[1]);
5352 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
5353 distributions.push_back(createDistribution(curr_dist_weibull, randomize_repeatedly));
5354 distribution_types[var_name] = "Weibull";
5355 }
5356 distribution_params[var_name] = curr_distribution_params;
5357 randomized_variable_lookup[var_name] = ptr;
5358 sample(var_name);
5359}
5360
5361
5362void ProjectBuilder::applyDistribution(std::string var_name, distribution dist, taggedPtr ptr){
5363 if (dist.flag == -1){
5364 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
