5365 distributions.push_back(dist);
5366 distribution_types[var_name] = "N/A";
5367 distribution_params[var_name] = std::vector<float>{0.0, 0.0};
5368 }
5369 if (dist.flag == 0){
5370 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
5371 distributions.push_back(dist);
5372 distribution_types[var_name] = "Normal (Gaussian)";
5373 distribution_params[var_name] = std::vector<float>{dist.dist.normal->mean(), dist.dist.normal->stddev()};
5374 }
5375 if (current_distribution == "Uniform"){
5376 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
5377 distributions.push_back(dist);
5378 distribution_types[var_name] = "Uniform";
5379 distribution_params[var_name] = std::vector<float>{dist.dist.uniform->a(), dist.dist.uniform->b()};
5380 }
5381 if (current_distribution == "Weibull"){
5382 distribution_dict[var_name] = distributions.size();
5383 distributions.push_back(dist);
5384 distribution_types[var_name] = "Weibull";
5385 distribution_params[var_name] = std::vector<float>{dist.dist.weibull->a(), dist.dist.weibull->b()};
5386 }
5387 randomized_variable_lookup[var_name] = ptr;
5388 sample(var_name);
5389}
5390
5391
5392void ProjectBuilder::randomize(bool randomize_all){
5393 for (std::pair<std::string, int> dist_pair : distribution_dict){
5394 std::string var_name = dist_pair.first;
5395 distribution dist = distributions[dist_pair.second];
5396 if (randomize_all || dist.repeat){
5397 sample(var_name);
5398 }
5399 }
5400}
5401
5402
5403taggedPtr createTaggedPtr(float* ptr){
5404 digitPtr p;
5405 p.f = ptr;
5406 taggedPtr t{p, false};
5407 return t;
5408}
5409
5410
5411taggedPtr createTaggedPtr(int* ptr){
5412 digitPtr p;
5413 p.i = ptr;
5414 taggedPtr t{p, true};
5415 return t;
5416}
5417
5418
5419taggedPtr createTaggedPtr(float* ptr, bool* dirty){
5420 digitPtr p;
5421 p.f = ptr;
5422 taggedPtr t{p, false, dirty};
5423 return t;
5424}
5425
5426
5427taggedPtr createTaggedPtr(int* ptr, bool* dirty){
5428 digitPtr p;
5429 p.i = ptr;
5430 taggedPtr t{p, true, dirty};
5431 return t;
5432}
5433
5434
5435distribution createDistribution(const std::normal_distribution<float> &dist, bool randomize_repeat){
5436 distUnion u;
5437 u.normal = new std::normal_distribution<float>;
5438 *u.normal = dist;
5439 distribution d{u, 0, randomize_repeat};
5440 return d;
5441}
5442
5443distribution createDistribution(const std::uniform_real_distribution<float> &dist, bool randomize_repeat){
5444 distUnion u;
5445 u.uniform = new std::uniform_real_distribution<float>;
5446 *u.uniform = dist;
5447 distribution d{u, 1, randomize_repeat};
5448 return d;
5449}
5450
5451distribution createDistribution(const std::weibull_distribution<float> &dist, bool randomize_repeat){
5452 distUnion u;
5453 u.weibull = new std::weibull_distribution<float>;
5454 *u.weibull = dist;
5455 distribution d{u, 2, randomize_repeat};
5456 return d;
5457}
5458
5459void ProjectBuilder::randomizerParams(std::string var_name){
5460 if (ImGui::IsItemClicked(ImGuiMouseButton_Right)){
5461 if (distribution_params.find(var_name) != distribution_params.end()){
5462 curr_distribution_params = distribution_params[var_name];
5463 } else{
5464 curr_distribution_params = std::vector<float>{0, 0};
5465 }
5466 if (distribution_types.find(var_name) != distribution_types.end()){
5467 current_distribution = distribution_types[var_name];
5468 } else{
5469 current_distribution = "N/A";
5470 }
5471 if (current_distribution != "N/A"){
5472 randomize_repeatedly = distributions[distribution_dict[var_name]].repeat;
5473 }
5474 }
5475}
5476
5477void ProjectBuilder::sample(std::string var_name){
5478 if (distribution_types.find(var_name) == distribution_types.end() || distribution_types[var_name] == "N/A"){
5479 return;
5480 }
5481 distribution d = distributions[distribution_dict[var_name]];
5482 taggedPtr t = randomized_variable_lookup[var_name];
5483 float sampled_value;
5484 if (d.flag == 0){
5485 std::normal_distribution<float> normal = *d.dist.normal;
5486 sampled_value = normal(generator);
5487 if (t.isInt){
5488 *t.ptr.i = (int) sampled_value;
5489 } else{
5490 *t.ptr.f = sampled_value;
5491 }
5492 } else if (d.flag == 1){
5493 std::uniform_real_distribution<float> uniform = *d.dist.uniform;
5494 sampled_value = uniform(generator);
5495 if (t.isInt){
5496 *t.ptr.i = (int) sampled_value;
5497 } else{
5498 *t.ptr.f = sampled_value;
5499 }
5500 } else if (d.flag == 2){
5501 std::weibull_distribution<float> weibull = *d.dist.weibull;
5502 sampled_value = weibull(generator);
5503 if (t.isInt){
5504 *t.ptr.i = (int) sampled_value;
5505 } else{
5506 *t.ptr.f = sampled_value;
5507 }
5508 }
5509 // if (t.object.idx != -1){
5510 // if (t.object.isCanopy){
5511 // dirty_canopies.insert(t.object.idx);
5512 // } else{
5513 // dirty_objects.insert(t.object.idx);
5514 // }
5515 // }
5516}
5517
5518
5519void ProjectBuilder::updateContext(){
5520 for (int canopy_idx : dirty_canopies){
5521 // updateCanopy(canopy_idx);
5522 }
5523 for (int object_idx : dirty_objects){
5524 updateObject(obj_names[object_idx]);
5525 }
5526 dirty_canopies.clear();
5527 dirty_objects.clear();
5528}
5529
5530
5531void ProjectBuilder::sampleAll(){
5532 for (std::pair<std::string, std::string> var_pair : distribution_types){
5533 sample(var_pair.first);
5534 }
5535}
5536
5537void ProjectBuilder::outputConsole(){
5538 old_cout_stream_buf = std::cout.rdbuf();
5539 std::string buffer = captured_cout.str();
5540 ImGui::InputTextMultiline("##console", &buffer[0], buffer.size() + 1, ImVec2(-FLT_MIN,
5541 ImGui::GetTextLineHeight() * 5), ImGuiInputTextFlags_ReadOnly | ImGuiInputTextFlags_AllowTabInput);
5542 std::cout.rdbuf(old_cout_stream_buf);
5543}
5544
5545void ProjectBuilder::updateColor(std::string curr_obj, std::string obj_type, float* new_color){
5546 helios::RGBcolor *curr_color = nullptr;
5547 if (obj_type == "obj"){
5548 curr_color = &objects_dict[curr_obj].color;
5549 }
5550 if (obj_type == "rig" || obj_type == "arrow" || obj_type == "camera"){
5551 curr_color = &rig_colors[rig_dict[curr_obj]];
5552 }
5553 // if (curr_color->r == new_color[0] && curr_color->g == new_color[1] && curr_color->b == new_color[2]){
5554 // return;
5555 // }
5556 curr_color->r = new_color[0];
5557 curr_color->g = new_color[1];
5558 curr_color->b = new_color[2];
5559 if (obj_type == "obj"){
5560 context->setPrimitiveColor(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, *curr_color);
5561 }
5562 if (obj_type == "rig"){
5563 if (arrow_dict.find(curr_obj) != arrow_dict.end()){
5564 for (std::vector<uint> &arrow : arrow_dict.at(curr_obj)){
5565 context->setPrimitiveColor(arrow, *curr_color);
5566 }
5567 }
5568 if (camera_models_dict.find(curr_obj) != camera_models_dict.end()){
5569 context->setPrimitiveColor(camera_models_dict.at(curr_obj), *curr_color);
5570 }
5571 }
5572 if (obj_type == "arrow"){
5573 if (arrow_dict.find(curr_obj) != arrow_dict.end()){
5574 for (std::vector<uint> &arrow : arrow_dict.at(curr_obj)){
5575 context->setPrimitiveColor(arrow, *curr_color);
5576 }
5577 }
5578 }
5579 if (obj_type == "camera"){
5580 if (camera_models_dict.find(curr_obj) != camera_models_dict.end()){
5581 context->setPrimitiveColor(camera_models_dict.at(curr_obj), *curr_color);
5582 }
5583 }
5584}
5585
5586
5587void ProjectBuilder::updateObject(std::string curr_obj){
5588 // Scale, rotate, and translate object
5589 if (objects_dict[curr_obj].use_texture_file && objects_dict[curr_obj].is_dirty){
5590 context->deletePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs);
5591 if( std::filesystem::path(objects_dict[curr_obj].file).extension() == ".obj" ){
5592 objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs = context->loadOBJ(objects_dict[curr_obj].file.c_str());
5593 } else if ( std::filesystem::path(objects_dict[curr_obj].file).extension() == ".ply" ){
5594 objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs = context->loadPLY(objects_dict[curr_obj].file.c_str());
5595 }
5596 context->scalePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, objects_dict[curr_obj].scale);
5597 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation.x), "x");
5598 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation.y), "y");
5599 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation.z), "z");
5600 context->translatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, objects_dict[curr_obj].position);
5601
5602 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_scale = objects_dict[curr_obj].scale;
5603 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation = objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation;
5604 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position = objects_dict[curr_obj].position;
5605 }
5606 if (objects_dict[curr_obj].scale != objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_scale){
5607 vec3 obj_scale_;
5608 obj_scale_.x = objects_dict[curr_obj].scale.x / objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_scale.x;
5609 obj_scale_.y = objects_dict[curr_obj].scale.y / objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_scale.y;
5610 obj_scale_.z = objects_dict[curr_obj].scale.z / objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_scale.z;
5611 // context->scalePrimitiveAboutPoint();
5612 context->translatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, -objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position); // translate back to origin
5613 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, -deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.x), "x");
5614 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, -deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.y), "y");
5615 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, -deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.z), "z");
5616
5617 context->scalePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, obj_scale_);
5618 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.x), "x");
5619 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.y), "y");
5620 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.z), "z");
5621 context->translatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position); // restore translation
5622 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_scale = objects_dict[curr_obj].scale;
5623 }
5624 if (objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation != objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation){
5625 // context->rotatePrimitive(origin = prev_position, axis = (1,0,0));
5626 //rotate about x
5627 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation.x - objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.x), objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position, make_vec3(1, 0, 0));
5628 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation.y - objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.y), objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position, make_vec3(0, 1, 0));
5629 context->rotatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, deg2rad(objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation.z - objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation.z), objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position, make_vec3(0, 0, 1));
5630 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_orientation = objects_dict[curr_obj].orientation;
5631 }
5632 if (objects_dict[curr_obj].position != objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position){
5633 context->translatePrimitive(objects_dict[curr_obj].UUIDs, objects_dict[curr_obj].position - objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position);
5634 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_position = objects_dict[curr_obj].position;
5635 }
5636 objects_dict[curr_obj].prev_color = objects_dict[curr_obj].color;
5637 objects_dict[curr_obj].is_dirty = false;
5638}
5639
5640
5641void ProjectBuilder::updateRigs(){
5642 deleteArrows();
5643 arrow_dict.clear();
5644 updateArrows();
5645 deleteCameraModels();
5646 camera_models_dict.clear();
5647 updateCameraModels();
5648 // Update visualizer
5649 refreshVisualization();
5650}
5651
5652
5653void ProjectBuilder::deleteRig(std::string curr_rig){
5654 int delete_idx = rig_dict[curr_rig];
5655 rig_dict.erase(rig_dict.find(curr_rig));
5656 rig_labels_set.erase(curr_rig);
5657 updateRigs();
5658 if (!rig_labels_set.empty() && current_rig == curr_rig){
5659 current_rig = *rig_labels_set.begin();
5660 } else{
5661 current_rig = "";
5662 }
5663}
5664
5665
5666
5667void ProjectBuilder::dropDown(std::string widget_name, std::string& selected, std::vector<std::string> choices){
5668 if (ImGui::BeginCombo(widget_name.c_str(), selected.c_str())){
5669 for (int n = 0; n < choices.size(); n++){
5670 bool is_selected = (selected == choices[n]);
5671 if (ImGui::Selectable(choices[n].c_str(), is_selected))
5672 selected = choices[n];
5673 if (is_selected)
5674 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
5675 }
5676 ImGui::EndCombo();
5677 }
5678}
5679
5680
5681void ProjectBuilder::dropDown(std::string widget_name, std::string& selected, std::set<std::string> choices){
5682 if (ImGui::BeginCombo(widget_name.c_str(), selected.c_str())){
5683 for (std::string choice : choices){
5684 bool is_selected = (selected == choice);
5685 if (ImGui::Selectable(choice.c_str(), is_selected))
5686 selected = choice;
5687 if (is_selected)
5688 ImGui::SetItemDefaultFocus();
5689 }
5690 ImGui::EndCombo();
5691 }
5692}
5693
5694void ProjectBuilder::deleteCanopy(const std::string &canopy){
5695 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
5696 for (auto plant_instance : canopy_dict[canopy].IDs){
5697 plantarchitecture->deletePlantInstance(plant_instance);
5698 }
5699 canopy_dict.erase(canopy);
5700 canopy_labels_set.erase(canopy);
5701 if (!canopy_labels_set.empty() && current_canopy == canopy){
5702 current_canopy = *canopy_labels_set.begin();
5703 } else{
5704 current_canopy = "";
5705 }
5706 #endif
5707}
5708
5709
5710void ProjectBuilder::deleteObject(const std::string& obj){
5711 context->deletePrimitive(objects_dict[obj].UUIDs);
5712 refreshVisualization();
5713 objects_dict.erase(obj);
5714 obj_names_set.erase(obj);
5715 if (!obj_names_set.empty()){
5716 current_obj = *obj_names_set.begin();
5717 } else{
5718 current_obj = "";
5719 }
5720}
5721
5722
5723
5724void ProjectBuilder::updateCanopy(const std::string &canopy){
5725 #ifdef ENABLE_PLANT_ARCHITECTURE
5726 for (auto plant_instance : canopy_dict[canopy].IDs){
5727 plantarchitecture->deletePlantInstance(plant_instance);
5728 }
5729 plantarchitecture->loadPlantModelFromLibrary( canopy_dict[canopy].library_name );
5730 plantarchitecture->enableGroundClipping( canopy_dict[canopy].ground_clipping_height );
5731
5732 std::vector<uint> new_canopy_IDs = plantarchitecture->buildPlantCanopyFromLibrary( canopy_dict[canopy].origin, canopy_dict[canopy].plant_spacing,
5733 canopy_dict[canopy].plant_count, canopy_dict[canopy].age);
5734 std::vector<vec3> curr_plant_locations = plantarchitecture->getPlantBasePosition(new_canopy_IDs);
5735 canopy_dict[canopy].individual_plant_locations = curr_plant_locations;
5736
5737 leaf_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllLeafUUIDs();
5738 primitive_UUIDs["leaf"] = leaf_UUIDs;
5739 internode_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllInternodeUUIDs();
5740 primitive_UUIDs["internode"] = internode_UUIDs;
5741 petiole_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPetioleUUIDs();
5742 primitive_UUIDs["petiole"] = petiole_UUIDs;
5743 peduncle_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllPeduncleUUIDs();
5744 primitive_UUIDs["peduncle"] = peduncle_UUIDs;
5745 std::vector<uint> flower_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllFlowerUUIDs();
5746 petal_UUIDs = context->filterPrimitivesByData(flower_UUIDs, "object_label", "petal");
5747 sepal_UUIDs = context->filterPrimitivesByData(flower_UUIDs, "object_label", "sepal");
5748 if( petal_UUIDs.empty() && sepal_UUIDs.empty() ){
5749 petal_UUIDs = flower_UUIDs;
5750 sepal_UUIDs.clear();
5751 }
5752 fruit_UUIDs = plantarchitecture->getAllFruitUUIDs();
5753 primitive_UUIDs["petal"] = petal_UUIDs;
5754 primitive_UUIDs["sepal"] = sepal_UUIDs;
5755 primitive_UUIDs["flower"] = flower_UUIDs;
5756
5757 canopy_dict[canopy].IDs = new_canopy_IDs;
5758 #endif
5759}
5760
5761
5762
5763void ProjectBuilder::addCanopy(){
5764 std::string default_canopy_label = "canopy";
5765 std::string new_canopy_label = "canopy_0";
5766 int count = 0;
5767 while (canopy_dict.find(new_canopy_label) != canopy_dict.end()){
5768 count++;
5769 new_canopy_label = default_canopy_label + "_" + std::to_string(count);
5770 }
5771 canopy new_canopy;
5772 new_canopy.idx = canopy_idx;
5773 canopy_labels_set.insert(new_canopy_label);
5774 canopy_idx++;
5775 new_canopy.age = plant_age;
5776 new_canopy.ground_clipping_height = ground_clipping_height;
5777 new_canopy.label = new_canopy_label;
5778 new_canopy.library_name = plant_library_name;
5779 new_canopy.library_name_verbose = plant_library_name_verbose;
5780 new_canopy.IDs = std::vector<unsigned int>{};
5781 new_canopy.individual_plant_locations = std::vector<vec3>{};
5782 new_canopy.plant_spacing = plant_spacing;
5783 new_canopy.plant_count = plant_count;
5784 new_canopy.origin = canopy_origin;
5785 new_canopy.data_group = "";
5786 canopy_dict[new_canopy.label] = new_canopy;
5787
5788 current_canopy = new_canopy_label;
5789}
5790
5791
5792void ProjectBuilder::refreshVisualization(){
5793 const char* font_name = "LCD";
5794 visualizer->addTextboxByCenter("LOADING...", vec3(.5,.5,0), make_SphericalCoord(0, 0),
5795 RGB::red, 40, font_name, Visualizer::COORDINATES_WINDOW_NORMALIZED);
5796 visualizer->plotUpdate();
5797 visualizer->clearGeometry();
5798 visualizer->buildContextGeometry(context);
5799 if (enable_coordinate_axes){
5800 visualizer->addCoordinateAxes(helios::make_vec3(0,0,0.05), helios::make_vec3(1,1,1), "positive");
5801 }
5802 visualizer->plotUpdate();
5803}
5804
5805
5806void ProjectBuilder::recordPopup(){
5807 if (ImGui::BeginPopup("repeat_record")){
5808 ImGui::SetNextItemWidth(100);
5809 ImGui::InputInt("Number of Recordings", &num_recordings);
5810 ImGui::EndPopup();
5811 }
5812}
5813
5814
5815void ProjectBuilder::updateLocation(){
5816 Location location;
5817 location.latitude_deg = latitude;
5818 location.longitude_deg = longitude;
5819 location.UTC_offset = static_cast<float>(UTC_offset);
5820 context->setLocation(location);
5821}
5822
5823
5824void ProjectBuilder::updateGround(){
5825 context->deletePrimitive(primitive_UUIDs["ground"]);
5826 // uint ground_objID = context->addTileObject( domain_origin, domain_extent, nullptr, ground_resolution, ground_texture_file.c_str() );
5827 uint ground_objID;
5828 if( !ground_model_file.empty() && ground_flag == 2 && use_ground_texture ) {
5829 ground_UUIDs = context->loadOBJ(ground_model_file.c_str());
5830 context->translatePrimitive( ground_UUIDs, domain_origin );
5831 ground_objID = context->addPolymeshObject( ground_UUIDs );
5832 }else if( !ground_texture_file.empty() && ground_flag == 1 && use_ground_texture ){
5833 if (num_tiles.x > 1 || num_tiles.y > 1){
5834 buildTiledGround( domain_origin, domain_extent, num_tiles, ground_resolution, ground_texture_file.c_str(), 0.f );
5835
5836 return;
5837 }else{
5838 ground_objID = context->addTileObject( domain_origin, domain_extent, nullrotation, ground_resolution, ground_texture_file.c_str() );
5839 ground_UUIDs = context->getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ground_objID);
5840 }
5841 }else if( ground_flag == 1 && !use_ground_texture ){
5842 RGBcolor ground_color_;
5843 ground_color_.r = ground_color[0];
5844 ground_color_.g = ground_color[1];
5845 ground_color_.b = ground_color[2];
5846
5847 if (num_tiles.x > 1 || num_tiles.y > 1){
5848 buildTiledGround( domain_origin, domain_extent, num_tiles, ground_resolution, ground_texture_file.c_str(), 0.f );
5849 context->setPrimitiveColor(ground_UUIDs, ground_color_);
5850
5851 return;
5852 }else{
5853 ground_objID = context->addTileObject( domain_origin, domain_extent, nullrotation, ground_resolution, ground_color_ );
5854 ground_UUIDs = context->getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ground_objID);
5855 }
5856 }else if( ground_flag == 2 && !use_ground_texture ){
5857 RGBcolor ground_color_;
5858 ground_color_.r = ground_color[0];
5859 ground_color_.g = ground_color[1];
5860 ground_color_.b = ground_color[2];
5861 ground_UUIDs = context->loadOBJ(ground_model_file.c_str());
5862 ground_objID = context->addPolymeshObject( ground_UUIDs );
5863 context->setObjectColor(ground_objID, ground_color_);
5864 }
5865 // else {
5866 // ground_objID = context->addTileObject(domain_origin, domain_extent, nullrotation, ground_resolution);
5867 // ground_UUIDs = context->getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ground_objID);
5868 // }
5869 ground_UUIDs.clear();
5870 ground_UUIDs = context->getObjectPrimitiveUUIDs(ground_objID);
5871 context->setPrimitiveData( ground_UUIDs, "twosided_flag", uint(0) );
5872 context->setPrimitiveData( ground_UUIDs, "object_label", "ground" );
5873 primitive_UUIDs["ground"] = ground_UUIDs;
5874}
5875
5876
5877void ProjectBuilder::refreshVisualizationTypes(){
5878 visualization_types.clear();
5879 std::vector<uint> allUUIDs = context->getAllUUIDs();
5880 for (auto &UUID : allUUIDs){
5881 std::vector<std::string> primitiveData = context->listPrimitiveData(UUID);
5882 for (auto &data : primitiveData){
5883 visualization_types.insert(data);
5884 }
5885 }
5886}
5887
5888
5889std::string ProjectBuilder::shortenPath(std::string path_name){
5890 std::string shorten_path = path_name;
5891 for (char &c : shorten_path){
5892 if (c == '\\'){
5893 c = '/';
5894 }
5895 }
5896 size_t last_file = shorten_path.rfind('/');
5897 if (last_file != std::string::npos){
5898 shorten_path = shorten_path.substr(last_file + 1);
5899 }
5900 return shorten_path;
5901}
5902
5903
5904void ProjectBuilder::setBoundingBoxObjects(){
5905 bounding_boxes_map.clear();
5906 int idx = 0;
5907 for (auto &box_pair : bounding_boxes) {
5908 if (box_pair.second){
5909 bounding_boxes_map[box_pair.first] = idx;
5910 idx++;
5911 }
5912 }
5913 std::vector<uint> all_UUIDs = context->getAllUUIDs();
5914 context->clearPrimitiveData(all_UUIDs, "object_number");
5915 for (auto &UUID : all_UUIDs){
5916 if (!context->doesPrimitiveDataExist(UUID, "object_label")) continue;
5917 std::string obj_label;
5918 context->getPrimitiveData(UUID, "object_label", obj_label);
5919 if (bounding_boxes_map.find(obj_label) != bounding_boxes_map.end()){
5920 context->setPrimitiveData(UUID, "object_number", HELIOS_TYPE_UINT, 1, &bounding_boxes_map[obj_label]);
5921 }
5922 }
5923}
5924
5925
5926void ProjectBuilder::buildTiledGround( const vec3 &ground_origin, const vec2 &ground_extent, const int2 &texture_subtiles, const int2 &texture_subpatches, const char* ground_texture_file, float ground_rotation ){
5927
5928 ground_UUIDs.clear();
5929
5930 vec2 dx_tile( ground_extent.x/float(texture_subtiles.x), ground_extent.y/float(texture_subtiles.y) );
5931
5932 vec2 dx_subpatch( dx_tile.x/float(texture_subpatches.x), dx_tile.y/float(texture_subpatches.y) );
5933
5934 std::vector<uint> UUIDs;
5935 for( int j=0; j<texture_subtiles.y; j++ ){
5936 for( int i=0; i<texture_subtiles.x; i++ ){
5937
5938 vec3 center = ground_origin + make_vec3( -0.5f*ground_extent.x+(float(i)+0.5f)*dx_tile.x, -0.5f*ground_extent.y+(float(j)+0.5f)*dx_tile.y, 0 );
5939
5940 if( ground_rotation!=0 ){
5941 center = rotatePointAboutLine( center, ground_origin, make_vec3(0,0,1), ground_rotation );
5942 }
5943
5944 UUIDs = context->addTile( center, dx_tile, make_SphericalCoord(0,-ground_rotation), texture_subpatches, ground_texture_file );
5945
5946 ground_UUIDs.insert( ground_UUIDs.begin(), UUIDs.begin(), UUIDs.end() );
5947
5948 }
5949 }
5950
5951 context->setPrimitiveData( ground_UUIDs, "twosided_flag", uint(0) );
5952 context->setGlobalData( "ground_UUIDs", HELIOS_TYPE_UINT, ground_UUIDs.size(), ground_UUIDs.data() );
5953 primitive_UUIDs["ground"] = ground_UUIDs;
5954
5955}
